NK034(ngi)007:0: dung yig can dung yig can rgyud kyi khong don
NK034(ngi)007:1: bsdus pa sgron ma snang byed ces bya ba bzhugs
NK034(ngi)007:2: so kha tham iti&a&a&a rgya gar skad du tri la
NK034(ngi)007:3: tan+d+ra b+ha du ti ka rgyud rnam par 'byed pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:4: ti ka zhes bya ba bod skad du mdo rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:6: gyi don gsal rtogs par byed pas bar byed pa
NK034(ngi)007:7: gzhi'i rtogs pa stong pa bde chen ngang la phyag
NK034(ngi)007:9: chos thams cad chos nyid mnyam pa nyid chen po'i
NK034(ngi)007:10: lung du bstan pa'o sarba pa pam a sim d+ha
NK034(ngi)007:11: ya chos sku nyag gcig spros dang bral ba yi
NK034(ngi)007:12: rtogs pa byed pa'i thabs bstan pa don rnams rtogs
NK034(ngi)007:13: par byed pa'i man ngag tshig gis gtan la phab
NK034(ngi)007:14: nas mtshon par bya ba'i phyir dngos med rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:15: stong pa chos nyid zang thal du snang /
NK034(ngi)007:16: shes par dka' ba'i don ka dag sgrib bral lta
NK034(ngi)007:17: dang bcas pa'i rig pa ste rdo rje lu gu
NK034(ngi)007:19: de yi gnad dang rig pa'i gnad dang lus kyi gnad kyis nyams su blang ba bstan /
NK034(ngi)007:20: dgongs don shes bya'i phyir snying gi mun sel blo'i rmongs pa /
NK034(ngi)007:21: sgron ma snang byed 'di 'byed pa'i lde mig /
NK034(ngi)007:22: blo dman pa rnams kyis mi shes 'dzin pa'i ba
NK034(ngi)007:23: thag mdud pa dam du bcing ba rnams las 'grol
NK034(ngi)007:24: ma rig la sogs 'gro ba rnams ma rig pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:25: lcags su bcug pa mthar 'dzin dam 'byed pa'i rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:26: dag par byed pa shes rab 'phrul gyi lde mig
NK034(ngi)007:27: mi shes pa shes par byed pa /
NK034(ngi)007:28: gsal ba 'dis ye shes mdzod kyi snang ba bsam
NK034(ngi)007:29: gyis mi khyab pa'i sa ma ti'i ro rnyed par
NK034(ngi)007:30: byed pas rab bstan te nyams gong nas gong du
NK034(ngi)007:31: 'phel bar byed pa lhag mthong cog rig pa gcer
NK034(ngi)007:32: mthong du rtogs par byed pa bzhag dgongs pa lhan
NK034(ngi)007:33: ne nyid nam mkha' la snang bar byed pa zag
NK034(ngi)007:34: med thig le'i snang ba sna tshogs su 'char ba
NK034(ngi)007:35: rgya che bas mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes spros pa
NK034(ngi)007:36: dang bral ba cha phra nyag gcig gsal ba'i ngang
NK034(ngi)007:37: du bsdus gsal ba thogs pa rig pa'i shes rab
NK034(ngi)007:38: kyis snang ba med pa'i tshar gcod pa mtshon chen
NK034(ngi)007:39: gyis lus ji snyed blangs pa'i nyon mongs pa 'di
NK034(ngi)007:40: nyid la gcod pa'o skye ba'i brgyud pa nyon mongs
NK034(ngi)007:41: d+r+wa gcod phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' zhal nas
NK034(ngi)007:42: gsungs pa'i rgyud sde rnams kyi gsang nges pa'i lung
NK034(ngi)007:43: 'di la mos pa'i skal ldan gang zag rnams kyi
NK034(ngi)007:44: blo la go bya'i phyir dbang po'i bye brag rab
NK034(ngi)007:45: 'bring tha ma blo yis rim theg pa rim pa
NK034(ngi)007:46: dgur phye nas yid ches rgyud kyi sdebs bi ma
NK034(ngi)007:47: la bdag gis tshig don gsal bar dbye dam pa
NK034(ngi)007:48: dang po'i sangs rgyas dngos 'dra ba'i mkhas pa ye
NK034(ngi)007:49: shes mdo bla ma dam pa pa dz+ny+aa na s+au
NK034(ngi)007:50: tra'i thugs kyi dgongs pa bye ma la mu tra'i
NK034(ngi)007:51: blo la babs pa'i don de nyid gsal ba'i rim
NK034(ngi)007:52: pa'i gdams ngag rnams dang blo dang sbyar te mdo
NK034(ngi)007:53: sde 'dul mngon gyi sde snod rnams las khyad par
NK034(ngi)007:54: du 'phags pa'i don bsdus te khyad par chen po'i
NK034(ngi)007:55: don rnams ni go rim gsal bar rnam par phye
NK034(ngi)007:56: ste bi ma la bdag gis bshad par bya sde
NK034(ngi)007:57: snod rin chen las ni mngon pa ste theg pa
NK034(ngi)007:58: che chung las kyang chen po nyid pha rol phyin
NK034(ngi)007:59: dang sngags las man tra'o de nyid phyi dang nang
NK034(ngi)007:60: las nang pa ste de nyid las ni theg pa
NK034(ngi)007:61: rim dgu kun gyi rtse mo rdzogs chen /
NK034(ngi)007:62: theg rgyal a ti gsang ba chen po'i gzhung rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:63: dang 'grel pa de nyid sde ru phye na rnam
NK034(ngi)007:64: sems sde klong sde man ngag gi sde gsum ste
NK034(ngi)007:65: sems sde klong sde man ngag sde gsum las 'di
NK034(ngi)007:66: ni gsang ba man ngag nyid yon no man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:67: la ni kha 'thor dang man ngag kha gtam dang
NK034(ngi)007:68: rgyud rang gzhung gi man ngag gsum las rgyud dum
NK034(ngi)007:69: bu'i man ngag tu brjod pa'o //
NK034(ngi)007:70: rgyud sna tshogs kyi tshig la brten nas tshig gcig nyams su len /
NK034(ngi)007:71: rgyud lung man ngag tu 'brel ba /
NK034(ngi)007:72: rgyud nas byung ba'i tshig de la bsam gyis mi
NK034(ngi)007:73: khyab pa zhig bzhugs kyang 'di thig le'i skor ro
NK034(ngi)007:74: // rnam gsum ste kha gtam dang ni kha 'thor
NK034(ngi)007:75: dang rgyud kyi rang gzhung gsum las rgyud de nyid
NK034(ngi)007:76: las ni khyad par thig le'i skor de la bzhi
NK034(ngi)007:77: ste phyi skor nang skor gsang skor ba dang gsang
NK034(ngi)007:78: ba bla na med pa yongs rdzogs pa'o phyi skor
NK034(ngi)007:79: lus dang 'dra ste tha snyad rgya cher ston lus
NK034(ngi)007:80: rdzogs par yod kyang don snying lnga la sogs pa
NK034(ngi)007:81: med na ro dang 'dra nang skor mig dang 'dra
NK034(ngi)007:82: ste mig gis phyir mthong yang rang mi mthong /
NK034(ngi)007:83: mthong ba brda' yi chos gsang skor snying dang 'dra
NK034(ngi)007:84: ste dran byed gzungs kyi chos snying gcig pus don
NK034(ngi)007:86: snga ma las bag tsam zab bo //
NK034(ngi)007:87: 'di ni lus kun rdzogs te lus la nad med
NK034(ngi)007:88: dbang po skyon med pa'i skyes bu 'dra de dag
NK034(ngi)007:89: kun kyang bsdu na rnam pa gnyis bshad rgyud dang
NK034(ngi)007:90: ni snyan rgyud gnyis yin no snyan nas brgyud pa
NK034(ngi)007:91: la ni gnyis yin te yi ge can dang yi
NK034(ngi)007:92: ge med pa gnyis bshad rgyud gong du brjod ltar
NK034(ngi)007:93: bzhin rnams la 'di ni gsang ba bla med yongs
NK034(ngi)007:94: rdzogs pa yi ge med pa'i snyan brgyud 'di nyid
NK034(ngi)007:95: 'brel rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyud 'bum phrag
NK034(ngi)007:96: drug cu rtsa bzhi las 'di ni nyi shu rtsa
NK034(ngi)007:97: gcig pa'o khyad par gsang ba bla med pa de
NK034(ngi)007:98: yi rgyud kyi mtshan rnams dang go don dbye ba
NK034(ngi)007:99: rnam par bshad de rgyud go ba rnam gnyis te
NK034(ngi)007:100: tshig gi rgyud dang don gyi rgyud don rang gi
NK034(ngi)007:101: ngo bo mchog de mtshon par byed pa'i tshig rnam
NK034(ngi)007:102: pa gnyis su bsdus te bstan don gyi rgyud la
NK034(ngi)007:103: 'di lta ba'i don du bstan pa rnam gnyis te
NK034(ngi)007:104: rang bzhin gyi rgyud dang ni thabs kyi rgyud yin
NK034(ngi)007:105: no thabs kyi rgyud la rnam gnyis te mtshon bya
NK034(ngi)007:106: thabs kyi rgyud dang mtshon byed thabs kyi rgyud gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:107: so mtshon bya rang gi ngo bo gcig rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:108: rang la gnas pa'i don mtshon byed rgyud ni rang
NK034(ngi)007:109: la gnas pa'i rig pa de rtogs par byed pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:110: tshig gi rgyud rnams so de rtogs byed rgyud don
NK034(ngi)007:111: rnam pa gsum re re la'ang ngo bo nges tshig
NK034(ngi)007:112: dbye ba gsum gyis yin pas ngo bo nges tshig
NK034(ngi)007:113: dbye ba'o mtshon bya'i ngo bo khyab pa ste rang
NK034(ngi)007:114: gi lus la lus can rnams la rig pa rang
NK034(ngi)007:115: chas su gnas phyir khyab dbye ba rnam pa gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:116: su bstan stong pas rig pa dngos med du khyab
NK034(ngi)007:117: dang gsal bas khyab rig pa dngos su 'od dang
NK034(ngi)007:118: bcas pa nges tshig stong pas rig pa des thams
NK034(ngi)007:119: cad la khyab phyir rgyud mtshon byed ngo bo rig
NK034(ngi)007:120: pa de rtogs byed dbye ba rnam pa gnyis yin
NK034(ngi)007:121: te 'bad pa med par rang dbang rab rtsol sgrub
NK034(ngi)007:122: bya mi dgos par bud+d+ha bar bstan grol dang 'bad
NK034(ngi)007:123: bcas grol ba gnyis 'bring man chad kyis tshig dang
NK034(ngi)007:124: bla ma'i gdams pa la brten nas nyams su blangs
NK034(ngi)007:125: te bud+d+ha'o // yin no 'bad med dbang po yang
NK034(ngi)007:126: rab gdams ngag bstan pa tsam gyis rtogs pa rnyed
NK034(ngi)007:127: nas grol ba'i phyir yin 'bad bcas grol ba rnam
NK034(ngi)007:128: pa gnyis bla ma'i tshig brgyud la ma brten par
NK034(ngi)007:129: gdams pas grol ba dang tshig gi rgyud kyis rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:130: rnams kyi gzhung don rgyas par bshad pas grol ba'o
NK034(ngi)007:131: nges pa'i tshig la rnam pa gnyis gzhi mtshon par
NK034(ngi)007:132: byed pa thabs yin te mtshon pa de yang tshig
NK034(ngi)007:133: tsam ste don gzhan nas btsal mi dgos par rgyun
NK034(ngi)007:134: du gnas pas rang la rgyud ces bya rang bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:135: rgyud la rnam gsum ste gzhi dang rang bzhin gyi
NK034(ngi)007:136: rgyud snying po rang bzhin gyi rgyud bcud rang bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:137: gyi rgyud yin no gzhi rgyud dngos po'i gnas lugs
NK034(ngi)007:138: thog ma'i ka dag te gzhi de yi ngo bo
NK034(ngi)007:139: rang bzhin stong par gnas sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed
NK034(ngi)007:140: pa'i yum de la brten nas 'byung bas dbye ba
NK034(ngi)007:141: rnam pa gsum yin no ngo bo mi 'gyur ba
NK034(ngi)007:142: rang bzhin gsal ba thugs rje'o khyab pa rgyud kyi
NK034(ngi)007:143: snying po snang srid 'khor 'das rnams de nyid ngo
NK034(ngi)007:144: bor rig pa la 'dus pa'o de nyid snying po
NK034(ngi)007:145: rang bzhin gyi rgyud kyi rgyud kyi ngo bo ni
NK034(ngi)007:146: snang ba rig pa nyid chos skur shar ba'o dbye
NK034(ngi)007:147: ba rnam pa gnyis su bstan snying po rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:148: snying por gyur pas nges pa'i ye shes te rang
NK034(ngi)007:149: gi lus la sku dang ye shes su rdzogs pa
NK034(ngi)007:150: dang snang ba 'byung bas khyab pas yul la rdzogs
NK034(ngi)007:151: pa'o nges tshig de la ma brten pa gang yang
NK034(ngi)007:152: med pas kun gyi srog dang 'dra snying po'i rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:153: kyi don ces rnam par bshad bcud kyi rgyud ni
NK034(ngi)007:154: don gyi ngo bo dwangs ma rnal 'byor pas nges
NK034(ngi)007:155: don mngon sum rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:156: dang chos sku'i sgron ma'o mthong ba'o ngo bo snying
NK034(ngi)007:157: po'i don rig pa'i bcud rnams sgron mar bsdus de
NK034(ngi)007:158: nyid ngo bo la gsum ste gsang ba'i tshig don
NK034(ngi)007:159: gsum sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi rig pa gcig
NK034(ngi)007:160: pur 'dus gcig bsdus pa'i ngo bo thams cad dbyings
NK034(ngi)007:161: rig mngon sum du mthong bas bcud phyungs pas snying
NK034(ngi)007:162: po rig pa rang gi ngo bo bsdus pa bcud
NK034(ngi)007:163: ces bya'o dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin te gzhi
NK034(ngi)007:164: chos sku longs sku sprul sku gzhi gzhi'i bcud skur
NK034(ngi)007:165: snang ba dang dang snying gzhi 'dzin pa'i rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:166: po'i bcud ye shes su gsal ba me tog gi
NK034(ngi)007:167: bcud sgron ma bzhi can de yang bcud kyi rang
NK034(ngi)007:168: bzhin de rang gi ngo bo ni ni snying po
NK034(ngi)007:169: gzhi las bsdus pas dwangs ma sku dang rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:170: sgron ma gsum nges tshig ye nas yod pa rang
NK034(ngi)007:171: bzhin babs kyis grub rang bzhin sems can kunala khyab
NK034(ngi)007:172: pas nyid kyi rgyud ces bya'o rgyud 'o na de
NK034(ngi)007:173: dag tha dad pa yin nam zhe na kyi rang
NK034(ngi)007:174: bzhin de dag rnams don rnams tha dad ma yin
NK034(ngi)007:175: te ngo bo gcig dper na skyes bu gcig la
NK034(ngi)007:176: ming mi 'dra ba mang po yod pa gang nas
NK034(ngi)007:177: bos kyang gcig pa bzhin gang zhig la ming ni
NK034(ngi)007:178: mang po yod gyur pa rgyu gcig gang nas bos
NK034(ngi)007:179: kyang 'ongs pa bzhin 'gyur med don yang gzhi gcig
NK034(ngi)007:180: la mtshon tshul tha dad du byung ba de bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:181: no don gyi rgyud rnams rig pa gtan la dbab
NK034(ngi)007:182: bshad pa'o tshig gi rgyud la rnam ngo bo nges
NK034(ngi)007:183: tshig dbye ba gsum ste ngo bo nges tshig dbye
NK034(ngi)007:184: ba'o ngo bo tshig de dang don 'brel nyams su
NK034(ngi)007:185: blang ba ba yis gang zag tshig gcig gis rtogs
NK034(ngi)007:186: pa'ang yod rgyud rnams grol bar byed skye ba'i go
NK034(ngi)007:187: rim dang 'jug pa'i go rim ji lta zhes pa
NK034(ngi)007:188: na ngo bo nyid ces de'i ngo bo go rim
NK034(ngi)007:189: shes pa la bya rnam bshad pa gsang don go
NK034(ngi)007:190: rim 'di lta ste rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rdzogs pa
NK034(ngi)007:191: rang byung dang yi ge med pa'i rgyud rnam gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:192: kyis chos rnams ngo bo gcig par bshad rtsa ba
NK034(ngi)007:193: gcig pa'i tshul du bshad rgyud ma rig pa rang
NK034(ngi)007:194: shar dang bu rig pa rang grol gnyis kyis ni
NK034(ngi)007:195: lo 'dab rtsa ba de las yal ga dang lo
NK034(ngi)007:196: ma gyes pa ltar rgyas pa'i tshul du bshad yan
NK034(ngi)007:197: lag rgyud chen rin chen spungs pa dang sku gdung
NK034(ngi)007:198: 'bar ba rnam gnyis kyis rgya mtshor gza' skar shar
NK034(ngi)007:199: bzhin snang la rang bzhin med par snang ba 'di
NK034(ngi)007:200: gtan la 'bebs bshad lung rig gsal ba'i rgyud sgra
NK034(ngi)007:201: thal 'gyur dang bkra shis mdzes ldan gnyis kyis me
NK034(ngi)007:202: tog kha bye ba'i tshul du gsal ba smin byed
NK034(ngi)007:203: dang bcas par bshad man ngag rgyud sde bzhi me
NK034(ngi)007:204: long gnyis ngo sprod sprad pa mu tig phreng ba
NK034(ngi)007:205: yis ni 'bras bu de nyid tshad du phyin pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:206: drod rtags dang bcas te smin pa'i tshul du bshad
NK034(ngi)007:207: dgongs pa rang gnas rgyud klong drug pa dang /
NK034(ngi)007:208: sgron ma 'bar ba nyi zla kha sbyor gsum gyis
NK034(ngi)007:209: mthong byed mig gi tshul du 'bras bu rgyur mi
NK034(ngi)007:210: ldog par bstan 'jug pa rang grol rgyud seng ge
NK034(ngi)007:211: rtsal rdzogs dang nor bu 'phra bkod gnyis kyis dran
NK034(ngi)007:212: gzhi snying gi tshul du nges don sna tshogs su
NK034(ngi)007:213: 'char ba bstan mkhas pa cho ga'i rgyud kyis ni
NK034(ngi)007:214: nag mo khros ma de dag gi bstan pa bsrung
NK034(ngi)007:215: ba'i don mel tshe byed pa'i tshul khyi ltar bshad
NK034(ngi)007:216: de ltar rgyud kyi ngo bo ni go rim rtsa
NK034(ngi)007:217: ba'i rgyud la sogs pa sde tshan rnam pa brgyad
NK034(ngi)007:218: dag gis gang zag gcig gi dbang po 'bring po
NK034(ngi)007:219: rnams kyi cha rkyen no dbye ba rnams pa bco
NK034(ngi)007:220: brgyad de rgya mtsho lta bu'i rgyud rig pa rang
NK034(ngi)007:221: shar dang ni nyi ma dang lta bu'i rgyud snying
NK034(ngi)007:222: gi me long seng ge dang lta bu'i rgyud seng
NK034(ngi)007:223: ge rtsal rdzogs ni ri rgyal dang lta bu rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:224: yi ge med pa 'khor lo lta bu'i rgyud bkra
NK034(ngi)007:225: shis mdzes ldan dang ni lde mig lta bu'i rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:226: sgra thal 'gyur dang ral gri lta bu'i rgyud kun
NK034(ngi)007:227: tu bzang po thugs kyi me long dang ni gsal
NK034(ngi)007:228: shing dang lta bu'i rgyud sgron ma 'bar ba gser
NK034(ngi)007:229: zhun lta bu'i rgyud nor bu 'phra bkod dang ni
NK034(ngi)007:230: ma bu 'brel nyi zla kha sbyor me long lta
NK034(ngi)007:231: bu'i rgyud ngo sprod spras pa dang ni mu tig
NK034(ngi)007:232: brgyus pa lta bu'i rgyud mu tig phreng ba sbrul
NK034(ngi)007:233: mdud lta bu'i rgyud rig pa rang grol dang ni
NK034(ngi)007:234: khyung chen lta bu'i rgyud klong drug pa dang chu
NK034(ngi)007:235: rgyun lta bu'i rgyud rdzogs pa rang byung dang ni
NK034(ngi)007:236: spu gri dang lta bu'i rgyud nag mo khros ma
NK034(ngi)007:237: rgyal po lta bu'i rgyud sku gdung 'bar ba dang
NK034(ngi)007:238: ni bang mdzod lta bu'i rgyud rin chen spungs pa
NK034(ngi)007:239: do nges tshig tshig res don re mtshon tshig re
NK034(ngi)007:240: re la don gyi go ba re skye ba'o //
NK034(ngi)007:241: ngo bo nyid ni de rtogs par byed rab mtshon
NK034(ngi)007:242: pa'o de dag rgyud de dag gi go ba rang
NK034(ngi)007:243: gang zhe na rnams kyi don go ni de ltar
NK034(ngi)007:244: rgyud chen bco brgyad rnams dbang po de yang rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:245: sde ni ltar kha gegs sel gyi rgyud dang gab
NK034(ngi)007:246: pa mngon phyung gi rgyud dang thig le spros bral
NK034(ngi)007:247: gyi rgyud do tha ma'i don rnams su rnam par
NK034(ngi)007:248: phye ste bstan pa'o dbang po 'bring po rnams la
NK034(ngi)007:249: 'di lta ste rtsa ba'i rgyud gnyis dang yan lag
NK034(ngi)007:250: rgyud chen gnyis bshad rgyud ma bu gnyis lung rig
NK034(ngi)007:251: gsal ba'i rgyud gnyis dgongs pa rang gnas kyi rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:252: gsum man ngag rgyud chen rnam pa bzhi 'jug pa
NK034(ngi)007:253: rang grol gyi rgyud gnyis cho ga'i rgyud gcig rnams
NK034(ngi)007:254: gang zag dbang 'bring gcig gi cha rkyen du spros
NK034(ngi)007:255: pa med pa'i spros pa nyung ba rnams la dga'
NK034(ngi)007:256: ba'i don du tshul du bstan rab tu shin tu
NK034(ngi)007:257: spros pa med pa'i blo gyur pa rnams la ni
NK034(ngi)007:258: thabs kyi rgyud dang rang bzhin rgyud de la gzhi
NK034(ngi)007:259: dngos po'i gnas lugs mtshon bya thabs kyi rgyud mtshon
NK034(ngi)007:260: byed de mtshon par byed pa'i tshig dang bla ma'i
NK034(ngi)007:261: gdams pa'o // thabs kyi rgyud dang gnyis rang bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:262: la ni dbye na rnam gsum ste gzhi yi rang
NK034(ngi)007:263: bzhin gyi rgyud dang snying po'i rgyud bcud nyid chos
NK034(ngi)007:264: sku dang 'du 'bral med pa rang bzhin rgyud dang
NK034(ngi)007:265: lnga thabs kyi rgyud la gnyis rang bzhin rgyud gsum
NK034(ngi)007:266: ste shin tu spros med rnams bsdus pa dag la
NK034(ngi)007:267: dga' ba don no du'o blo yang rab mchog tu
NK034(ngi)007:268: gyur pa la mtshon byed tshig gi rgyud dang gnas
NK034(ngi)007:269: lugs kyi rig pa don gyi rgyud rnam pa gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:270: su der ma 'dus pa gang yang med bsdus te
NK034(ngi)007:271: bstan de ni bco brgyad du dbye ba spros pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:272: blo can dang spros pa med pa'i sde tshan brgyad
NK034(ngi)007:273: du bsdus pa blo can dang rgyud lngar bsdus te
NK034(ngi)007:274: shin tu spros pa med pa dang gnyis su bsdus
NK034(ngi)007:275: te rab tu spros med rnams kyi don rnam par
NK034(ngi)007:276: phye ste bshad par bya shin tu yang spros pa
NK034(ngi)007:277: la dga' ba la spros par dga' ba la 'di
NK034(ngi)007:278: dag rnams kyang rgyud re re rang gzhung du rnam
NK034(ngi)007:279: par dbye tshig rgyud gsal ba'i rim pa yis spyi
NK034(ngi)007:280: yi don dang go yul ni rgyud re re la
NK034(ngi)007:281: yang bdun bdun te ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba
NK034(ngi)007:282: dang dgos don dang ni mtshon dpe dang khong bcud
NK034(ngi)007:283: man ngag ji tsam re ston pa man ngag le'u
NK034(ngi)007:284: grangs dang bdun no bdun po dag tu shes par
NK034(ngi)007:285: bya de nyid gdams yul gang zag gi blo'i bye
NK034(ngi)007:286: brag rnam pa bzhi tha snyad la dga' ba'i spros
NK034(ngi)007:287: pa can gyi blo can dang de bzhin de bas
NK034(ngi)007:288: tha snyad chung ba spros pa med pa dang shin
NK034(ngi)007:289: tu spros pa med pa'i blo can dang rab tu
NK034(ngi)007:290: spros med rnam pa'i blo can bzhi la rgyud don
NK034(ngi)007:291: tshig rgyud dang bsdus rgyud dang don rgyud lnga dang
NK034(ngi)007:292: don gnyis su bsdus pa ste rnam pa bzhir bsdus
NK034(ngi)007:293: te nges pa'i lung du bshad par bya spros pa
NK034(ngi)007:294: la dga' ba can gyi blo rnams la tshig rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:295: bco brgyad po'i don gyi rim pa gsal phye nas
NK034(ngi)007:296: rgyud don bco brgyad rang shar la sogs pa re
NK034(ngi)007:297: re'i dbye ba rnams rim pa 'di ltar shes par
NK034(ngi)007:298: bya i ti rgya rgya rgya bshad pa'i rgyud chen
NK034(ngi)007:299: rig pa rang shar de nyid la rang gi gnas
NK034(ngi)007:300: lugs la bya tshig don rnam pa bdun gyis ngo
NK034(ngi)007:301: bo nges tshig dbye ba dang rgyud de la dgos
NK034(ngi)007:302: pa ji lta bu yod pa dang dpe ji lta
NK034(ngi)007:303: bu yin pa dang de'i nang nas man ngag gi
NK034(ngi)007:304: don go gang bstan pa dang le'u du yod pa'o
NK034(ngi)007:305: gdams pa'o // // bstan ngo bo rig pa'i ye
NK034(ngi)007:306: shes so nges tshig don ni rnam gsum ste rig
NK034(ngi)007:307: pa zhes bya gzhi gnas te dngos po gshis la
NK034(ngi)007:308: bya ngo bo de dri ma dang bral ba'i ngos
NK034(ngi)007:309: nas ka dag ye shes so rang zhes bya bar
NK034(ngi)007:310: rang ngo rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi
NK034(ngi)007:311: sku ste snang la rang bzhin med ngo nas rang
NK034(ngi)007:312: bzhin lhun grub ye shes so shar zhes bya ba
NK034(ngi)007:313: rig pa kun la khyab pas snang ba ste thugs
NK034(ngi)007:314: rje kun khyab snang ba sna tshogs su 'char ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:315: ngos nas ye shes so rgyud de'i dbye ba rnam
NK034(ngi)007:316: pa bzhi yin te rang rig de yang glo bur
NK034(ngi)007:317: du byas pa lta bu ma yin te ye nas
NK034(ngi)007:318: gnas pas ye nas rang shar dang nyams su blangs
NK034(ngi)007:319: pas dbyings dang rig pa 'du 'bral med pas /
NK034(ngi)007:320: dus na rang shar dang yul rkyen nam mkha' bag
NK034(ngi)007:321: rdul dengs pa dang phrad pa'i tshe phrad tshe rang
NK034(ngi)007:322: shar dang bar do'i yul la lus bor ba dang
NK034(ngi)007:323: rang gi rig pa'i snang ba lhug par shar ba'o
NK034(ngi)007:324: rang shar ro rig pa rang shar ming du btags
NK034(ngi)007:325: pa tsam po 'di zhes bya ba'i tshig tu bkod
NK034(ngi)007:326: pa'i rgyud mtshon tshul tsam tshig tu byung ba de
NK034(ngi)007:327: la dgos pa'i don de la dgos pa ji lta
NK034(ngi)007:328: bu zhe na ni gang zhe na dbang po rtul
NK034(ngi)007:329: po'i gang zag tshig la yid ches byed pa rnams
NK034(ngi)007:330: brjod bya'i tshig la dga' la re ba'i dus yid
NK034(ngi)007:331: ches pas sgra don 'jug pa'i dgos pa'o rtogs par
NK034(ngi)007:332: byed pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi mtshan gyis ngo bo rtogs
NK034(ngi)007:333: par byed pa'o dpe ji lta bu zhe na mthun
NK034(ngi)007:334: chos rnam pa gsum rgya mtsho che ba gting zab
NK034(ngi)007:335: pa gzugs gsal bar byed pa dang 'dra bar brjod
NK034(ngi)007:337: tshig don man ngag zab mo gting dpag dka' ba dang /
NK034(ngi)007:338: theg pa gzhan gyi don 'di nas gsal bar byed pa'o //
NK034(ngi)007:339: ldan te brjod bya rgya mtsho lta bur bstan khong
NK034(ngi)007:340: bcud man ngag rnam lnga ste sku yi don gsum
NK034(ngi)007:341: gyi bstan ye shes gsum bstan lta sgom spyod gsum
NK034(ngi)007:342: pa'i man ngag bstan chos sku rig pa rang gi
NK034(ngi)007:343: gnad gzir ba de yul nam mkha' spros med rig
NK034(ngi)007:344: pa'i gnad longs sku rig pa rang gi ngo bo
NK034(ngi)007:345: gzir ba de rdo rje lu gu rgyud zang thal
NK034(ngi)007:346: rang gi gnad sprul sku rig pa'i rtsal sgron ma
NK034(ngi)007:347: gzir ba ste mig nam mkhar kun khyab shar ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:348: gnad ye shes gsum gyi mtshan nyid nges tshig skabs
NK034(ngi)007:349: su ste gang zag rnam pa spros bcas spros med
NK034(ngi)007:350: shin tu spros med rab tu spros med bzhi dag
NK034(ngi)007:351: la spros bcas rnams la ye shes ni nyi shu
NK034(ngi)007:352: rtsa lnga'i dbye rang shar las bshad pa'o //
NK034(ngi)007:353: ba rnams spros pa can gyi don du'o khyad par
NK034(ngi)007:354: chos dabyingangasa ye shes la sogs ye shes lnga don
NK034(ngi)007:355: ni spros med rnams tha snyad spangs pa kyi don
NK034(ngi)007:356: du'o gzhi gnas ye shes rnam gsum ngo bo ka
NK034(ngi)007:357: dag gi ye shes rang bzhin lhun grub kyi ye
NK034(ngi)007:358: shes thugs rje kun khyab kyi ye shes so //
NK034(ngi)007:359: ni shin tu spros med rnams la'o nyag gcig gsal
NK034(ngi)007:360: thig le nyag gcig ni rang gi sgron ma gsal
NK034(ngi)007:361: ba'o // ba'i ye shes ni rab tu tshig gi
NK034(ngi)007:362: zhen pa chod pa spros med nyid la'o lta ba
NK034(ngi)007:363: rnam pa gnyis yin te chos can lta dang ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:364: lta ba chos nyid lta pa'i lta ba'o //
NK034(ngi)007:365: lha dang theg pa'i dang po mi sogs lung ma
NK034(ngi)007:366: bstan rtag chad mu stegs rtag chad du 'dzin pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:367: sgo nas khyad med mthar 'dzin phyi pa dang a
NK034(ngi)007:368: nu man chad rang 'dod zhe 'dod zhugs pas chos
NK034(ngi)007:369: can nyid la phyi'i yul gtan la 'bebs 'bebs nas
NK034(ngi)007:370: lta lta nas chos nyid nang sems nyid ma mthong
NK034(ngi)007:371: bas don la rdul reg med a ti sems sde
NK034(ngi)007:372: klong sde man ngag gi sde gzhan rnam pa kha
NK034(ngi)007:373: cig gis 'di nyid phyogs tsam mthong ba med rang
NK034(ngi)007:374: gi ngo bo de nyid rdzogs pa chen po thig
NK034(ngi)007:375: le'i bskor phyi skor dang nang skor dang gsang skor
NK034(ngi)007:376: gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud sde lnga yan lag gi bzhi
NK034(ngi)007:377: lung sde drug sogs bas kyang 'di nyid don la
NK034(ngi)007:378: reg dngos gzhi de la pa med de phyir gsang
NK034(ngi)007:379: chen bla na med pa'i man ngag gi lta 'di
NK034(ngi)007:380: gzhan gyis ma rtogs pas shin tu gsang ba'o byas
NK034(ngi)007:381: pa med pa'i lta ba ye nas gnas pa'i rig
NK034(ngi)007:382: pa la lta byed med pa'i yul nam mkha'i ngang
NK034(ngi)007:383: du mig gi rten sgron ma mig gis mthong byung
NK034(ngi)007:384: ba med pa'i gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa
NK034(ngi)007:385: rig pa nyid thob pa'i ye nas rtogs par yod
NK034(ngi)007:386: de phral rnyed min rgyu med rang zhes bya yul
NK034(ngi)007:387: nam mkha' la snang ba rdo rje lu gu rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:388: de nyid shar de phyir lta ba mthong byed du
NK034(ngi)007:389: yod pas mig dang 'brel sgom pa zhes bya rnam
NK034(ngi)007:390: gsum sgom pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang dgongs pa'o
NK034(ngi)007:391: // ste sgom pa de nyid sems 'dzin ting 'dzin
NK034(ngi)007:392: mnyam rjes dang dgongs pa bsam gtan zhes bya gsum
NK034(ngi)007:393: du bstan sgom pa de nyid lha dang mi yi
NK034(ngi)007:394: sems 'dzin te mtshan ma a dkar la sems bzung
NK034(ngi)007:395: ba sogs rim rtsol blo yi rim pa nyid a
NK034(ngi)007:396: nu man chad theg pa brgyad po'i brgyad po'i gzhung
NK034(ngi)007:397: dngos po'i gnas lugs mi rtog ye shes chen po
NK034(ngi)007:398: la bcu drug char yang nye ba med rang bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:399: sprul pa'i zhing khams su yang mi nye byas chos
NK034(ngi)007:400: blo'i chos yin ting 'dzin zhes bya blo bzhag ste
NK034(ngi)007:401: sems kyi gnas pa la gnas par bya ba blos
NK034(ngi)007:402: byas mnyam gzhag rjes 'dzin pas sems nyid ma rtogs
NK034(ngi)007:403: pa a ti sems phyogs pa cha 'ga' yi gzhung
NK034(ngi)007:404: de nyid nyams su len pa bsgom pa'i sgom chen
NK034(ngi)007:405: pa rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i gnas lugs dngos
NK034(ngi)007:406: po gshis kyi 'dug tshul la lhun grub kyi phyogs
NK034(ngi)007:407: tsam yang ma rtogs pas rdul phran brgyar bshags char
NK034(ngi)007:408: mi nye dgongs pa nyid kyi chu rgyun 'dra rgyun
NK034(ngi)007:409: chad med par skye dgos pa yin mnyam par bzhag
NK034(ngi)007:410: pa'i tshe gsal du med dang langs pa yis mi
NK034(ngi)007:411: gsal ba'i rgyu med ye shes kyi lam la 'gro
NK034(ngi)007:412: dang rtog med kyi ngang du nyal dang gnas lugs
NK034(ngi)007:413: kyi thog tu 'dug pa spyod pa ci byed kyang
NK034(ngi)007:414: 'bral ba med dang za dang 'thung bde ba nyams
NK034(ngi)007:415: su myong dang gdod ma'i gshis su 'chags pa dang
NK034(ngi)007:416: ngo bo'i rtsal snang glal dang ye shes rgyun du
NK034(ngi)007:417: sbrid dang rang byung rten med glo lu dang 'di
NK034(ngi)007:418: nyid dus thams cad du bral ba ma yin te
NK034(ngi)007:419: 'di nyid rang yin nyin dang mtshan mo 'khor 'das
NK034(ngi)007:420: su phye ba med dran gzhi ngo bo gcig tsit+ta'i
NK034(ngi)007:421: dkyil 'khor du dper na bum pa'i mar me bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:422: rang gsal du bsam rgyun zad gzhi gnas pas pas
NK034(ngi)007:423: rig pa nyid dran byed 'dzin pa nub pas 'gags
NK034(ngi)007:424: pas rang zhes bya rgyun du de'i thog nas gnas
NK034(ngi)007:425: pas shar ba'o de phyir sgom pa snying dang 'brel
NK034(ngi)007:426: lus gnad sku dang ye shes spyod pa rtsol bcas
NK034(ngi)007:427: dang rtsol med rnam pa gnyis yin te rtsol bcas
NK034(ngi)007:428: theg pa gzhan gyi blo yi spyod pa dang rtsol
NK034(ngi)007:429: med rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba dbang bsgyur ro
NK034(ngi)007:430: rtsol bcas rnams ni gzhan rim dgu don no rtsol
NK034(ngi)007:431: med rang grol du shes pa'i rtsal rang shar spyod
NK034(ngi)007:432: pa ni 'dzin pa rang grol gyi spyod pa bu
NK034(ngi)007:433: chung shes pa ji bzhin du snang ba snang yang
NK034(ngi)007:434: zhen pa'i rtog pa chod pa thad ka'i rkyen zhen
NK034(ngi)007:435: bral lu gu rgyud la ngo bo cir yang ma
NK034(ngi)007:436: grub kyang rang bzhin 'od dang thig le dang sku
NK034(ngi)007:438: rtag tu lta de dang 'bral ba med pa ni
NK034(ngi)007:439: rang snang snang ba mthong yang don rang snang du
NK034(ngi)007:440: mthong bas zhen med spyod pa ste shes rig gsal
NK034(ngi)007:441: ba rig pa'i ngang shes pa rang sor gnas pa
NK034(ngi)007:442: gzhan nas ma byung ye nas de ltar yod pa
NK034(ngi)007:443: yin rang zhes bya khyab gdal 'dzin med snang ba
NK034(ngi)007:444: sna tshogs su shar zhing sna tshogs su grol ba'o
NK034(ngi)007:445: // rang grol bas dbyings dang rig pa 'du 'bral
NK034(ngi)007:446: med pa snying po'i yul la shar zhes bya a
NK034(ngi)007:447: nu man chad rim blo yis 'di nyid rtogs pa
NK034(ngi)007:448: gang yang med ma chags snang ba spang len dang
NK034(ngi)007:450: zhen pa'i spyod pa'o chags la snang ba rang grol
NK034(ngi)007:451: bas zhen med spyod pa ni 'di nyid gdams pa
NK034(ngi)007:452: shes pas mthong ba'i rnal 'byor ro de phyir rnal
NK034(ngi)007:453: 'byor spyod pa gnad du 'gro mi 'gro brtag ni
NK034(ngi)007:454: yan lag lus kyi gnad rnams dang 'brel ba'o de
NK034(ngi)007:455: yi phyir na gdams yul ni rnam pa gsum du
NK034(ngi)007:456: 'dus pa yin 'dug stangs lus kyi gnad dang yul
NK034(ngi)007:457: gyi gnad sprin dang bral ba rig pa sgron ma'i
NK034(ngi)007:458: gnad mi 'gul ba gnyis dang 'brel yin no le'u
NK034(ngi)007:459: brgyad cu rtsa drug gis gzhung don tshig rnams rdzogs
NK034(ngi)007:460: par bstan pa'o i ti rgya rgya rgya rdo rje
NK034(ngi)007:461: sems dpa' snying gi yang don bdun du shes par
NK034(ngi)007:462: bya me long zhes bya'i rgyud la ni ngo bo
NK034(ngi)007:463: snying po'i rig pa rang gi ye shes bcud rnams
NK034(ngi)007:464: 'dus nges tshig bla ma'i gdams pas rnam pa bzhi
NK034(ngi)007:465: yin te stong pa rig pa dngos med zang thal
NK034(ngi)007:466: sra mkhregs rdo rje'o tshig don de nyid las tshig
NK034(ngi)007:467: thams cad 'byung bas du ma mtshon byed pa sems
NK034(ngi)007:468: dpa' zhes dran bsam sna tshogs su shar ba de
NK034(ngi)007:469: yang rang sar grol bar bstan ni rnam par bshad
NK034(ngi)007:470: snying ni bcud rnams 'dus pa'o yul nam mkha' la
NK034(ngi)007:471: la snang ba'i rig pa de mig gi dbang po
NK034(ngi)007:472: ma 'gags pas lta bar byed pas me long ngo
NK034(ngi)007:473: dbye na don du dang ldan na rnam pa gsum
NK034(ngi)007:474: yin no gzhi rig pa gsal cha ma 'gags pas
NK034(ngi)007:475: mtshon pa gzhi yi me long dang mtshon byed tshig
NK034(ngi)007:476: gi rdo rje de mtshon bla ma'i gdams pa dang
NK034(ngi)007:477: rig ngo snying dang rig pa sna tshogs su snang
NK034(ngi)007:478: ba sems su 'brel dgos pa rgyud rnams gzhan gyi
NK034(ngi)007:479: ni khong gi snying med ro dang 'dra bas snying
NK034(ngi)007:480: dang 'dra bar bstan snying med lus kyi stobs med
NK034(ngi)007:481: bzhin dper na mkha' la nyi shar bas mtha' yi
NK034(ngi)007:482: mun pa sel ba dang 'dra bar ma rig pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:483: mun pa sel bzhin khong don man ngo sprod dang
NK034(ngi)007:484: ye shes dbang po ngag rnam gsum ste ngo sprod
NK034(ngi)007:485: nyi shu'i dpes gtan la dbab pa bstan dmigs bstan
NK034(ngi)007:486: dang dbang po'i bye brag nyi shu rtsa gcig ye
NK034(ngi)007:487: shes bzhi dang nyi shu rtsa gcig sgron ma bzhi'i
NK034(ngi)007:488: snang ba nyid nyams su len pa'i gnad bstan to
NK034(ngi)007:489: ngo sprod rnam pa gsum yin te 'od la sprad
NK034(ngi)007:490: pa rig pa la 'od yod tshul gtan la 'bebs
NK034(ngi)007:491: rnam pa bdun ye shes bdun te rig pa de
NK034(ngi)007:492: nyid ye shes su snang lugs gtan la 'bebs rig
NK034(ngi)007:493: pa rang gi ngo bo gtan la 'bebs bdun de
NK034(ngi)007:494: ltar nyi shu rtsa gcig gis don gyi ngo bo
NK034(ngi)007:495: rig pa gtan la dbab mtshon pa'o de ltar rnam
NK034(ngi)007:496: pa mang bshad spros bcas yin par bstan kyang mdo
NK034(ngi)007:497: don gsum du 'dus 'di dag nyid yin no chos
NK034(ngi)007:498: sku ngo sprod rang la thog ma nas 'di ltar
NK034(ngi)007:499: gnas zhes pa'i gdams ngag gis gzhi nyid lu gu
NK034(ngi)007:500: rgyud nam mkha' la mngon sum lam du byed longs
NK034(ngi)007:501: sku ngo sprod rig pa de yang rgyan sna tshogs
NK034(ngi)007:502: dang ldan par bstan pa'i gdams ngag gis rig pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:503: 'od khyim rig pa'i snang ba gtan la dbab pa'o
NK034(ngi)007:504: mkha' la dbyung sprul sku ngo sprod snang ba chig
NK034(ngi)007:505: chod du shes pa'i gdams ngag gis 'khrul snang rang
NK034(ngi)007:506: grol zhe sdang nyid zhe sdang gis grol ba sogs
NK034(ngi)007:507: nyid du bstan dbang po rab bdun 'bring bdun tha
NK034(ngi)007:508: ma bdun la bdun bdun dag ste rtsa gcig go
NK034(ngi)007:509: ye shes snang ba bzhi yin te gzhi 'dzin pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:510: ye shes gsum rdo rje ste mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:511: ye shes lnga sems dpa' 'o lam snang ba'i ye
NK034(ngi)007:512: shes nyi shu rtsa gcig sgron ma lnga snying spros
NK034(ngi)007:513: bral thig le yin lugs gtan la dbab pa'o //
NK034(ngi)007:514: nyag gcig me long yin de phyir gnad bzhi dag
NK034(ngi)007:515: gis ni gnad du 'gro mi 'gro lta 'di nyid
NK034(ngi)007:516: man ngag nyams su len rdo rje rig pa skye
NK034(ngi)007:517: 'jig dang bral ba rig pa'i gnad du bstan sems
NK034(ngi)007:518: dpa' yul nyid 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul du ma shar
NK034(ngi)007:519: yang nam mkha' la rang zhi ba ltar rig pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:521: nam mkha'i gnad lus kyi sgra dang ye shes med
NK034(ngi)007:522: pa'o gnad ni sku dang ye shes yod pa'o snying
NK034(ngi)007:523: yin no me long la bzhin shar ba dang 'dra
NK034(ngi)007:524: bar nam mkha' la sgron ma mthong ba'o //
NK034(ngi)007:525: sgron ma mthong ba'i gnad de ltar gnad bzhi zin
NK034(ngi)007:526: pa 'di rig pa'i rang ngo shes shes pa'o le'u
NK034(ngi)007:527: brgyad kyi gzhung don rdzogs i ti rgya rgya rgya
NK034(ngi)007:528: seng ge rtsal rdzogs gnad kyi don la bdun te
NK034(ngi)007:529: / ngo bo lta ba'i gnad gsum rdzogs lus gnad
NK034(ngi)007:530: 'dug stangs yul gnad nam mkha' sprin med rig pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:531: gnad shes pa ma 'gul ba rgyud kyi nges tshig
NK034(ngi)007:532: rnam pa gsum yin te gzhan gyis 'jigs bral theg
NK034(ngi)007:533: pa gzhan dang rgyud gzhan las khyad par du byung
NK034(ngi)007:534: bas seng ge ste 'khrul snang lta ba'i rang rtsal
NK034(ngi)007:535: gyis 'khrul ba rang grol du zil gnon rtsal du
NK034(ngi)007:536: snang gnad lus kyi gnad mig yul gyi gnad nam
NK034(ngi)007:537: mkha' ye shes kyi gnad sgron ma ste de ltar
NK034(ngi)007:538: lta ba'i gnad dang sgom pa'i gnad dang spyod pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:539: gnad gsum rang la rdzogs pa'i phyir rdzogs zhes rnam
NK034(ngi)007:540: par bshad pa'o rgyud dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin
NK034(ngi)007:541: te lta byed yul gyi rtsal rdzogs dbyings dang rig
NK034(ngi)007:542: pa 'du 'bral med par gnas pa la bya dang
NK034(ngi)007:543: mthong byed ngos zin rtsal rdzogs dang dbyings dang rig
NK034(ngi)007:544: pa sgron ma gsum bar snang du zin pas snying
NK034(ngi)007:545: po'i bcud gsum mthong ba'i tshad dang goms pa'i tshad
NK034(ngi)007:546: brtan pa'i tshad dang gsum rtsal rdzogs so dgos don
NK034(ngi)007:547: de la dgos pa ci yod na rgyud rnams gzhan
NK034(ngi)007:548: gyi tshig don rnams lta bar byed pas mig dang
NK034(ngi)007:549: 'dra dpe ni dper na ri rgyal rtser phyin na
NK034(ngi)007:550: mthon po'i kha nas bltas na thams cad mthong ba
NK034(ngi)007:551: dang 'dra bar dma' ba'i lung rnams mthong ba bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:552: theg pa 'og ma'i 'og ma'i rgyud don ji bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:553: mthong 'og mas gong ma rgyud gzhan gyi man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:554: rnams 'di nyid nas gsal bas gzhan gyis 'di nyid
NK034(ngi)007:555: rtogs pa min mthong ba med 'di nas man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:556: ji lta bu ston zhe na khong don man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:557: rnam gsum ste dgongs pa'i gnad thig le mthong ba
NK034(ngi)007:558: la sogs lnga dang lta ba'i phugs dbyings rig gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:559: med nyams su blang ba'i mthong ba dang goms pa
NK034(ngi)007:560: dang tshad rnams bstan pa la sogs bstan dgongs don
NK034(ngi)007:561: man ngag rnam pa lnga thig ler mthong sogs dgongs
NK034(ngi)007:562: pa ni rgyud na rtsal rdzogs rang gi nang gsal
NK034(ngi)007:563: bas der shes bya lta ba'i don ni rnam pa
NK034(ngi)007:564: gnyis su bstan yul la lta phyi yi yul lnga
NK034(ngi)007:565: ma yin par nang du yul la lta dang ngo
NK034(ngi)007:566: bo nyid la lta rig pa'i gdangs ma yin par
NK034(ngi)007:567: rig pa'i ngo bo la lta ba'o //
NK034(ngi)007:568: yul la lta ba phyi yul nam mkha' dang nas
NK034(ngi)007:569: dbyings kyi sgron ma'o ngo bo nyid ni rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:570: rdo rje lu gu rgyud dbyings rig 'du 'bral med
NK034(ngi)007:571: par nam mkha'i khams su bzung ba dang mthong shes
NK034(ngi)007:572: nas 'gyur med gzer chen tshad chen po gsum gyi
NK034(ngi)007:573: drod rtags mthar phyin pas 'phrad zin pa'o //
NK034(ngi)007:574: thebs pas 'bral ba med de phyir dbyings khang pa
NK034(ngi)007:575: 'dra ba'i nang de'i bdag po dang 'dra ba'i rig
NK034(ngi)007:576: pa nyid 'phyo ba chags pa med pa'i yid kyis
NK034(ngi)007:577: gzer bar snang du shes pa gtad pas btab nas
NK034(ngi)007:578: mthong rig gsal ba rang gi ngo bo mthong ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:580: cer mthong dgongs pa lta ba 'o nyams blang pa
NK034(ngi)007:581: mthar phyin tshad ni rnam gsum ste mthong ba'i tshad
NK034(ngi)007:582: gsum dang goms pa'i tshad gsum brtan pa'i tshad la
NK034(ngi)007:583: yang dang gsum du bstan rig pa'i yul lam rang
NK034(ngi)007:584: bzhin mthong ba'i tshad ni 'od yin te mi 'gyur
NK034(ngi)007:585: mthing kha dbyings kyi tshad dbyings rnam par dag pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:586: sgron ma yi ge na ro la brten rig pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:587: rten bca' zlum 'khyil gsal ba rma bya'i mdongs lta
NK034(ngi)007:588: bu rtsa ltems pas rang shar ba sgron ma'i tshad
NK034(ngi)007:589: 'phra dang 'gyu ba rig pa'i tshad rdo rje lu
NK034(ngi)007:590: gu rgyud kyi mthong ba'i mig gi dus su shes
NK034(ngi)007:591: par bya goms de la nyams su blangs pa'i stobs
NK034(ngi)007:592: pa'i tshad ni rnam gsum ste mthing kha dbyings rnam
NK034(ngi)007:593: par dag pa'i sgron ma las rgya cher mched kha
NK034(ngi)007:594: dog lnga mig las bar snang gi thad kar khru
NK034(ngi)007:595: gang tsam du snang ba ni dang po rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:596: yul la goms pa'i tshad yin no de nas de
NK034(ngi)007:597: la rab 'dris nas de yang ther zug tu nyams
NK034(ngi)007:598: su blangs pas re lde'ii gru bzhi'i rnam pa'am yang
NK034(ngi)007:599: na yul ji ltar yod pa'i dbyibs lta bu rnam
NK034(ngi)007:600: pa tsam 'char bas de la rab tu goms pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:601: tshad de ma 'gyur bar nyams su blangs pas de
NK034(ngi)007:602: nas yul lung pa de nyid kyi gru 'am mda'
NK034(ngi)007:603: rgyang gang tshun chod tsam du ste de la mchog
NK034(ngi)007:604: tu goms de nyid las mi 'gyur bar bltas pas
NK034(ngi)007:605: ni snang ba mig gis mthong tshad thams cad 'od
NK034(ngi)007:606: snang du shar ba dbyings pa goms pa'i tshad zin
NK034(ngi)007:607: pa'o zlum 'khyil thig le stong sgron las ni za
NK034(ngi)007:608: 'og ris rang gi sna rtse mtho gang gi sar
NK034(ngi)007:609: la shar na dang po sgron ma nyid la dang
NK034(ngi)007:610: por bslab pa goms pa'i tshad yin no de las
NK034(ngi)007:611: gyen du smin ma'i mtshams thig le che chung me
NK034(ngi)007:612: long tsam du gsal gyur na bar du goms pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:613: tshad yin no snang ba 'od kyis gar khyab par
NK034(ngi)007:614: thams cad thig le ru shar nas bya dkar mo
NK034(ngi)007:615: gdangs la dkyus pa bzhin du krig ger gnas pa
NK034(ngi)007:616: na mchog tu goms pa'i tshad yin no de la
NK034(ngi)007:617: bslab pas gzhan med do rig pa'i ngo bo lu
NK034(ngi)007:618: gu rgyud 'dab chags phug ron 'phur rkyen tsam gyur
NK034(ngi)007:619: na dang po snang ba la goms pa'i tshad yin
NK034(ngi)007:620: no de nas de nyid la ma 'gul ba gsum
NK034(ngi)007:621: gyis rab tu nyams blangs nas ri dwags bang sha
NK034(ngi)007:622: ba spang rtsibs la rgyug pa'i dang mnyam pa tsam
NK034(ngi)007:623: ni bar du goms snga ma las brtan pa pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:624: tshad yin no de nyid yang dang yang mi 'gul
NK034(ngi)007:625: ba gsum dang 'brel bar bltas na bung ba me
NK034(ngi)007:626: tog gi bcud la 'khor ba tsam 'di ni bogs
NK034(ngi)007:627: dbyung ba de nas mig gis bltas pa'i sa der
NK034(ngi)007:628: sdod gyur na mchog tu snang ba dang goms pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:629: dang 'dres pa tshad yin no shin tu yang dag
NK034(ngi)007:630: goms pa'i tshad 'gul ni rig pa ye shes kyi
NK034(ngi)007:631: rlung chun pa'i rtags dang 'phrigs pa med pa dang
NK034(ngi)007:632: nyin dang gsal ba dang mtshan mo mi gsal ba
NK034(ngi)007:633: ma yin par dus rgyun du med snang na rab
NK034(ngi)007:634: tu goms pa'i tshad thebs pa zhes bya ba yin
NK034(ngi)007:635: no lus kyi skur snang lu gu rgyud tshigs dang
NK034(ngi)007:636: 'dra ba'i bar dag tu ye shes kyi rtsal smin
NK034(ngi)007:637: pas gzer thebs pa zhes bya'o //
NK034(ngi)007:638: thig le nyung 'bru tsam nang du sku ni shin
NK034(ngi)007:639: tu phra shar dang thig le re re'i nang du
NK034(ngi)007:640: sku re re shar bas smin pa ste dper na
NK034(ngi)007:641: sgo nga la bye'u phrug brdol ba dang 'dra'o //
NK034(ngi)007:642: snang ba thams cad skur shar na rig pa sku
NK034(ngi)007:643: gsum gnyis med du 'dres pa zhes bya brtan pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:644: tshad yin no sa chu me rlung 'di ltar snang
NK034(ngi)007:645: ba thams cad sku dang ye shes su byung ste
NK034(ngi)007:646: snang ba dang 'byung bzhi'i snang ba sa rdo ri
NK034(ngi)007:647: brag dang skyes pa bud med sogs 'gags gyur nas
NK034(ngi)007:648: kha dog lnga dbyings rig 'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs
NK034(ngi)007:649: pa yi 'od snang gis gang yul bltas pa der
NK034(ngi)007:650: snang na dbyings ni 'byung ba bzhi rang sar zhi
NK034(ngi)007:651: ste chos nya dal gzer thebs pas brtan pa'i tshad
NK034(ngi)007:652: yin no rang lus 'od kyi rang gi lus kyang
NK034(ngi)007:653: 'od du snang ba'i spyi bo'i steng du /
NK034(ngi)007:654: steng dag tu 'khar gzhong kha sbubs pa lta bu
NK034(ngi)007:655: dgu brtsegs su brtsegs pa lta bu yi thig le
NK034(ngi)007:656: brtsegs ma gcig gi steng du gcig byung na sgron
NK034(ngi)007:657: ma smin pa'i tshad yin no //
NK034(ngi)007:658: gyen shar na sgron ma brtan pa'i tshad yin no
NK034(ngi)007:659: de nyid mthong ba lta dang mi 'bral ba sgom
NK034(ngi)007:660: pa nyams gong nas gong du 'phel te de dang
NK034(ngi)007:661: 'dres pas spyod pa yin yin ngag sngags dang phyag
NK034(ngi)007:662: rgya nyid lus kyi kyang ngo bskyed rim gyis 'char
NK034(ngi)007:663: ba dang rdzogs pa cer mthong du snang ba de
NK034(ngi)007:664: nyid do le'u bcu gsum dag rgyud kyi gzhung tshig
NK034(ngi)007:665: gis ni gzhung gi tshad rnams rdzogs pa'o a ti
NK034(ngi)007:666: rgya gsang ba yi ge med pa'i rtags kyi yi
NK034(ngi)007:667: ge med pa la zer ram brjod pa'i yi ge
NK034(ngi)007:668: med pa la zer ram dngos po gshis la yi
NK034(ngi)007:669: ge med zer brjod pa bzang ngan med du brjod
NK034(ngi)007:670: pa bzang ngan shugs las byung ba med zer na
NK034(ngi)007:671: shog bu'i yi ge med pa lta bu la zer
NK034(ngi)007:672: ram shog bu la yi ge bkod pa lta bu
NK034(ngi)007:673: zer ram +aa li dang k+aa li med pa la
NK034(ngi)007:674: zer rgyud la'ang bdun las tshig don rnam pa bdun
NK034(ngi)007:675: yin te ngo bo spros med thig le'o nges tshig
NK034(ngi)007:676: brda dang ming zad pas ngo bo la tshig mi
NK034(ngi)007:677: rnyed pas tshig la rtags su bkod pa'i yi ge
NK034(ngi)007:678: med pa zhes bya'o dbye ba rnam pa gnyis yin
NK034(ngi)007:679: te ka dag thog ma'i gzhi la tshig med gnad
NK034(ngi)007:680: kas sgrib zad yi ge med 'byung rkyen nyams su
NK034(ngi)007:681: su blangs pa'i yi ge'i mtha' zad pas 'gags pas
NK034(ngi)007:682: yi ge med de yi dgos pa ci zhe na
NK034(ngi)007:683: dngos po rig pa rang gi ngo bo gzhi de
NK034(ngi)007:684: la tshig gi gtan la phebs sam snyam pa rnams
NK034(ngi)007:685: la tshig gis gtan la ma phebs par bstan gshis
NK034(ngi)007:686: kyi 'dug tshul la tha snyad dag tu 'dzin pa
NK034(ngi)007:687: rnams de las zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir yi ge
NK034(ngi)007:688: med ces tha snyad kyis sangs mi rgya bar bshad
NK034(ngi)007:689: pa'o dper na ri rgyal rtser phyin na thams cad
NK034(ngi)007:690: mthong bzhin yul rkyen grol khong don man ngag tu
NK034(ngi)007:691: ston zhe na man ngag rnam gsum ste bzhag thabs
NK034(ngi)007:692: ngo bo snang ba cer bzhag la sogs te bzhi
NK034(ngi)007:693: bstan pa dang dbyings chos sku rnam par dag pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:694: sgron ma dang rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:695: kyi sku khyad par gsang don dang zhal chems gsang
NK034(ngi)007:696: chos kyi ngo bo gzung bar dka' yang ye shes
NK034(ngi)007:697: kyi rtsal ka dam pas 'grub pa'i man ngag go
NK034(ngi)007:698: bzhag thabs rnam pa bzhi yin te snang ba cog
NK034(ngi)007:699: rang sor bzhag spyod pa'i tshad rgya mtsho kha slob
NK034(ngi)007:700: par gsal gting dwangs pa'i dpe cog bzhag sgom pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:701: tshad ri bo cog mi 'gyur ba gzhi che ba
NK034(ngi)007:702: dpangs mtho ba'i dpe bzhag lta ba'i tshad rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:703: cog bzhag rang sar grol ba la'abrasa bu'i tshad de
NK034(ngi)007:704: ltar nyams su blangs pa'i tshad bzhi ldan pa'i rnal
NK034(ngi)007:705: 'byor de nges pa'i don gnas lugs dang dang blo
NK034(ngi)007:706: 'dres pa'o spyod pa'i man ngag yid 'gyur nus pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:707: dpe ste de ltar bla ma'i gdams pa'o chang lta
NK034(ngi)007:708: bu snang ba dbang bsgyur 'byung ba'i dgra dang bral
NK034(ngi)007:709: ba ra ro 'dra snang ba'i tshad ni dbyings kyis
NK034(ngi)007:710: rgya che bar shar bas bzung bsgom pa'i man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:711: nad kyi dngos po des shes pa bsgyur bar nus
NK034(ngi)007:712: pa rims lta bu nyin mtshan kha sbyor rims kyis
NK034(ngi)007:713: btab pa'i skyes bu dang 'dra ste dran med du
NK034(ngi)007:714: thebs bzhin dgongs pa'i tshad ni nam mkhar dbyings rig
NK034(ngi)007:715: 'du 'bral med bzung lta ba'i man ngag mda' lta
NK034(ngi)007:716: pha rol tu 'bigs pa ste bu rig pa'i rang
NK034(ngi)007:717: ngo zin pa ni skyes bu'i snying la mda' phog
NK034(ngi)007:718: pa dang shi ba mnyam pas phyis mi thar ba
NK034(ngi)007:719: bzhin rig pa rtogs pas phyis 'khor bar mi ldog
NK034(ngi)007:720: lta ba'i tshad ni rang snang du shar bas sgron
NK034(ngi)007:721: mas bzung 'bras bu'i man ngag rtsi dug sbyar ba
NK034(ngi)007:722: la nus pa yod pas rtsi dang 'dra lta sgom
NK034(ngi)007:723: spyod pa'i gding gsum tshad du phyin pa ni skyes
NK034(ngi)007:724: bu'i khong du rtsis thebs pa rnam pa thams cad
NK034(ngi)007:725: du thar mi srid pa bzhin 'bras bu'i tshad ni
NK034(ngi)007:726: rig pas phyir mi ldog pa'i rig pa thog lta
NK034(ngi)007:727: bu bzung de ltar rang gi rang ngo mthong bas
NK034(ngi)007:728: 'bras bu'i tshad zin na tshad nad sangs pa'i skyes
NK034(ngi)007:729: bu rang sangs la song ba bzhin rims nad byang
NK034(ngi)007:730: ba'i skyes bu slar mi ldog pa dang snying la
NK034(ngi)007:731: mda' phog shi ba sos mi srid par gnad du
NK034(ngi)007:732: song ba dang rtsi yis shi ba'i skyes bu bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:733: phyir la ldog pa ma phyir mi ldog pa'i rig
NK034(ngi)007:734: pa skar mda' lta bu yin no dbyings dang rig
NK034(ngi)007:735: pa'i ngo bo ni dbyings la rnam pa gnyis yod
NK034(ngi)007:736: de gang zhe na phyi yi dbyings dang nang dbyings
NK034(ngi)007:737: so phyi yi dbyings ni rkyen sprin dang bral ba
NK034(ngi)007:738: nam mkha' 'o nang dbyings rnam dag ste yi ge
NK034(ngi)007:739: na ro lta bu sgron ma'o rig pa nyid kyang
NK034(ngi)007:740: gnyis yin te rig pa'i cha shas thig le gdangs
NK034(ngi)007:741: dang ni rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud rang
NK034(ngi)007:742: gi ngo bo'o mdor na dbyings rig khyim dang bdag
NK034(ngi)007:743: po'i tshul rnam pa gnyis ngo bo nyid de nyams
NK034(ngi)007:744: blangs na mig gi dbang po la bltas na sku
NK034(ngi)007:745: dang 'od dang thig le dang sna tshogs breng breng
NK034(ngi)007:746: gzung bar dka' ba 'gyu ba'i zer snang ba snang
NK034(ngi)007:747: ba de nyid gzhan nas ma byung rang snang yin
NK034(ngi)007:748: shar yang rig pa rang gi ngo las shar grol
NK034(ngi)007:749: ba nyid na gzhan du song ba med de rang
NK034(ngi)007:750: grol lo de ltar mig gi yul du sna tshogs
NK034(ngi)007:751: shar ba de byas shing goms pas byung ba min
NK034(ngi)007:752: ye nyid nas ni gzhi sangs rgyas dang sems can
NK034(ngi)007:753: khyad med du gnas pa'o de ltar gding tshud brtan
NK034(ngi)007:754: pa'i tshad rnal 'byor pas shar bas ye nas yod
NK034(ngi)007:755: pa yin te gcig la yod pa ma yin thams
NK034(ngi)007:756: cad la de ltar gnas pas dga' ba'i sems med
NK034(ngi)007:757: de 'dug tshul shes bya la babs kyis grub pa
NK034(ngi)007:758: de ltar ye nas yin rig lug rgyud dang dbyings
NK034(ngi)007:759: sgron ma'i snang ba la mi sub sa mi khyer
NK034(ngi)007:760: chu mi tshig me mi 'thor rlung 'byung ba'i dgra
NK034(ngi)007:761: de nyid bshig par nus pa min lung du ma
NK034(ngi)007:762: bstan gdams ngag med pa'i gang zag gis gsal ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:763: me long phyar nas bltas kyang gnad med pas mi
NK034(ngi)007:764: gsal dag gam ni mig stong dag gis bltas pas
NK034(ngi)007:765: thams cad du bltas kyang gdams pa med pas mi
NK034(ngi)007:766: mthong rgya la las can bud+d+ha ba rnams kyis mthong
NK034(ngi)007:767: na 'tshang rgya ste de nyid ma mthong ba rnams
NK034(ngi)007:768: bud mi d+ha'o // kyang de nyid mthong ba ma
NK034(ngi)007:769: yin no grub pa'i mtha' dang 'brel ba med pa
NK034(ngi)007:770: lta sgom byas chos kyis mi rtogs gyis de nyid
NK034(ngi)007:771: dpyad kyang rnyed pa min ph+y+wa dang dbang phyug gis
NK034(ngi)007:772: ma byas te ye shes yod pas tha ma 'jigs
NK034(ngi)007:773: bud mi d+ha'o // pa med pa'o // 'jig rten
NK034(ngi)007:774: ltar snang ltar 'khrul pa yang min te chos gzhan
NK034(ngi)007:775: gyis tshig tu brjod kyang mthong ba med do //
NK034(ngi)007:776: 'khrul pa med 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis
NK034(ngi)007:777: de nyid 'bras bu las yin ye nas bsgribs pa
NK034(ngi)007:778: min rang snang rang la shar ba ste shes rab
NK034(ngi)007:779: kyis kyang dpyad du med gting mi dpogs rgyud lung
NK034(ngi)007:780: man ngag rnams kyis ni de nyid tshig dang ye
NK034(ngi)007:781: ges brtags kyang mthong ba min te tshig dang ma
NK034(ngi)007:782: 'brel dmyal ba byol song yi dwags dang rigs drug
NK034(ngi)007:783: snang ba yang rig nang du shar bas de rang
NK034(ngi)007:784: nyid ched du bsgrubs pa byas pas byung ba lta
NK034(ngi)007:785: bu ma yin te thog ma ye nas de ltar
NK034(ngi)007:786: shar nas yod skyes bu rtsol sgrub las bas byung
NK034(ngi)007:787: ba min ma bris pa'i dkyil 'khor de yin ma
NK034(ngi)007:788: bsgoms pa'i lha de rang ma bzlas pa'i sngags dang
NK034(ngi)007:789: ma bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya ma bshams pa'i mchod pa
NK034(ngi)007:790: de bskyed rim gyis shar ba dang rdzogs pa'i rim
NK034(ngi)007:791: pa sku dang ye shes de sangs rgyas sems can
NK034(ngi)007:792: de nyid du 'dus pa 'khor 'das yin dbang rig
NK034(ngi)007:793: pa la rang dbang thob pa dang rig pa nyid
NK034(ngi)007:794: dang gzer thebs pas rim pa dam tshig yin rang
NK034(ngi)007:795: gi bla ma lha yang ngo zhal chems le'u tha
NK034(ngi)007:796: ma'i don man ngag rnam gsum ste phyi nang lus
NK034(ngi)007:797: ngag yid kyi gsang ba'i bya ba gtong dal ba
NK034(ngi)007:798: rnam gsum lus dal bas sprul sku ngag dal bas
NK034(ngi)007:799: longs sku sems dal bas chos sku thob thob mthong
NK034(ngi)007:800: 'gyur phyi ni lus dal na ye shes skye ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:801: grogs yin nang ni dal bas rig pa rang bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:802: gyi gnas sems gsang ba dal na 'khor 'das gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:803: med du 'dres pa rig pa nyid yin no phyi
NK034(ngi)007:804: la cha gsum dag tu ste lus dang ngag dang
NK034(ngi)007:805: yid yin no lus kyis so nam 'jig rten pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:806: zhen pa dbyung rab tu gtang rkyen med dgon par
NK034(ngi)007:807: grogs med par ri dwags rmas ma bzhin ri khrod
NK034(ngi)007:808: du gnas pa'o skor ba la sogs lha phyag dang
NK034(ngi)007:809: ci yang mi bya 'gro dang yan lag bskyod mi
NK034(ngi)007:810: bya byed rgyu cig byung na bzang byas ngan byas
NK034(ngi)007:811: 'dra grogs dang bral te gcig pur 'dug ngag la
NK034(ngi)007:812: rnam pa gsum yin te 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i long
NK034(ngi)007:813: gtam dang sngags bzlas khyad par med kha ton brjod
NK034(ngi)007:814: med kyi don la sgrib par mtshungs la sogs dang
NK034(ngi)007:815: mdor na brjod pa'i tshig rnams spangs gsod pa byung
NK034(ngi)007:817: lkugs pa dag ni ji bzhin no yid la rnam
NK034(ngi)007:818: pa gsum spang ste bsam dang mi bsam thams cad
NK034(ngi)007:819: dang bzang dang ngan pa'i rtog pa bzang ngan gang
NK034(ngi)007:820: yang gser sgrog gis bcings pa dang thag pa'i sgrog
NK034(ngi)007:821: gis bcings pa 'ching ba'i sgo nas mnyam par 'dra'o
NK034(ngi)007:822: // dang bsam pa'i rgyun rnams bcad pa'o sems med
NK034(ngi)007:823: 'du shes med pa'am 'gul bskyod med pa ro dang
NK034(ngi)007:824: 'dra bar 'dug nang ni rnam pa gsum yin te
NK034(ngi)007:825: lus kyis spyod pa spyad mi bya ngag gis brda
NK034(ngi)007:826: tsam nyid mi bya yid kyis sgom pa sgom pa
NK034(ngi)007:827: min bsgom blos de mi mthong bas shes rab kyis
NK034(ngi)007:828: kyang mig gi de bzhin nyid med na mi mthong
NK034(ngi)007:829: lta mi bya gsang ba rnam pa gsum yin te
NK034(ngi)007:830: mig ni 'gul bar mi bya ste glang po lta
NK034(ngi)007:831: bur g.yas su mi 'khrul g.yon du mi 'khrul har
NK034(ngi)007:832: // po lta / gnas par bya lus ni 'dug
NK034(ngi)007:833: stangs gcig las 'gul bar mi bya ste drang srong
NK034(ngi)007:834: nyid dang tsog pu dang gan rkyal dang khyi tshugs
NK034(ngi)007:835: 'dug stangs bzhin shes pa sgron ma la gtad pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:836: 'gul bar mi bya ste mda' srang bzhin du mig
NK034(ngi)007:837: gi zur mnan te mig tu gzhug lus kyi gnad
NK034(ngi)007:838: ni rtsa rang bzhin gyis dal bas dal ba yin
NK034(ngi)007:839: ngag gnad smra ba bcad pas las kyi rlung mi
NK034(ngi)007:840: ldang ste de ma ldangs na ye shes rang bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:841: gyiis skye ba'o pa yin sems kyi gnad ni gtad
NK034(ngi)007:842: pa yin dbugs kyang yid tsam 'then pa yin le'u
NK034(ngi)007:843: rnam pa drug dag gis gzhung gi tshad rnams rdzogs
NK034(ngi)007:844: pa'o i ti rgya bkra shis mdzes ldan zhes bya
NK034(ngi)007:845: ba'i rgyud kyi tshog don bdun du phye nas rnam
NK034(ngi)007:846: par bshad ngo bo 'khrul pa rig pa gzhi thog
NK034(ngi)007:847: tu rang sar grol nges tshig rnam pa bzhi yin
NK034(ngi)007:848: te snang ba 'byung ba lnga'i bag rdul dang bral
NK034(ngi)007:849: bas ye shes lnga'i 'od gsal ba ma 'dres yongs
NK034(ngi)007:850: rdzogs pas so so gang na gnas par wal le
NK034(ngi)007:851: gsal bas bkra zhes bya bar rnam par bshad brjod
NK034(ngi)007:852: bcas 'khrul gzhi pa dang po cis byung zhe na
NK034(ngi)007:853: khungs bcad phyir de yang gzhi dang de'i shes pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:854: cha las gnas lugs ngos nas shis pa'o sgron ma
NK034(ngi)007:855: mig gi sgron ma yul gyi sgron ma la gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:856: su med par zung 'jug rang gsal phyir 'od thig
NK034(ngi)007:857: le zer dang mu khyud las mtshon cha ltar 'gro
NK034(ngi)007:858: ba yang 'byung kyi rgyan du mdzes pa'o thams cad
NK034(ngi)007:859: zhi khro la sogs pa'i sku rdzogs pas ldan zhes
NK034(ngi)007:860: pa'o dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin te 'khrul pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:861: 'byung khungs ci ltar yin bcad pa dang de rang
NK034(ngi)007:862: ma 'khrul pa'i ye shes su gtan la dbab de
NK034(ngi)007:863: nyid 'khrul pa gzhi la ldog pa'o dgos pa 'khrul
NK034(ngi)007:864: pa rtsad bcad de dang po'i ye shes rang gi
NK034(ngi)007:865: ngo bo gzhi la ka dag bzlog pa'o dper na
NK034(ngi)007:866: rgyud rim pas 'khor ba ltar 'khor lo lta bu
NK034(ngi)007:867: ste 'khrul pa rtsad ma chod nas de nyid ma
NK034(ngi)007:868: shes na lus gcig nas gcig tu len zhing yun
NK034(ngi)007:869: ring 'khor 'khor lo de ma skor sor bzhag na
NK034(ngi)007:870: de nyid rang sar dag pa'o khong don man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:871: bzhi yin te 'khrul pa'i gzhi nyid lhun grub rin
NK034(ngi)007:872: po che'i gnas lugs gtan dbab dang 'khrul pa'i 'khrul
NK034(ngi)007:873: lugs dag pa'i rig pa ji ltar byung lugs bstan
NK034(ngi)007:874: pa dang ma 'khrul ye shes ngo bo ka dag
NK034(ngi)007:875: gi rig pa ngos bzung dang de nyid ldog pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:876: gzhi nyid dang gzhi nyid du grol ba'i man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:877: bzlog pa'o 'khrul pa'i ye shes ma rig pa la
NK034(ngi)007:878: sogs pas sbag sbog de thog ma ci yi ngo
NK034(ngi)007:879: bor yang grub pa med pas ka dag 'khrul med
NK034(ngi)007:880: las nges pa med pas shes pa'i kha phyir shor
NK034(ngi)007:881: bas lhun grub las sna tshogs du ma'i 'char sgo
NK034(ngi)007:882: brgyad shar tshul la sku dang ye shes ltar 'khor
NK034(ngi)007:883: ba ltar 'gags pa med pa'i rol pa ni thugs
NK034(ngi)007:884: rje'i rtsal las cir yang mdzad cing cir yang 'char
NK034(ngi)007:885: nges med snang ba du ma'o byung ba de nyid
NK034(ngi)007:886: gzu bo'i blo ma dpyad pa'i shes pa can la
NK034(ngi)007:887: mthong ba ma 'gags ye nas gsal bas shes pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:888: cha bag tsam phyir 'gyu ste nang gsal te de
NK034(ngi)007:889: la nges pa'i char bzung ba'o de ltar gnas pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:890: gzhi de las rgyu 'khrul pa'i ma rig pa dang
NK034(ngi)007:891: 'khrul pa'i sa bon shes pa breng tsam las ni
NK034(ngi)007:892: gsal ba'i cha ni rig pa rang 'gyu byed du
NK034(ngi)007:893: phyir shor bas shes pa gsal gsal drag ste cha
NK034(ngi)007:894: can cig la bdag gi shes pa gcig la zer
NK034(ngi)007:895: ba brtag gsal rig rig ste ma rig pa ni
NK034(ngi)007:896: rgyu bdag nyid gcig pa dang lhan cig skyes pa
NK034(ngi)007:897: dang kun tu brtags pa'i ma rig pa gsum dag
NK034(ngi)007:898: las yid tsam phyir 'gyus te 'khrul pa la bdag
NK034(ngi)007:899: rtog gi blo shar snang cha las yul gsal cha
NK034(ngi)007:900: de bdag tu bzung ba'i blos gzhi dang gzhi yi
NK034(ngi)007:901: ngo bo ka dag lhun grub snang cha la gzhi
NK034(ngi)007:902: dang gzhi zhes khyad par 'khrul 'khrul pa'i rgyu las
NK034(ngi)007:903: ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum ma rig pas
NK034(ngi)007:904: yul rkyen phrad rkyen bzhi'i rgyu'i rkyen rig pa dang
NK034(ngi)007:905: dmigs pa'i rkyen yul dang bdag po'i rkyen der 'dzin
NK034(ngi)007:906: dang de ma thag rkyen de rnams dus mtshungs pa'o
NK034(ngi)007:907: dmigs pa ma dag pas sna tshogs snang ba'i gsal
NK034(ngi)007:908: cha 'dres yid drug ma rig pa dang mtshungs ldan
NK034(ngi)007:909: gyi yid yid kyi rnam shes gtan la 'bebs kun
NK034(ngi)007:910: tu 'tshol rnam par dag pa nges pa 'jog pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:911: 'dzin pa ma 'gags pas nyon mongs drug dug lnga
NK034(ngi)007:912: ma rig pa dang gis bdag tu bcings yul drug
NK034(ngi)007:913: gzugs sgra dri ro reg chos so so'i snang ba
NK034(ngi)007:914: shar de ltar yul la bdag bzung bas de nas
NK034(ngi)007:915: rim gyis phyi nang snod bcud kyi snang ba mi
NK034(ngi)007:916: 'dra ba du mas sa chu sogs rigs drug gi
NK034(ngi)007:917: gzugs bsdus pa'o 'di nyid mi shes gdams pa 'di
NK034(ngi)007:918: med pa'i theg pa gzhan byis pa rnams zo chun
NK034(ngi)007:919: bzhin gcig nas gcig tu te brgyud mar gnas so
NK034(ngi)007:920: so'i lus dang tshad de yang kha dog sna tshogs
NK034(ngi)007:921: shes pa'i dus na rgod pa la dgag pa'i thabs
NK034(ngi)007:922: med rlung dang thig le shar ba tsam gyis thog
NK034(ngi)007:923: ma'i lus kyi len lugs rigs drug so so'i gzugs
NK034(ngi)007:924: su len pa'o de ltar 'khrul pa'i don shes nas
NK034(ngi)007:925: ma 'khrul ye shes ye nas gnas pa'i don 'di
NK034(ngi)007:926: lta bu nam mkha' 'khrul pa med pa sprin dang
NK034(ngi)007:927: bral ba la rig pa 'khrul med rdo rje lu
NK034(ngi)007:928: gu rgyud phyungs byas te dbang po 'khrul pa med
NK034(ngi)007:929: par mig ma 'gul bar blta de ltar gsum shes
NK034(ngi)007:930: nyams su len pa'i skyes bu de gnas gzhan gyi
NK034(ngi)007:931: sgra mi grags pa'i sa rnal 'byor pas gzer gsum
NK034(ngi)007:932: dag ni gdab par bya lus kyi gnad ni rtsa
NK034(ngi)007:933: a ba d+hu ti yin te ltems dang gcud pa
NK034(ngi)007:934: mig dang 'brel bas de ltems pas snang ba zin
NK034(ngi)007:935: // po lta / pa'o // de rtse chung dang
NK034(ngi)007:936: 'brel bas g.yas g.yon gyi bcud thabs mchog tu gces
NK034(ngi)007:937: rig pa'i gnad ni ye shes rlung dang bcas te
NK034(ngi)007:938: rgyu bas rlung yin te steng rlung bzung dang 'og
NK034(ngi)007:939: rlung bskyil bsdam mchog tu gces dbyings kyi sgron ma'i
NK034(ngi)007:940: gnad ni 'od mthing ka yin te mched pa'i dus
NK034(ngi)007:941: tshod de las kha dog sna tshogs su 'char ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:942: dus su rgod pa mnan pa'i thabs de las rlung
NK034(ngi)007:943: dang thig le shar tsam na bying ba seng thabs
NK034(ngi)007:944: bzung ba gces ma 'khrul ye shes de bzhin no
NK034(ngi)007:945: gding gsum thob pa'i rnal 'byor la snang ba ngo
NK034(ngi)007:946: bo ka dag tu rang shar dang po nas rang
NK034(ngi)007:947: grol yin pas na rig pa tha ma yang de
NK034(ngi)007:948: nyid la dang po ka nas dag 'khrul rgyu med
NK034(ngi)007:949: 'khrul rgyu med pas rang gnas kyi lta ba gzhi
NK034(ngi)007:950: la bskyal ngo bo dang rig pa snang ba rtsa
NK034(ngi)007:952: dus mtshungs pas 'khrul pa nyid ni gzhi de nyid
NK034(ngi)007:953: ldog rgyu med de rang gi ngang du grol ba'o
NK034(ngi)007:954: // log pa'o le'u bdun 'dir rgyud le'u lnga las
NK034(ngi)007:955: mi snang ba rgyud kyi zhabs ma tshang ngam brtag
NK034(ngi)007:956: gyi gzhung rdzogs so i ti rgya rgya rgya thal
NK034(ngi)007:957: 'gyur zhes bya rgyud kyi ni nges lung de'i don
NK034(ngi)007:958: gsal bar byed pa rtogs par byed pa'i tshig 'di
NK034(ngi)007:959: nyid don ni rnam par dbye ngo bo rang gi
NK034(ngi)007:960: 'dug tshul rang rig bde chen la gzhan gyi rtsod
NK034(ngi)007:961: pa'i brjod gzhi dang bral bar bstan skyon rnams spong
NK034(ngi)007:962: nges tshig rnam pa gnyis yin te sgra 'byung ba
NK034(ngi)007:963: dang 'jug pa ldog pa'i gsum dus bstan pas grags
NK034(ngi)007:964: stong dbyer med sgra zhes rnam par bshad pa'o de
NK034(ngi)007:965: nyid blos btags rang gnyen po gzhan la ma lus
NK034(ngi)007:966: par grol bas thal 'gyur zhes su bshad pa'o dbye
NK034(ngi)007:967: na rnam pa gsum yin te sgra 'byung ba'i sgra
NK034(ngi)007:968: dang bkod pa'i sgra dang gnas pa'i sgra dang grag
NK034(ngi)007:969: // pa'i sgra'o // bzhi gtan 'bebs thal 'gyur dang
NK034(ngi)007:970: gzhi gnas gzhi de nyid tshad 'dzin thal 'gyur dang
NK034(ngi)007:971: 'byung rkyen sgra rgyud de rnams la brtags pas grogs
NK034(ngi)007:972: 'char thal 'gyur ro dper na bang mdzod lde mig
NK034(ngi)007:973: gis phye bas rdzas la longs spyod pa dang 'dra
NK034(ngi)007:974: dgos pa gang zhe na rgyud rnams gzhan dag gi
NK034(ngi)007:975: sgra don gtan la 'bebs pa'o khong don man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:976: gang zhe na rnam pa gsum du bstan pa yin
NK034(ngi)007:977: rtags bris pa dang gzugs rnams bkod yi ge'i sgra
NK034(ngi)007:978: don dang rigs drug de dag kun rang gis shes
NK034(ngi)007:979: pa'i tshad gzugs kyi rang sgra dang 'byung ba sa
NK034(ngi)007:980: chu me rlung nam mkha'i lnga yi sgra don no
NK034(ngi)007:981: de dag nyams su len pas gtan la nges phab
NK034(ngi)007:982: nas rig pa'i lta ba'i tshad rtog med nyams su
NK034(ngi)007:983: blangs pa yis 'di ltar snang ba thams cad rang
NK034(ngi)007:984: gi grogs su 'gyur rtags bkod yi ge'i sgra don
NK034(ngi)007:985: ni brjod pa'i ngag gi sgra dang lus la gnas
NK034(ngi)007:986: pa'i sgra bris pa bkod pa'i sgra dang gsum yin
NK034(ngi)007:987: no brjod pa'i sgra ni ming gi tshogs du ma
NK034(ngi)007:988: brjod pa'i rang sgra rnams thig le nyag gcig gi
NK034(ngi)007:989: ngo bo la ngag gi sgra dang 'byung ba'i sgra
NK034(ngi)007:990: la sogs pa'i spros med pas pha rol sgra ni
NK034(ngi)007:991: grags pa stong med snang tsam du brag cha lta
NK034(ngi)007:992: bur shes pa ste snang ba cer grol yin bzhag
NK034(ngi)007:993: thabs dang 'brel yo gis dang po nyams su len
NK034(ngi)007:994: dus su ngag ni bcad su la yang gtam mi
NK034(ngi)007:995: brjod par 'dug pa ngag gi gnad yin pas rang
NK034(ngi)007:996: brjod 'gags mi rtog bsam gtan chen por 'du shes
NK034(ngi)007:997: gcig par gnas gnas pa 'i sgra ni rang gi
NK034(ngi)007:998: lus nyid la +aa li k+aa li phreng gnas snying
NK034(ngi)007:999: na 'phreng bas bskor nas gnas pas rtsa nang na
NK034(ngi)007:1000: rkyang par ngag tu ji ltar brjod pa rnams +aa
NK034(ngi)007:1001: li k+aa li las mi 'da' +aa li k+aa li'i
NK034(ngi)007:1002: bzlas pa'o sngags zlos mi dgos pa'i gnad 'di nyid
NK034(ngi)007:1003: nyams su len shes pa'i yo gi ni ngag tu
NK034(ngi)007:1004: brjod pa sngags yin pas dmigs gtad med pa'i sngags
NK034(ngi)007:1005: kyi 'phreng ba'o de phyir gang bsam bsam gtan yin
NK034(ngi)007:1006: bkod pa'i sgra ni yi ge +aa li k+aa li'i
NK034(ngi)007:1007: ste tshogs bos dang 'bod pa gzugs su 'dug pa
NK034(ngi)007:1008: thams cad bris pa yin nyid yin no bos pa
NK034(ngi)007:1009: rnams ni btags pa tshig yin te dngos por rtags
NK034(ngi)007:1010: gzhi la grub rgyu med pas pa thams cad do
NK034(ngi)007:1011: brtags pa de kun rang grol rang gi rang grol
NK034(ngi)007:1012: ba sbrul mdud bzhin no bar yo gi bdag gis
NK034(ngi)007:1013: shes pa na yi ge zad pas grangs mtha' zad
NK034(ngi)007:1014: de phyir thig le nyag gcig go 'bod pa'i sgra
NK034(ngi)007:1015: ni +aa li bcu bzhi dang k+aa li sum cu
NK034(ngi)007:1016: bzhi la sogs gzhi rtsal las sna tshogs snang bas
NK034(ngi)007:1017: na 'di nyid kyang ni brjod rang bzhin med pa
NK034(ngi)007:1018: pas stong snang la rang bzhin med pa ste dper
NK034(ngi)007:1019: na chu zla lta bur shes par bya lus la
NK034(ngi)007:1020: gnas pa'i yi ge +aa li k+aa li de snying
NK034(ngi)007:1021: gi dkyil na phreng ba'i tshul du kun gnas te
NK034(ngi)007:1022: lce dang so bar dang mchu gnyis kyi bar dang
NK034(ngi)007:1023: rnams dang rkan phugs dang mgrin pa dag nas 'byung
NK034(ngi)007:1024: de nyid yo gis rab brtags na gnas de stong
NK034(ngi)007:1025: pa yin gnas med rang so'o mi rtag pa +aa
NK034(ngi)007:1026: li k+aa li'i tshogs rnams kyis rtsa rtsa re re
NK034(ngi)007:1027: na yi ge re gnas pas rnams skyed par byed
NK034(ngi)007:1028: pas na kha dog dkar dmar dbye ba shes par
NK034(ngi)007:1029: bya de nyid la brtags yi ge de la sems
NK034(ngi)007:1030: bzhag na las rlung zad thig le rig pa rang
NK034(ngi)007:1031: grol ngo bo zla dang bral ba'o 'byung ba lnga
NK034(ngi)007:1032: yi sgra don ni rnal 'byor 'dug tshul lta ba
NK034(ngi)007:1033: des dngos gzhi la mthong bar 'dod pa /
NK034(ngi)007:1034: phyi yi 'du 'dzi rnam spangs te dben pa'i mi
NK034(ngi)007:1035: med pa'i sar gnas su song nas kyang thog mar
NK034(ngi)007:1036: drang ba'i spyod pa sngon du 'gro ba ni ke
NK034(ngi)007:1037: re langs pas lus kyi zhen pa gcod pa lus
NK034(ngi)007:1038: kyi gnad du langs pa la rkang pa lag pa
NK034(ngi)007:1039: gdengs gshog pa ltar byas te mjing pa yid tsam
NK034(ngi)007:1040: ltag pa bag tsam dgye la rgyab tu'o ngag ni
NK034(ngi)007:1041: gnad du ku sgra chen po byung byung 'don co
NK034(ngi)007:1042: che rtsol ba drag pos skad chen po rnams dbyung
NK034(ngi)007:1043: ngag gi zhen pa chod sems kyi gnad du mkha'
NK034(ngi)007:1044: la spur mig dang rig pa nam mkha'i mthongs su
NK034(ngi)007:1045: de la dran pa rig pa gzir gsal bar bya
NK034(ngi)007:1046: de nas thang chad nas cig myos par 'gyur de
NK034(ngi)007:1047: nas de nyid dran sangs ngal sos nas spyod lam
NK034(ngi)007:1048: ji ltar bde ba mos pa bya dben pa'i gnas
NK034(ngi)007:1049: mi rnam pa thams cad du mi rgyu ba sam
NK034(ngi)007:1050: lung stong du tsan dan la sogs shing shin tu
NK034(ngi)007:1051: mang ba skam po shing rnams kyi phung po la
NK034(ngi)007:1052: sogs rab byas te de la me chen gtang byas
NK034(ngi)007:1053: la mkha' 'gro ma la tshogs dang gtor ma sbyin
NK034(ngi)007:1054: de nas me yi dbyibs la thun mong gi dngos
NK034(ngi)007:1055: grub brtag pa me tog gi dbyibs la sogs dang
NK034(ngi)007:1056: mdung rtse lta bu ni dbang dang dgug pa'i las
NK034(ngi)007:1057: rnams gang yang 'grub 'khor lo lta bu ral gri
NK034(ngi)007:1058: lta bu dang gru gsum ni gzhan bskrad dang tshar
NK034(ngi)007:1059: gcod drag po'i las rnams 'grub de la de dag
NK034(ngi)007:1060: yang stong par rang bzhin med shes nas rnal 'byor
NK034(ngi)007:1061: rang nyid ji ltar mos pa'i spyod pa nyid la
NK034(ngi)007:1062: sbyar kha dog nyid kyang mchog gi dngos grub rnam
NK034(ngi)007:1063: par brtag dkar ser mi tog ye shes so de
NK034(ngi)007:1064: nyid rang du skye ba yin shin tu dkar la
NK034(ngi)007:1065: gting gsal ba dwangs pa ni rnal 'byor byang chub
NK034(ngi)007:1066: sems chen po snying rjes 'gro ba'i don byed sprul
NK034(ngi)007:1067: sku 'byin rtags rab tu dmar gsal ba la dwangs
NK034(ngi)007:1068: pa ni cung zhig 'jig rten du spyod pa gnas
NK034(ngi)007:1069: pa'i rtags dbyibs kyang lug gi rwa dang mtshungs sngo
NK034(ngi)007:1070: nag 'jigs pa'i nag nar nar 'dug na dbyibs 'dra
NK034(ngi)007:1071: na drag po'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa sna tshogs
NK034(ngi)007:1072: spyod pa sna tshogs kyis dur khrod dag tu rgyu
NK034(ngi)007:1073: bar bya 'gror rung ba'i rtags su'o //
NK034(ngi)007:1074: chags chen gsal la ser la rtse gnag pas bdag
NK034(ngi)007:1075: ni 'jigs pa kun spangs te seng ge lta bur
NK034(ngi)007:1076: gzhan gyis gnod pa'i 'jigs bral gyi rtags rgyu bar
NK034(ngi)007:1077: bya de ltar spyod pa mchog byas nas yang na
NK034(ngi)007:1078: dben pa de nyid du bud shing tshogs la me
NK034(ngi)007:1079: slar yang me bus la de nas 'dom do'i sa
NK034(ngi)007:1080: tshod du bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni lus
NK034(ngi)007:1081: kyi gnad ni byol song kha sbub tu nyal te
NK034(ngi)007:1082: mig ma btsum par lag pa'i gru mo sa la
NK034(ngi)007:1083: btsugs te mjing pa gyen la bteg la lag pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1084: thal mo 'gram pa la sbyar bzhin rig pa me
NK034(ngi)007:1085: yi dkyil du 'phang seng ge bzhin du rnam par
NK034(ngi)007:1086: mig ha re la gyen du lta de nas 'byung
NK034(ngi)007:1087: ba me yi sgra ma chad pa 'tshag 'tshag chen
NK034(ngi)007:1088: bshad dang brlab lhab lhab pa dang 'ur dang sbrag
NK034(ngi)007:1089: dang rtseg pa rnams rang gi shes pa'i bde sangs
NK034(ngi)007:1090: pa dang dga' ya le ba sogs nyams dang sbyar
NK034(ngi)007:1091: zla ba phyed kyis skal ldan par rnal 'byor gcig
NK034(ngi)007:1092: gis me'i las byas 'grub par 'gyur la don gang
NK034(ngi)007:1093: 'dod the tshom med rnal 'byor mngon shes ldan par
NK034(ngi)007:1094: me thams cad kyi skad shes par 'gyur chu yi
NK034(ngi)007:1095: sgra spyod rnal 'byor pas sngon 'gro gong bzhin byas
NK034(ngi)007:1096: nas ni ston ser spang po kha ser gyi dus
NK034(ngi)007:1097: lo thog smin dus su lung stong thur zugs chu
NK034(ngi)007:1098: drag 'bab rba rlabs shin tu drag pa ru shwa
NK034(ngi)007:1099: sgra che ba lus kyi gnad ni long bu gshibs
NK034(ngi)007:1100: tsog pu la rig pa'i gnad ni shes pa chu'i
NK034(ngi)007:1101: dkyil du chu dkyil lo gtad glang chen mig mi
NK034(ngi)007:1102: 'gul bar gis gzhung la blta khams kyi dang po
NK034(ngi)007:1103: mgo 'thom pa sogs tshugs ma thub na chu'i sgra
NK034(ngi)007:1104: med sa ru gos kyis mgo bstums te thang re
NK034(ngi)007:1105: thang re bag tsam nyal bar bya'o zla ba gcig
NK034(ngi)007:1106: ni bsgoms byas na rang rig bde ba'i gding dang
NK034(ngi)007:1107: ldan pa'o chen 'grub pa'o shes pa rig pa rna
NK034(ngi)007:1108: bar gtad byas nas chu'i sgra la rtag tu nyan
NK034(ngi)007:1109: byas na skye med 'bras bu mchog la the tshom
NK034(ngi)007:1110: med rnal 'byor sna tshogs chu la brten nas mkha'
NK034(ngi)007:1111: 'gro ma chos smra ba yang thos par 'gyur ro
NK034(ngi)007:1112: chos shes 'gyur bying ba lar nyams len du bying
NK034(ngi)007:1113: na de tshugs bya'o gseng ba'i cho ga'o rlung gi
NK034(ngi)007:1114: sgra rnams shes 'dod pas sngon du 'gro ba me
NK034(ngi)007:1115: sgra dang gong bzhin te lung gsum mado'am rlung chen
NK034(ngi)007:1116: 'ong sar ri rtse ru dben khang phyogs chung ngu
NK034(ngi)007:1117: gcig kyi skar khung can phyogs phyed par legs par
NK034(ngi)007:1118: brtsigs te rnal 'byor ni rlung gi phyogs dag gang
NK034(ngi)007:1119: nas 'ong ba'i yin par rna bar shes pa rnams
NK034(ngi)007:1120: gtad de de nyid rtag tu'am rgyun du spyad pa
NK034(ngi)007:1121: yis zla ba gcig gis skal ldan par rig pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1122: gsal 'debs 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med rnal
NK034(ngi)007:1123: 'byor nyams myong mchog gong nas gong du 'phel ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:1124: thob pa'o sa yi sgra ni lcid mnyam ste sa
NK034(ngi)007:1125: spyin bzang po la ngang pa'i sgo nga tsam mang
NK034(ngi)007:1126: du byas te kha dog kyang tshon gyis bsgyur ba
NK034(ngi)007:1127: de la shes pa gtad de brtse bar bya sgo
NK034(ngi)007:1128: nga rim pa mang byas la rgyun du lag gi
NK034(ngi)007:1129: 'du byed rtag tu sgong dang shes pa ma bral
NK034(ngi)007:1130: bar bsgoms zla ba drug na tu bsgoms 'byung ba
NK034(ngi)007:1131: la ba'i gnod pas mi tshugs shing 'byung dbang bsgyur
NK034(ngi)007:1132: rig pa'i snang ba nges pa'i 'bras bu thob nam
NK034(ngi)007:1133: mkha'i sgra ni ri rtse la mthon po la song
NK034(ngi)007:1134: la rnal 'byor skal ldan nyid phyin te lus kyi
NK034(ngi)007:1135: gnad ni gan rkyal la yan lag thang thang brgyangs
NK034(ngi)007:1136: te rig pa mkha' lding mkha' la shin tu mtho
NK034(ngi)007:1137: bar 'phang dbugs ni yang yang ha ha zhes phyir
NK034(ngi)007:1138: phyungs te rtag tu nam mkha' de nyid la gnas
NK034(ngi)007:1139: na lo gsum gyis bar du bsgoms na ni nam
NK034(ngi)007:1140: mkha' la bya bzhin thogs med du 'phur bar 'gyur
NK034(ngi)007:1141: bar the tshom med rtag tu 'di dag nyid bsgoms
NK034(ngi)007:1142: na 'jig rten pa la phan pa'i grub pa dang
NK034(ngi)007:1143: mngon shes dang phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin mchog
NK034(ngi)007:1144: ni des thob bo rigs drug so so'i gzugs sgra
NK034(ngi)007:1145: ni de dag rtag tu bsgoms pa yis ji ltar
NK034(ngi)007:1146: 'dod bzhin gzugs mthong skad ji lta ba shes pa
NK034(ngi)007:1147: ste shes par 'gyur de nyid 'byung ba'i sgra la
NK034(ngi)007:1148: rtag tu goms pa yis sprul pa sku yi yon
NK034(ngi)007:1149: tan 'grub pas 'di nyid la sprul sku sgrub pa
NK034(ngi)007:1150: zhes bya'o zas kyi 'du shes nyid bral te mi
NK034(ngi)007:1151: 'dod mnyam gzhag sgom la rang bzhin gyi bsam gtan
NK034(ngi)007:1152: la rtag tu spyod lus ni bco brgyad bzhin lo'i
NK034(ngi)007:1153: na tshod lta bu gzhon sha chags pa du 'gyur
NK034(ngi)007:1154: nam mkha' la ni bya bzhin 'phur bar nus te
NK034(ngi)007:1155: rgya mtshos gting dmyal ba'i gnas kyi bar 'dzul bar
NK034(ngi)007:1156: nus ri brag rnams la zang thal lo mdor na
NK034(ngi)007:1157: 'byung ba'i sgra rnams dang rga shi'i sdug bsngal rnams
NK034(ngi)007:1158: dang bral lha yi mig sogs spyan dang mngon shes
NK034(ngi)007:1159: drug rnams rgyun du skye thabs de rgyud gzhan nas
NK034(ngi)007:1160: mi ston pas mchog tu gsang ba'o le'u drug gi
NK034(ngi)007:1161: gzhung don rdzogs i ti rgya rgya rgya kun tu
NK034(ngi)007:1162: bzang po me long rgyud tshig don rnam pa bdun
NK034(ngi)007:1163: ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba mtshon dpe dgos pa
NK034(ngi)007:1164: khong don gyi man ngag le'u yi grangs dang gyis
NK034(ngi)007:1165: bstan ngo bo nyon mongs rig pa ka dag rang
NK034(ngi)007:1166: dag pas ye shes snang ba zang ma nyon mongs
NK034(ngi)007:1167: pa med yin bdag theg pa chen po'i rig gzhan
NK034(ngi)007:1168: don rnams mthar 'byin pa'o nges tshig rnam pa bzhi
NK034(ngi)007:1169: yin te thams cad ngo bo nyid rig pa la
NK034(ngi)007:1170: 'dus pas ye shes nyid ni sems can thams cad
NK034(ngi)007:1171: la khyab pas kun tu'o bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:1172: med rang grol pas ngan ma rig pa sogs pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1173: blo med bzang por gnas rnam rtog rgyun zad rig
NK034(ngi)007:1174: pa zla dang bral ba ka dag pas g.yos pa
NK034(ngi)007:1175: med pa'i bsam gtan thugs zhes bya snang ba nyid
NK034(ngi)007:1176: la rig pa yul rdo rje lu gu rgyud shar
NK034(ngi)007:1177: dbyings rnam dang thig le stong pa sgron ma gsal
NK034(ngi)007:1178: byed me long ngo dbye ba rnam pa gnyis yin
NK034(ngi)007:1179: te rang bzhin lhun grub kun sems can thams cad
NK034(ngi)007:1180: la khyab pas bzang dang rtogs pa de ldog pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1181: lta ba mngon gyur kun bzang ngo dper na thams
NK034(ngi)007:1182: cad gcod pa ral gri lta bu ste lta ba
NK034(ngi)007:1183: rnams kyi shan 'byed khong don man ngag rnam gsum
NK034(ngi)007:1184: ste dngos te ma mthong gzhi ma yin pa la
NK034(ngi)007:1185: yin par bzung ba gol sa dang blo btags rim
NK034(ngi)007:1186: pa'i theg pa so so'i grub mtha' gol sa dang
NK034(ngi)007:1187: lam gyi gnad ma shes par nyams blangs 'khrul pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1188: gol sa'o dngos po rig pa'i ngo bo la gshis
NK034(ngi)007:1189: kyi 'dug tshul la sku dang ye shes yod dang
NK034(ngi)007:1190: ye shes rgyun chad med pa'i 'dod pa mtha' gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:1191: ni ye shes nyid la bzhag pa ste ye shes
NK034(ngi)007:1192: de nyid yod na rtogs pa'am dang bcas pa 'on
NK034(ngi)007:1193: te med na bem po bzhin gzhi mi btub yang
NK034(ngi)007:1194: na lung ma bstan bzhin shes pa med pa rnams
NK034(ngi)007:1195: dang khyad med 'gyur yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK034(ngi)007:1196: 'bras bu sku gsum gyi gnas lugs la ye shes
NK034(ngi)007:1197: rnam pa gsum chos sku'i ye shes longs sku'i ye
NK034(ngi)007:1198: shes sprul sku'i ye shes yin te thams longs sku
NK034(ngi)007:1199: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes shes rab kyi rtsal ma
NK034(ngi)007:1200: 'gags pas bud+d+ha dang sprul sku rnam pa lta byed
NK034(ngi)007:1201: shes pa'i rtsal nang du mkhyen pa'i ye shes sems
NK034(ngi)007:1202: can la gnas lugs ji lta ba mkhyen pa dang
NK034(ngi)007:1203: dang gzhi chos sku la chos sku'i cha dang bcas
NK034(ngi)007:1204: pa'i shes rab kyi rtsal gnas pa'i ye shes so
NK034(ngi)007:1205: sprul sku ye shes rnam gnyis te ji lta mkhyen
NK034(ngi)007:1206: pas de yang phra ba'i ye shes gzhi la gnas
NK034(ngi)007:1207: pa'i ye shes kyi dngos po'i gnas lugs gnas lugs
NK034(ngi)007:1208: shes shes bya ji snyed mkhyen pas pa'i ye shes
NK034(ngi)007:1209: gdul bya'i bsam pa gzhan don shes longs sku'i ye
NK034(ngi)007:1210: shes snang ba thams cad thad ka'o kar shes pa
NK034(ngi)007:1211: chos sku'i ye shes rags pa ma yin phra ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:1212: ye shes gsal cha tsam thugs rje'i rang bzhin shugs
NK034(ngi)007:1213: kyis basngagasa pa'o gzhi gnas te shes pa'i cha ni
NK034(ngi)007:1214: gsal byed la 'dzin pa rags pa'i rtog pa dngos
NK034(ngi)007:1215: 'dzin med ngang ngam shugs kyi 'bad pa med pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1216: thugs rje'o gsal zhing shes pa rig dang bcas bum
NK034(ngi)007:1217: nang gi mar me ltar cha la 'dres pa med
NK034(ngi)007:1218: par mi bskyod pa'i shes rab kyi rtsal gsal byed
NK034(ngi)007:1219: tsam du gnas te med pa yang mu stegs chad
NK034(ngi)007:1220: pa ba dang khyad med gnas de ltar ye shes
NK034(ngi)007:1221: cha med na phyi rol nam mkha' stong pa phyang
NK034(ngi)007:1222: chad pa'i skyon dang khyad par nyid ni yod pa
NK034(ngi)007:1223: min de phyir gzhi gnas ye shes khyab ye shes
NK034(ngi)007:1224: med na gsal cha tsam du med na med par
NK034(ngi)007:1225: lta ba chad pa dang khyad par ci yang yod
NK034(ngi)007:1226: mi 'gyur rags pa'i ye shes snang char yod 'gyur
NK034(ngi)007:1227: na 'on te mu stegs rtag pa nyid dang mnyam
NK034(ngi)007:1228: snang ba rdul phra rab dang bcas pa 'di dag
NK034(ngi)007:1229: lus 'di yi glo bur ba dang khyad cis 'byed
NK034(ngi)007:1230: de phyir shes bya nyid la ni brten nas rags
NK034(ngi)007:1231: par yod pa ma yin te phra ba'i ye shes
NK034(ngi)007:1232: nyid du gnas blos btags rim pa'i theg pa'i gol
NK034(ngi)007:1233: sa ni rgyud gzhan na zhi ba shes bya med
NK034(ngi)007:1234: na med pa ste yod par gyur pa thams cad
NK034(ngi)007:1235: la ye shes ye shes zhes bya'i tshig tshig tu
NK034(ngi)007:1236: brjod pa kun brjod de don kun 'di zhes don
NK034(ngi)007:1237: ngo bo rang 'di yin zhes gzhan gyis gtan la
NK034(ngi)007:1238: ma phebs pas ma rtogs pas po ti glegs bam
NK034(ngi)007:1239: yi ge rnams gzhung tshad ji tsam yod kyang dgos
NK034(ngi)007:1240: med tshi chad ngal ba'i rgyu 'di dag gi sangs
NK034(ngi)007:1241: rgyas rdul tsam thob pa min no 'o na sangs
NK034(ngi)007:1242: rgyas kyi gsungs pa dgos pa med dam zhe na
NK034(ngi)007:1243: / re zhig ma yin pa'i sgro 'dogs gcod pa tsam yin /
NK034(ngi)007:1244: dper na gser ma yin pa'i sgro 'dogs bcad nas gser rang ma shes pa dang 'dra bar /
NK034(ngi)007:1245: gnas lugs ma yin pa'i sgro 'dogs bcad nas gnas lugs rang ngo ma shes pa'o //
NK034(ngi)007:1246: 'di nyid mi shes rmongs pa ste 'og ma rnams
NK034(ngi)007:1247: dang khyad med 'gyur de nas na rnal 'byor nyams
NK034(ngi)007:1248: len la goms pa gces nyams blangs pas 'khrul te
NK034(ngi)007:1249: ma shes par gol ba ni rig pa lus la
