NK034(ngi)007:1250: brten pas lus la brten pas lus kyi gnad nyid
NK034(ngi)007:1251: gal che ste ma shes na dkor mdzod nang na
NK034(ngi)007:1252: nor yod kyang sgo mo dam dkrigs 'dra ste nor
NK034(ngi)007:1253: mi lon pas phyi nas nor rnyed ma yin no
NK034(ngi)007:1254: bsnyen sgrub la re ba'i lta sgom bskyed pa yi
NK034(ngi)007:1255: ni rim pa dang don 'di nyid ni khyad med
NK034(ngi)007:1256: 'gyur phyi nang gi dbyings sgron ma'i kyi gnad ka
NK034(ngi)007:1257: ma shes na bya long nam mkha'i mtha' 'tshol mtha'
NK034(ngi)007:1258: la thug pa med pas mi rnyed pa dang 'dra
NK034(ngi)007:1259: rig pa'i gnad rdo rje lu gu rgyud de ma
NK034(ngi)007:1260: shes na nam mkha' dngos med la dngos por 'dzin
NK034(ngi)007:1261: pa dang sbar gyis 'debs pa 'dra lus yul rig
NK034(ngi)007:1262: pa'i gnad gsum man ngag mi shes par chos gzhan
NK034(ngi)007:1263: gyi sgor zhugs nas sgom par 'dod pa'i sgom chen
NK034(ngi)007:1264: pa spyad dbang med pa'i nor bdag phyug po'i khal
NK034(ngi)007:1265: khol dang 'dra de yang dngos po gshis rang ma
NK034(ngi)007:1266: mthong de'i yon tan la grangs su shes pa'o //
NK034(ngi)007:1267: de phyir gsum nyid 'brel ba'o rig pa'i rten sa
NK034(ngi)007:1268: lus la gnas pa yin te lus gcig med na
NK034(ngi)007:1269: bem po ma yin pa thams cad la med pa
NK034(ngi)007:1270: ste yod na rig pas khyab par ye shes yod
NK034(ngi)007:1271: par nges de ltar lus la rig pa yod pa
NK034(ngi)007:1272: de chos can spyi yi mtshan nyid gzhin gyi kyis
NK034(ngi)007:1273: spyi bo'i gtsug nas rkang mthil bar lus mgo dang
NK034(ngi)007:1274: rkang la sogs pa la brtag dpyad rnam pa sna
NK034(ngi)007:1275: tshogs kyis dpyad pas de nyid dang po'i gshis de
NK034(ngi)007:1276: rnyed pa min mo dang pra la sogs pa yi
NK034(ngi)007:1277: rtsis ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bltas shing dpyad
NK034(ngi)007:1278: kyang byas pa ma yin ye shes yin pa rnyed
NK034(ngi)007:1279: pa min 'o na gtan lus la med nges zhig
NK034(ngi)007:1280: gam na med yin zhe na gtan du med pa
NK034(ngi)007:1281: ma yin te lus gnad stems na mngon mig gi
NK034(ngi)007:1282: de nyid rig pa mig gi mngon sum du du
NK034(ngi)007:1283: snang dper na lus la khrag khyab ste skyes bu
NK034(ngi)007:1284: la khrag gis gang zhing rgyas pa yang skyes bu
NK034(ngi)007:1285: glen pa gnad mi shes pa 'ga' zhig gis gang
NK034(ngi)007:1286: gang lus la khrag btsal bas rtsa med pa'i sar
NK034(ngi)007:1287: gtar yang gcig kyang 'byung ba ma khrag mi yong
NK034(ngi)007:1288: ba dang 'dra'o yin no 'o na lus la khrag
NK034(ngi)007:1289: med dam snyam na lus la khrag med ma yin
NK034(ngi)007:1290: te lus spyi bo nas rkang mthil yan chad thams
NK034(ngi)007:1291: cad khyab cing khrag la brten skyes bu thabs dang
NK034(ngi)007:1292: ldan pa sman pa lta bu yis khrag rgyu ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:1293: rtsa la gtar na khrag 'byung ltar lus gnas ye
NK034(ngi)007:1294: shes de bzhin no lus kyi gnad ma shes na
NK034(ngi)007:1295: ye shes mi 'char lus gnad la brten nas 'char
NK034(ngi)007:1296: ba'o // yul gyi gnad ni nam mkha' ste sprin
NK034(ngi)007:1297: bral 'di nyid gdams pa mi shes kha cig gis
NK034(ngi)007:1298: nyin dang mtshan mo med pa ru nam mkha' nyid
NK034(ngi)007:1299: la btsal zhing bltas byas kyang rig pa'i ye shes
NK034(ngi)007:1300: 'di nyid mthong ba ma yin no 'o na nam
NK034(ngi)007:1301: mkha' la mi 'char ram zhe na gtan du med
NK034(ngi)007:1302: pa ma yin te 'di nyid kyi gdams pa la
NK034(ngi)007:1303: goms pa'i rnal 'byor pas bltas na skad cig nyid
NK034(ngi)007:1304: la don shes 'gyur rig pa'i gnad ni nyin mtshan
NK034(ngi)007:1305: du dbyings rig la rtag tu de nyid la gnas
NK034(ngi)007:1306: pa gal che bya gzhan pa'i sems kyis skad cig
NK034(ngi)007:1307: kyang yengs shing blta bar mi bya'o 'o na gnad
NK034(ngi)007:1308: gsum ye shes de 'di nyid ma gtogs gzhan rnams
NK034(ngi)007:1309: kyis mthong ba dag ni med dam ci zhe na
NK034(ngi)007:1310: gzhan lta spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'di nyid ma
NK034(ngi)007:1311: bstan par du ni ji ltar brtags kyang thabs dang
NK034(ngi)007:1312: gdams pa med pa'i phyir mthong ba min dam pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1313: gdams ngag 'di bstan na dper na ba rnams lus
NK034(ngi)007:1314: la 'o mas khyab kyang rwa dang mjug ma nas
NK034(ngi)007:1315: 'then kyang 'o ma mi 'byung mkhas pas nu ma
NK034(ngi)007:1316: nas 'then na 'o ma dag ni 'byung ba bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:1317: de bzhin lus kyi gnad shes na mngon du gsal
NK034(ngi)007:1318: te lus gnad kyang rtag tu goms sgom pa dang
NK034(ngi)007:1319: ma sgom pa dang khyad med mthong shan pa smad
NK034(ngi)007:1320: 'tshong sdig can lus yod pa dang shes pa yod
NK034(ngi)007:1321: pas 'di dge sdig las 'das pa'i rtags yang 'di
NK034(ngi)007:1322: nyid bstan pas grol thob 'gyur dmus long la ni
NK034(ngi)007:1323: ye shes rgyun chad pas 'di mi mthong ste bsgoms
NK034(ngi)007:1325: nyan thos rang sangs rgyas rnams dang byang sems nyon
NK034(ngi)007:1326: mongs pa'i sgrib pa bral ba sprul pa sna tshogs
NK034(ngi)007:1327: 'gyed rdzu 'phrul ston nus pas kyang 'di nyid gnad
NK034(ngi)007:1328: gsum gyi man ngag gi gding med na rdul cha
NK034(ngi)007:1329: tsam yang mthong mi 'gyur rgya la mthong yang rang
NK034(ngi)007:1330: snang du ma shes pas mi grol /
NK034(ngi)007:1331: gzhan dag gis ni smos ci dgos des na rtag
NK034(ngi)007:1332: tu goms dang thabs kyi man ngag nyid gces le'u
NK034(ngi)007:1333: bdun gyi gzhung don rdzogs i ti rgya rgya rgya
NK034(ngi)007:1334: sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi tshig
NK034(ngi)007:1335: bdun bsdus te don bshad par bya ngo bo gsal
NK034(ngi)007:1336: byed snang ba ston rang rig pa'o nges tshig rnam
NK034(ngi)007:1337: pa gsum yin te 'khor ba'i bag chags kyi mun
NK034(ngi)007:1338: pa thams cad sel bas sgron kun gyi gzhir gyur
NK034(ngi)007:1339: dngos po'i 'dug tshul ma yin no 'od zer rig
NK034(ngi)007:1340: pa las kun tu yangs pa'i phyir 'bar ba yin
NK034(ngi)007:1341: pas gsal bar mngon sum du bltar yod dbye na
NK034(ngi)007:1342: rnam pa bzhi yin no rnam dag dbyings kyi sgron
NK034(ngi)007:1343: ma dang mthing kha 'gyur med kyi 'od thig le
NK034(ngi)007:1344: stong pa'i sgron ma chags chen dmar po dang shes
NK034(ngi)007:1345: rab rang byung sgron ma rig rtsal gsal stong gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:1346: med dang rgyang zhags chu yi sgron ma'o mig gi
NK034(ngi)007:1347: dbang po skyon med pa dgos pa rgyud rnams gzhan
NK034(ngi)007:1348: gyi tshig 'di nyid du ni gsal bar snang bar
NK034(ngi)007:1349: byed dper na gsal byed sgron shing sgron shing gi
NK034(ngi)007:1350: me khyer nas phyin na lam snang ba bzhin khong
NK034(ngi)007:1351: don man ngag rnam pa lnga ming phar btags pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1352: tshig gi sgron ma yis 'jig rten ming gi don
NK034(ngi)007:1353: 'byed pa sa bon byed rten 'brel rdzas kyi sgron
NK034(ngi)007:1354: ma me sgron dang gtsub shing la sogs yis btags
NK034(ngi)007:1355: pa grangs kyi gnas skabs kyi khyim gyi mun pa
NK034(ngi)007:1356: sel ba lta bu spyi mthun las kyi sgron ma
NK034(ngi)007:1357: nyi zla sogs yis 'gro ba'i mun pa sel bar
NK034(ngi)007:1358: byed mtshon pa dpe yi sgron ma 'di lta bu
NK034(ngi)007:1359: zhes mtshon nas yis log rtog phyin ci log gi
NK034(ngi)007:1360: 'gal ba'i the tshom sel ye shes rtags kyi sgron
NK034(ngi)007:1361: ma chos sku dang thig le stong sgron yis bag
NK034(ngi)007:1362: chags 'thug po'i mun pa sel ye shes rtags kyi
NK034(ngi)007:1363: sgron ma de la bzhi yin te 'od kyi rtags
NK034(ngi)007:1364: su dbyings yi ge na ro lta bu yin no
NK034(ngi)007:1365: ye shes rtags su thig le rma bya'i mdongs lta
NK034(ngi)007:1366: bu ste sku yi rtags su lu gu rgyud gser
NK034(ngi)007:1367: gyi skud pa lta bu 'dug tshul gnas lugs rtags
NK034(ngi)007:1368: su 'gyu dang 'phrig de yang gnad du zhe na
NK034(ngi)007:1369: gsang don gsum du bstan sgron ma'i gnas ni snying
NK034(ngi)007:1370: yin sku dang ye shes su te lam ni rtsa
NK034(ngi)007:1371: chen ro rkyang dbu ma ka ti shel sbug bzhi
NK034(ngi)007:1372: yin no sgo na mthong byed mig gi sgo nyams
NK034(ngi)007:1373: su len par 'dod pa rnal 'byor ba yis 'khrul
NK034(ngi)007:1374: pa'i bya ba phyi nang gi kun btang ste dur
NK034(ngi)007:1375: khrod gnas sam dben sa skye bo med pa ru
NK034(ngi)007:1376: bdag nyid gcig pur gnas kyang rung lta spyod mthun
NK034(ngi)007:1377: pa'i grogs btsal te bsam gtan gnod pa'i dgra rnam
NK034(ngi)007:1378: g.yeng dang 'du 'dzi mi sgra khyi sgra sogs spangs
NK034(ngi)007:1379: la sgron ma nyid ni de mthong bar byed pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1380: thabs goms byed na 'khrul 'khor bzhin du gnad rnams
NK034(ngi)007:1381: stems lus kyi gnad ni snying yin pas dang po'i
NK034(ngi)007:1382: dus su bsam rgyun las dang po pas dbugs nang
NK034(ngi)007:1383: du dum re 'then bcad snying gi gnad ni rtsa
NK034(ngi)007:1384: yin pas rig pa'i gnad yod pas 'gyu srang bcad
NK034(ngi)007:1385: pa gces gcud dang g.yas su gyen la bzlog dang
NK034(ngi)007:1386: thur du mnan pa ni yo gi nyid kyis gnad
NK034(ngi)007:1387: de rnams shes par bya rtsa yi gnad ni mig
NK034(ngi)007:1388: yin rig pa 'char ba'i sgo yod pas gyen la
NK034(ngi)007:1389: seng ge thad kar glang dang ri bong had por
NK034(ngi)007:1390: dang mda' srang zur gyis mnan lta bu lta stangs
NK034(ngi)007:1391: bzhi nyin dus rnal 'byor pa yis shes pa mig
NK034(ngi)007:1392: tu gzhug la lta mtshan dus shes bya bum par
NK034(ngi)007:1393: mig btsum dbugs nang du rngub la gzhug shes pa
NK034(ngi)007:1394: nyid ni snying khar 'od kyi gong bu la bsdu
NK034(ngi)007:1395: sgron ma tsit+ta'i dkyil du shes pa rang gsal du
NK034(ngi)007:1396: stems thig le rtsa yi nang du 'od kyi dra
NK034(ngi)007:1397: bar du sba des ni ye shes nang du bum
NK034(ngi)007:1398: nang gi mar me ltar gsal de ltar nyin dang
NK034(ngi)007:1399: mtshan dus su nyams len rgyun du byed pa'i rnal
NK034(ngi)007:1400: 'byor pas goms pa'i tshad ni rtsal rdzogs kyi man
NK034(ngi)007:1401: ngag gong dang mtshungs de nas goms te nyams su
NK034(ngi)007:1402: longs pa'i tshad mthar phyin pas rkyen la rag ma
NK034(ngi)007:1403: lus pa'i rtags nyin dang mtshan mo gnyis med par
NK034(ngi)007:1404: rtag tu nyin mo bzhin du 'gyur lus la yang
NK034(ngi)007:1405: 'od ltar 'ong de dus rnal 'byor pa de nyid
NK034(ngi)007:1406: rig pa rlung dang 'dres pas lus kyi rtags ni
NK034(ngi)007:1407: shing bal ltar yang ba dang 'bu srin mi 'ong
NK034(ngi)007:1408: rta ltar mgyogs shing ye shes kyi rlung la byan
NK034(ngi)007:1409: tshud ba'i rtags su gzhan la mig mi chags dbugs
NK034(ngi)007:1410: phyi nang du rgyu ba med zas dang skom gyi
NK034(ngi)007:1411: dran pa 'gags rlung la 'gro 'ong med pa'i rtags
NK034(ngi)007:1412: su'o // rang la ched du rtags 'dod pa med
NK034(ngi)007:1413: kyang de ltar 'byung shes rab rtsal ma 'gags pa
NK034(ngi)007:1414: las rtags ni 'di lta bu shes rab dang rig
NK034(ngi)007:1415: pa dbyer med pa'i rtags su sngar mthong ma myong
NK034(ngi)007:1416: ba'i chos kyi tshig rang gis shes pa dang dang
NK034(ngi)007:1417: 'khrul ba shes rab kyi dbang du 'dus pa'i rtags
NK034(ngi)007:1418: su ngag tu ci brjod chos kyi gtam 'byung blo
NK034(ngi)007:1419: dang gdams pa 'dres pa'i rtags su lung dang rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:1420: kyi tshig rnams kun ma bltas bzhin du rang la
NK034(ngi)007:1421: 'char rig pa'i rtags ni lu gu rgyud yul la
NK034(ngi)007:1422: snang ba de 'gul dang 'phrig pa nyid bral te
NK034(ngi)007:1423: snang ba rang sar stong pa nyid khong du chud
NK034(ngi)007:1424: pa'i rtags su shes pa gar gtad du mi 'gul
NK034(ngi)007:1425: bar gnas pa'o gsang ba nyams su myong ba'i rtags
NK034(ngi)007:1426: gding bzhi ste dmyal ba la rigs drug gi 'gro
NK034(ngi)007:1427: ba rig par grol bas sogs ngan song la de
NK034(ngi)007:1428: nyid rang rig tu shes pa ya nga bag tsha
NK034(ngi)007:1429: kun dang bral rig pa ye sangs rgyas pas sangs
NK034(ngi)007:1430: rgyas la yang brod pa med gzhi la 'khor ba
NK034(ngi)007:1431: ma grub par shes pa 'khor bar ltung dogs sdug
NK034(ngi)007:1432: bsngal bral mya ngan 'das la de nyid rang rig
NK034(ngi)007:1433: yin par rtogs pas re ba med le'u bzhi yi
NK034(ngi)007:1434: gzhung don rdzogs i ti rgya nor bu 'phra bkod
NK034(ngi)007:1435: ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi tshig don bdun gyis bstan
NK034(ngi)007:1436: par bya ngo bo rang rig bzhi la spyod sna
NK034(ngi)007:1437: tshogs rang grol du nges tshig rnam pa gsum yin
NK034(ngi)007:1438: te rgyud gzhan gyi dgos pa 'dis skod phyir dgos
NK034(ngi)007:1439: 'dod 'byin pas ma tshang ba kha bskang ba nor
NK034(ngi)007:1440: bu'o rdo rje lug rgyud phra zhing 'gyu ba brtag
NK034(ngi)007:1441: dka' bas kun gyis mi mthong gzhi bzung bar dka'
NK034(ngi)007:1442: ba phra ba'i don de ltar rtogs daka'i ngo bo
NK034(ngi)007:1443: nyid ye shes de yul la khyab nam mkha' la
NK034(ngi)007:1444: 'char ba pas bkod pa'o dbye ba rnam pa gsum
NK034(ngi)007:1445: yin te snang ba thams cad rang shar rang grol
NK034(ngi)007:1446: longs spyod pas gzhi la longs spyod kun gyi nor
NK034(ngi)007:1447: bu dang 'dra rig pa de rlung shes kyi rtsal
NK034(ngi)007:1448: gyis phra dang 'khyug dang 'gyu ba'i tshe 'di nyid
NK034(ngi)007:1449: kyi gnad med par gzhan gyis mi mthong zab gting
NK034(ngi)007:1450: dpag dka' ba phyir phra snang ba dum bu dum
NK034(ngi)007:1451: bu'i 'od dum bur dum bur shar tshe mched pa
NK034(ngi)007:1452: rtogs phyir je che je che mthong bas bkod pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1453: don dgos pa ji lta bu zhe na rgyud gzhan
NK034(ngi)007:1454: 'dod pa rnams rgyud 'di nas rab tu ston byed
NK034(ngi)007:1455: pas phra mo'i don rnams rtogs byed pa'o dper na
NK034(ngi)007:1456: bzhu ba'i gser btso bsregs byas pa dang dang mtshungs
NK034(ngi)007:1457: khong don man ngag rnams bzhi ste du ston zhe
NK034(ngi)007:1458: na spyod pa gtsor byed lam du rnal 'byor dang
NK034(ngi)007:1459: sgom pa nyid lam du rgyun du byed pa dang
NK034(ngi)007:1460: lta ba nyid la gtsor lam du byed dang de
NK034(ngi)007:1461: bzhin 'bras bu lam byed pa'o spyod pa rnam pa
NK034(ngi)007:1462: gsum yin te bying rgod gseng ba'i spyod pa ni
NK034(ngi)007:1463: nyams len gyi dus gal te bying ba nyid yin
NK034(ngi)007:1464: na gnad ni rnam pa gsum bstan te lus kyi
NK034(ngi)007:1465: gnad du rgyug cing spyod pa sna tshogs byed pa
NK034(ngi)007:1466: dang yan lag gar la sogs pa bya mi 'dra
NK034(ngi)007:1467: ba mang po ngag gi gnad ni ha ha dang
NK034(ngi)007:1468: drag po lhang lhang ba hi hi h+aum h+aum drag
NK034(ngi)007:1469: ring thung bzlas shing yang na skad nyams la ci
NK034(ngi)007:1470: byung ba rnams drag por 'don sems rig pa la
NK034(ngi)007:1471: rab phab nas mig ni g.yas g.yon gyi zur la
NK034(ngi)007:1472: ril por mnan hrig hrig phar khrol tshur khrol bya
NK034(ngi)007:1473: bying ba la ni mchog tu de ltar byas na
NK034(ngi)007:1474: rig pa sos 'debs gsal rgod pa g.yeng ba'i nyams
NK034(ngi)007:1475: byung na snang ba skar khung sogs bkag la med
NK034(ngi)007:1476: pa'i khyim dag tu lus kyi gnad ni seng ge
NK034(ngi)007:1477: bzhin kha sbub tu nyal la lag pa gnyis sngas
NK034(ngi)007:1478: nas phar brkyang rkang pa yang brkyang ba'o mjing pa
NK034(ngi)007:1479: tshur nang du yid tsam thur la'o ngag ni ci
NK034(ngi)007:1480: yang gleng ba min rig pa tsit+ta'i phyir gzhan du
NK034(ngi)007:1481: mi 'gro bar dkyil du gzhug mig ni drag por
NK034(ngi)007:1482: btsum pa'o snang ba 'di ltar snang ba thams cad
NK034(ngi)007:1483: la thogs pa med par dbang bsgyur spyod pa ni
NK034(ngi)007:1484: 'byung ba'i sgra rnams la thun mong ma yin pa
NK034(ngi)007:1485: sgra thal 'gyur gyi man ngag skabs ltar goms na
NK034(ngi)007:1486: snang ba dag la ci mngon shes la sogs gsang
NK034(ngi)007:1487: rtags dgar 'gyur 'dug tshul gzhi thog ma nas gnas
NK034(ngi)007:1488: la spyod pa ni nam mkha'i khams su dbyings rig
NK034(ngi)007:1489: 'du 'bral med pa lu gu rgyud sku dang thig
NK034(ngi)007:1490: le rig pa'i rang gdangs shar ba rnams la spyod
NK034(ngi)007:1491: lus ngag mi g.yeng gzer de dang mi 'bral bar
NK034(ngi)007:1492: gtad btab ste rgyun du 'bral ba med gnas pas
NK034(ngi)007:1494: spyod dag ni byung srid kyang ngo bo nyid mthong
NK034(ngi)007:1495: bas ji ltar byas kyang mi lto de nyid rdul
NK034(ngi)007:1496: cha tsam mi 'grib rtag tu yang dang yang du
NK034(ngi)007:1497: de la goms pa ni dngos po rang rig pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1498: gnas lugs gshis mthong ba'i spyod pa'o sgom pa nyid
NK034(ngi)007:1499: ni 'di rang lam du byed na rnam gsum ste
NK034(ngi)007:1500: lha dang mi yi sems 'dzin gyis sna tshogs mtshan
NK034(ngi)007:1501: ma a dkar la sogs 'dzin pa ni stan bde
NK034(ngi)007:1502: bar lus kyi gnad ni skyil krung la dbugs kyi
NK034(ngi)007:1503: gnad ni nang du rngub kha sna'i dbugs bsdam rig
NK034(ngi)007:1504: pa'i gnad ni sna rtse'o mig kyang ngo byang chub
NK034(ngi)007:1505: sems shugs las skye bar 'dod de ma skyes na
NK034(ngi)007:1506: 'di ltar dpa'i bsam gtan ni bsam pa'i zhen pa
NK034(ngi)007:1507: 'gog pa ste dran pa la brtag lus kyi gnad
NK034(ngi)007:1508: ni skyil stan bde bar krung la sgal pa'i tshig
NK034(ngi)007:1509: ni drang por bsrangs byas nas lag pa mnyam pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1510: phyag rgya lte 'og tu bca' mgrin pa og ma
NK034(ngi)007:1511: brang la sor bzhis ma reg par yid tsam dgug
NK034(ngi)007:1512: pa'o mig ni sna yi rtse la dbab sems dpa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1513: mig ltar bya rig pa'i gnad ni smin phrag nas
NK034(ngi)007:1514: mda' gang tsam du 'di dag mig gis snang ba
NK034(ngi)007:1515: la mi lta bar dbugs ni nang du thub thang
NK034(ngi)007:1516: 'then pa la phar yang mchog tu rings par gtang
NK034(ngi)007:1517: yid ni stengs mer re bzhin sa la bzhag lam
NK034(ngi)007:1518: lam du byed pa lta ba dag ni rnam gsum
NK034(ngi)007:1519: la spyi dang 1 nang gi mtshan nyid dang2 khyad
NK034(ngi)007:1520: par chen po'i lta ba'o3 spyi ni theg pa brgyad
NK034(ngi)007:1521: po'i lam rim rtsol blo yi rim nang ni phyi
NK034(ngi)007:1522: skor nang skor gsang skor ba'o khyad par chen po'i
NK034(ngi)007:1523: lta ba ni lus gnad mig dang 'brel yul gnad
NK034(ngi)007:1524: nam mkha' sprin bral la rig pa'i gnad ni phyung
NK034(ngi)007:1525: ba mkha' la phyungs pas zla dang bral ba zhes
NK034(ngi)007:1526: kyang bya ste lta byed mig gis lta dbyings dang
NK034(ngi)007:1527: rig pa la bas na dgos 'dod yid bzhin nor
NK034(ngi)007:1528: ltar ji ltar lta na thams cad ye shes kyi
NK034(ngi)007:1529: snang ba blta rig pa lu gu rgyud ni 'od
NK034(ngi)007:1530: dang thig le sogs grangs mang bas gzhan gyis mi
NK034(ngi)007:1531: zin phra bar blta rtse gcig tu de nyid ye
NK034(ngi)007:1532: shes goms pa'i gnad kas khyab gdal bas ci yang
NK034(ngi)007:1533: ma rig pa la sogs 'jig rten gyi spyod pa
NK034(ngi)007:1534: mi spangs bkod pa lta'o 'bras bu lam byed nyid
NK034(ngi)007:1535: kyang spyi dang khyad par gsum yin te spyi yi
NK034(ngi)007:1536: rim dgus ji ltar 'bad kyang lha mi 'bral mthar
NK034(ngi)007:1537: thug las mi thob rang gi phyi skor sogs 'od
NK034(ngi)007:1538: gsal lha rnams so khyad par 'di nyid kyis sku
NK034(ngi)007:1539: gsum phyir mi ldog ci yi phyir na snang ba
NK034(ngi)007:1540: 'di nyid thams cad du sku gsum rig pa gtan
NK034(ngi)007:1541: la 'dis phebs pa sa la sogs pas na phyi
NK034(ngi)007:1542: nas 'di nyid du gtan la phebs pas re dang
NK034(ngi)007:1543: dogs med par 'di nyid rang chos sku dang rig
NK034(ngi)007:1544: pa 'du 'bral med pas la 'tshang rgya'o de la
NK034(ngi)007:1545: ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i phyir 'khor 'das grub med
NK034(ngi)007:1546: pas gzhan rang yin par 'di nyid la gtan la
NK034(ngi)007:1547: phebs pas rtsol 'dod dang bral bas na smin pas
NK034(ngi)007:1548: ma rig pa ye nas grol bas smin pa lam
NK034(ngi)007:1549: du byas mchog tu smin pas nyams su blangs pa
NK034(ngi)007:1550: de yang gzhan du btsal du med pas 'od ces
NK034(ngi)007:1551: so le'u bcu bzhis gzhung don rdzogs i ti rgya
NK034(ngi)007:1552: nyi zla kha sbyor zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi tshig
NK034(ngi)007:1553: don bdun du bsdus te gsal bar bya ngo bo
NK034(ngi)007:1554: mnyam pas thabs de la bltas pas dang shes rab
NK034(ngi)007:1555: yin nges tshig rnam pa gsum du bstan 'khor 'di
NK034(ngi)007:1556: ltar 'das snang ba'i chos rnams ni chos nyid ma
NK034(ngi)007:1557: la thim phyir rig pa nyi ma ste rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:1558: ma 'dres bu la snang bas zla bar bstan 'khor
NK034(ngi)007:1559: 'das 'byung ba lnga rang sar grol ba zhes kyang
NK034(ngi)007:1560: bya 'dres pa kha sbyor ro dbye ba rnam pa
NK034(ngi)007:1561: bzhi yin te gsang chags can yum gyi bde ba
NK034(ngi)007:1562: lam du byed pa ba snyoms 'jug kha sbyor dang
NK034(ngi)007:1564: pa'i kha sbyor dang lam rig 'dres pa'i bar do
NK034(ngi)007:1565: la rig pa rang snang ba gnyis kha sbyor dang
NK034(ngi)007:1566: dbyings rig gdod nas dbyer med pa ye nas kha
NK034(ngi)007:1567: sbyor ro dgos 'dod dbang po 'bring po nyid chos
NK034(ngi)007:1568: nyid kyi bar dor grol bar bstan pa'o dper na
NK034(ngi)007:1569: ma bu phrad pa bzhin tshom bu la sogs rang
NK034(ngi)007:1570: snang yin par rang gi yid ches rim gyis grol
NK034(ngi)007:1571: khong don man ngag bzhi yin te rang bzhin gnas
NK034(ngi)007:1572: pa'i bar ma dor 'dir rang gi shes pa'i gros
NK034(ngi)007:1573: thag man ngag la nan chags su bya bcad dper
NK034(ngi)007:1574: na mthun pa'i grogs ltar dbyings rig la rtag tu
NK034(ngi)007:1575: mi 'bral ba ra 'grogs 'chi kha ma yi bar
NK034(ngi)007:1576: ma lus kyi stobs nyams nas dbugs ngar ngar du
NK034(ngi)007:1577: song ba'i tshe dor man ngag gsang ba'i gser thig
NK034(ngi)007:1578: gsal gdab dper na rdzi'u'i grangs re re la bsngo
NK034(ngi)007:1579: bgrang nan tan bya ltar 'grogs chos nyid ma yi
NK034(ngi)007:1580: bar ma dor 'od dang 'od khyim du shar bas
NK034(ngi)007:1581: bla ma'i gdams ngag dran pas bzung rang ngo shes
NK034(ngi)007:1582: par bya dper na goms 'dris mi sngar 'dris kyi
NK034(ngi)007:1583: mi phyis phrad na ngo shes pa ltar ltos srid
NK034(ngi)007:1584: par 'jug pa'i bar ma dor zab mo'i goms nus
NK034(ngi)007:1585: 'di yi gdams pa mthong ba'i stobs kyis rang bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:1586: sprul sku'i zhing dper na longs spyod che zhing dbang
NK034(ngi)007:1587: 'byor pa rgyal po lta bus 'dug le'u bzhi yis
NK034(ngi)007:1588: gzhung don rdzogs i ti rgya rgya rgya ngo sprod
NK034(ngi)007:1589: rang la yod pa'i snang ba de gdams pa bstan
NK034(ngi)007:1590: nas ngo shes par byed pas spras pa zhes bya
NK034(ngi)007:1591: ba'i rgyud kyi tshig don bdun gyis bshad par bya
NK034(ngi)007:1592: ngo bo rang snang la yid ches pa'i nges shes
NK034(ngi)007:1593: brtan par byed nges tshig rnam pa gsum yin te
NK034(ngi)007:1594: ngo bo rang rig tshul la yang sprod pa bla
NK034(ngi)007:1595: ma'i gdams dpe don rtags gsum la sogs ngag go
NK034(ngi)007:1596: spras pa 'od la bdun ye shes la bdun rig
NK034(ngi)007:1597: pa la bdun te nyi shu rtsa gcig gis gang
NK034(ngi)007:1598: zag blo la dbang po nyi shu rtsa gcig gi
NK034(ngi)007:1599: don du go bar byed dbye ba bsdus pa'i rnam
NK034(ngi)007:1600: pa gsum yin te snang ba'i yul 'byung ba nyi
NK034(ngi)007:1601: shu rtsa lnga zer ba gcig la sogs la ngo
NK034(ngi)007:1602: sprod dang rig pa dran pa rang sangs kyi gdams
NK034(ngi)007:1603: ngag sems la ngo sprod dang blo dman ngo sprod
NK034(ngi)007:1604: nyer gcig sogs drang ba'i ngo sprod do dgos pa
NK034(ngi)007:1605: rig pa rang la gnas med rang ngo sprod dper
NK034(ngi)007:1606: na me long du bzhin gsal ba dang g.ya' dag
NK034(ngi)007:1607: 'dra khong don man ngag rnam bzhi ste dpe man
NK034(ngi)007:1608: shel don rig pa rtags kyi sgron ma gsum yid
NK034(ngi)007:1609: ches bskyed rig dang ye shes 'od gsum gyis la
NK034(ngi)007:1610: bdun tshan lag len man ngag grangs nyer gcig shes
NK034(ngi)007:1611: bya sku gsum chos sku ngo sprod kyi gamadasa ngag
NK034(ngi)007:1612: gis rig pa nyid cer mthong du bstan longs sku
NK034(ngi)007:1613: ngo sprod kyi gdams ngag gis rig pa dbyings kyi
NK034(ngi)007:1614: go rar gzhug sprul sku ngo sprod kyi man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:1615: gis 'khrul snang zhing khams su sbyang ba'o //
NK034(ngi)007:1616: de yang chos sku rang rig yin par yid ches /
NK034(ngi)007:1617: longs sku de las byung ba'i sku'i snang ba dang 'od thig le yin par yid ches /
NK034(ngi)007:1618: sprul sku de la lta byed ma 'gags pas rang
NK034(ngi)007:1619: snang du yid ches pa ste lhag mthong ngo sprod
NK034(ngi)007:1620: kyis mthar phyin 'bras bu gtan la dbab gnad gsum
NK034(ngi)007:1621: bzhag lus kyi gnad snying gi nang na sku dang
NK034(ngi)007:1622: ye shes su gnas pa srog gi gnad rtsa'i nang
NK034(ngi)007:1623: na thig le dbang po'i gnad mig gi sgron ma'i
NK034(ngi)007:1624: nang du rtag tu 'char pa'i ngo sprod kyis rang
NK034(ngi)007:1625: gi 'dug tshul nyams su blang de la gnad gsum
NK034(ngi)007:1626: ngo sprod ni de ltar ye shes lus kyi gnad
NK034(ngi)007:1627: la brten 'od yul gyi gnad rig pa lta ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:1628: gnad la brten pas nyi shu rtsa gcig tu phye
NK034(ngi)007:1629: yang dbang po spros pa la dga' ba'i don yin
NK034(ngi)007:1630: te grangs gzhan nyer gcig de dag kun 'di nyid
NK034(ngi)007:1631: du ni rnam par bsdus na /
NK034(ngi)007:1632: ye shes lus gnad sgron ma mig nas 'char bas
NK034(ngi)007:1633: mig tu 'dus 'od ni yul gnad sprin bral la
NK034(ngi)007:1634: 'char bas nam mkha'o rig pa mig gi mthong gnad
NK034(ngi)007:1635: lu gu rgyud sprul sku lus gnad snying dran pa
NK034(ngi)007:1636: bskyed pa'i gzhi yin te longs sku yul gnad kha
NK034(ngi)007:1637: dog gsal ba'i yul dbyings su bstan chos sku rig
NK034(ngi)007:1638: gnad lu gu rgyud brten pa mngon sum du dpe
NK034(ngi)007:1639: ni lus gnad dran pa bskyed gzhi rtsa yin te
NK034(ngi)007:1640: rtags ni yul gzhi yi snang ba rang gnad sgron
NK034(ngi)007:1641: ma'o don ni rig gnad dbyings rig 'du 'bral med
NK034(ngi)007:1642: pa 'dris gzhung don le'u gsum gyis rdzogs i ti
NK034(ngi)007:1643: rgya rgya rgya mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:1644: don bdun las ngo bo man ngag tshig bcu gcig
NK034(ngi)007:1645: khrigs chags kyis 'khrul pa'i yul rkyen gzhi la rang
NK034(ngi)007:1646: dag bzlog nges tshig rnam pa gnyis yin te mu
NK034(ngi)007:1647: tig man ngag khrigs dang dum bus gang zag gi
NK034(ngi)007:1649: 'brel phreng bas grangs rnams gcig tu sdud dbye ba
NK034(ngi)007:1650: rnam pa bzhi yin te gzhi gnas rang sar ye
NK034(ngi)007:1651: nas rang la yod pa grol bas mu gnad gsum
NK034(ngi)007:1652: lus gnad snying srog gnad rtsa dbang po'i gnad mig
NK034(ngi)007:1653: go mi 'gyur gzer 'debs tig 'dod pa'i de ltar
NK034(ngi)007:1654: gnad gsum bstan pas don spyod rin po che dbyings
NK034(ngi)007:1655: rig 'du 'bral med par rgyun chags gnas phyir phreng
NK034(ngi)007:1656: dgos pa man ngag dum bur tshig nyung don 'dus
NK034(ngi)007:1657: par ston dper na ji 'dra mu tig khrigs chags
NK034(ngi)007:1658: su brgyus legs 'dra khong don man ngag rnam pa
NK034(ngi)007:1659: gsum 'khrul pa rang dag rang gis rang grol bar
NK034(ngi)007:1660: bstan rkyen grol mu gal mdo bcu gcig sdud byed
NK034(ngi)007:1661: grol byed tig gnad lus sogs gsum thob yul nyams
NK034(ngi)007:1662: len phreng 'khrul pa du ma ro gcig tu shes
NK034(ngi)007:1663: pas grol tshul dbang po rno rtul gyis gnyis yin
NK034(ngi)007:1664: te 'bad med 'khrul pa rang gis rang grol ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:1665: man ngag rang gis rang grol dang 'bad bcas nyams
NK034(ngi)007:1666: len gyi dus su lus 'dug stangs kyi gnad yul
NK034(ngi)007:1667: rkyen med kyi gnad rig pa ma rtsol ba'i gnad
NK034(ngi)007:1668: do // gnad dang 'brel ba'o gal mdo'i man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:1669: bcu gcig ste sngon byung thog ma rtogs te sangs
NK034(ngi)007:1670: rgyas ma byung ma rtogs te sems can ma byung
NK034(ngi)007:1671: ba'i gnas lugs ka dag gzhi ngo bo 'khrul pa
NK034(ngi)007:1672: mi mnga' ba'i ye shes 'byed pa med par ka
NK034(ngi)007:1673: nas dag pa'i rig pa la bzhugs so //
NK034(ngi)007:1674: rang bzhin thugs rje cha yis ma gos pa'i snang
NK034(ngi)007:1675: ba kha dog las 'das pa'i gsal ba rang dag
NK034(ngi)007:1676: tu bzhugs so // ni ye shes phra ba'i ye
NK034(ngi)007:1677: shes su 'dod de de med na bem po dang
NK034(ngi)007:1678: khyad med rags pa rang gzugs sku gnyis dang khyad
NK034(ngi)007:1679: med pas phra bar yod gsum gyi bdag nyid do
NK034(ngi)007:1680: de yang rang gi 'dug tshul gyi cha la ngo
NK034(ngi)007:1681: bo ka dag gi ye shes de 'khrul ma myong
NK034(ngi)007:1682: bas rang bzhin lhun grub kyi ye shes so //
NK034(ngi)007:1683: gsal byed bag la nyal te cha tshang bar yod //
NK034(ngi)007:1684: thugs rje kun khyab kyi ye shes rang bzhin shugs
NK034(ngi)007:1685: la gsal de las ma nges lhun grub gzhi sna
NK034(ngi)007:1686: tshogs ma nges pa'i gzhi zhes bya ste lhun grub
NK034(ngi)007:1687: rin po che'i lus la bag chags kyi sa bon
NK034(ngi)007:1688: langs te nyon mongs pa lnga'i sa bon bag tsam
NK034(ngi)007:1689: byung ma rig gsum rgyu bdag nyid gcig pa'i ma
NK034(ngi)007:1690: rig pa ni rang gi gzhi yi cha las byung
NK034(ngi)007:1691: de nyid rang bzhin lhan cig pa skyes pa'i ma
NK034(ngi)007:1692: rig pa ni dus mnyam pa'i sku ste shes pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1693: cha kun btags kyi ma rig pa yul gyi cha'o
NK034(ngi)007:1694: // dang rkyen bzhi dang rgyu'i rkyen ma rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:1695: dngos bdag po'i rkyen shes pa rags pa'i cha ste
NK034(ngi)007:1696: rtogs pa dmigs rkyen yul du mar shar ba la
NK034(ngi)007:1697: bdag por gzung ste de gsum dus mtshungs pa de
NK034(ngi)007:1698: ma thag pa'i rkyen zhes bya'o //
NK034(ngi)007:1699: shes pa sbags pa'i de rang gzhan dang gzhi shes khyad par las /
NK034(ngi)007:1700: 'khrul pa'o 'khrul nas khams gsum sems can la sems can la ji ltar gnas na /
NK034(ngi)007:1701: gzhi gnas ye shes snying na spyan gsum dag tu
NK034(ngi)007:1702: gnas te rang gi ngo bo de snying gi dkyil
NK034(ngi)007:1703: na sku nyung 'bru tsam de 'od lnga'i gong bur
NK034(ngi)007:1704: tshon sna lnga'i gru gu dril ba ltar gnas so
NK034(ngi)007:1705: gnas 'gyur med rtsa chen bzhi nas ro ma rkyang
NK034(ngi)007:1706: ma kun d+har ma dang ka ti gser gyi rtsa
NK034(ngi)007:1707: chen zhes bya shel sbug can zhes bya a wa
NK034(ngi)007:1708: d+hu ti nas yi ge sran ma'i ga'u sleb pa
NK034(ngi)007:1709: tsam du rgyud rlung gi stobs kyis rgyu 'char byed
NK034(ngi)007:1710: mig sogs mig gnyis rna ba gnyis tshangs bug dang
NK034(ngi)007:1711: lnga zer sgo bzhi'o yul ni gang la shar na
NK034(ngi)007:1712: nam mkha' sprin med stong pa la de nyid nyams
NK034(ngi)007:1713: su blangs pa ni rnal 'byor spyod pa la rgyun
NK034(ngi)007:1714: du byed pa'i rnal 'byor sgom pa dang lta ba
NK034(ngi)007:1715: dang 'bras bu rgyun du byed pa bzhi dang bzhag
NK034(ngi)007:1716: thabs bzhi snang ba cog bzhag rgya mtsho ri bo
NK034(ngi)007:1717: rig pa cog bzhag go dgongs chen bzhi dang gnas
NK034(ngi)007:1718: bsgyur gnas dag rgyas gdab rang grol bzhi dag lugs
NK034(ngi)007:1719: bzhi snang srid gzhi bzhengs ni 'khor 'das rang gi
NK034(ngi)007:1720: blo la shar ba la bya /
NK034(ngi)007:1721: snang srid bzhi bzhag ni de nyid bdag tu ma grub par rang sar bzhag pa la bya /
NK034(ngi)007:1722: khams gsum yongs grol ni thams cad rang sar rang grol ba la bya /
NK034(ngi)007:1723: srid gsum ka dag gi dgongs pa ni rig pa ye nas sangs rgyas par shes pa la bya'o //
NK034(ngi)007:1724: zin lugs bzhi dmangs cham la phab ste mi 'gyur /
NK034(ngi)007:1725: blon po btson du zin te rgyal po gdan sa
NK034(ngi)007:1726: zin te rig pa rang sa zin te mi 'gyur
NK034(ngi)007:1727: ba'o // dang bcu drug go tshad ni gding bzhi'i
NK034(ngi)007:1728: rnal 'byor ro gong ltar ro bar do 'od rig
NK034(ngi)007:1729: pa la 'jug rig pa 'od la 'jug rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:1730: 'byung ba las grol sems 'khrul pa las grol lhun
NK034(ngi)007:1731: grub rang gi sa la nges pa rnyed nas rang
NK034(ngi)007:1732: gi 'dug tshul du shes pa ni mthar phyin no
NK034(ngi)007:1733: grol sa thog ma gang ka dag gi ngang du
NK034(ngi)007:1734: grol ba yin pa'o nyams su len pa rnam gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:1735: te 'bad chung rtsol ba med par shes rab kyis
NK034(ngi)007:1736: rang grol ba dbang po rab dang rtsol te lus
NK034(ngi)007:1737: sems kyi gnad gzir rang grol ba blo dman pa
NK034(ngi)007:1738: gnyis lo shes pas grol ba gnyis yin te snang
NK034(ngi)007:1739: ba khregs chod la gdams te phyi'i yul snang thams
NK034(ngi)007:1740: cad rang las byung zhing rang gi ngang du grol
NK034(ngi)007:1741: tsam na phyi rol gyi snang ba ngan pa'i blo
NK034(ngi)007:1742: skye mi srid de rigs snang mthong ba'i gnad kas
NK034(ngi)007:1743: dper na chu'i 'ol kha bsgyur ba lta bu dbyings
NK034(ngi)007:1744: dang ma bral ba nyams len dang rig pa thod
NK034(ngi)007:1745: brgal la gdams te de ltar snang ba la goms
NK034(ngi)007:1746: pas rig pa cer mthong snang ba cer grol shes
NK034(ngi)007:1747: pa rang yan du bsgoms pas ye shes sgom du
NK034(ngi)007:1748: shes te 'bad cing lus kyi gnad gzir ba'i dgos
NK034(ngi)007:1749: pa de nyid la chod pa'o //
NK034(ngi)007:1750: gnyis yin no rtsol ba can de rnam pa gsum
NK034(ngi)007:1751: 'dug stangs gsum la shes pa bying na skyes bu'i
NK034(ngi)007:1752: rgyangs thabs te rtag tu rgod na drang srong gi
NK034(ngi)007:1753: 'dug stangs bying rgod gang yang med tsa na glang
NK034(ngi)007:1755: gzhi bca' ste mi 'gul gsum gyis lus ma 'gul
NK034(ngi)007:1756: bas mig mi 'gul de ma 'gul bas rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:1757: mi 'gul ba'o // de nas shes pa rang sa zin pa'o //
NK034(ngi)007:1758: gtan la phab sdod pa gsum gyis dbyings sdod pas
NK034(ngi)007:1759: rig pa sdod de sdod pas 'gro 'ong chad de
NK034(ngi)007:1760: las kyi rlung zad ye shes kyi rlung zin pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1761: rtags / rig pa sdod pas gzhi ma 'degs pas chos nyid rkyen bzhi las grol ba'i rtags so //
NK034(ngi)007:1762: tshad rnams bzung grol ba gsum gyis dbyings 'byung ba
NK034(ngi)007:1763: las grol des sa rdo la sogs 'byung ba'i snang
NK034(ngi)007:1764: ba 'gag / rig pa rlung las grol te mi 'gyur bar sdod /
NK034(ngi)007:1765: lus rkyen las grol te gnad gzung mi dgos pa ji ltar byas kyang snang ba zin pa'o //
NK034(ngi)007:1766: yid ches bya smin pa gsum gyis dbyings smin pas kha dog lnga ma 'dres par 'char /
NK034(ngi)007:1767: thig le smin pas nang du sku re re rig
NK034(ngi)007:1768: pa smin pas gar gtad du sdod pa ni phyir
NK034(ngi)007:1769: mi ldog pa'o // brtan par bya thob pa gsum
NK034(ngi)007:1770: gyis mthar phyin dbyings gzhal yas khang du thob pa
NK034(ngi)007:1771: dang rig pa gtan grol du thob pa dang 'khrul
NK034(ngi)007:1772: rkyen sna tshogs dbyings rig tu thob pa ni de
NK034(ngi)007:1773: las yar gshegs kyang shul med pa zhes bya'o //
NK034(ngi)007:1774: pa'o le'u brgyad kyis gzhung don rdzogs i ti rgya
NK034(ngi)007:1775: rgya rgya rig pa rang grol zhes bya ba'i rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:1776: de'i tshig don bdun gyis gsal bar bya ngo bo
NK034(ngi)007:1777: rang rang shar la sogs pa'i rgyud tshig gzhan grol
NK034(ngi)007:1778: bar byed nges tshig ma rig sogs 'khrul pa'i rtog
NK034(ngi)007:1779: pa du mas dam du bcings pa gzhan la ma
NK034(ngi)007:1780: ltos par rang gis grol bas rang grol zhes dbye
NK034(ngi)007:1781: na rnam pa gsum yin te snang ba rang sar
NK034(ngi)007:1782: grol phyir rig gzhan la ltos pa med pas mtha'
NK034(ngi)007:1783: rnams 'gags phyir rang snang ba spyir rang sems kyi
NK034(ngi)007:1784: mtshan nyid the tshom gcod pas grol dper na sbrul
NK034(ngi)007:1785: mdud rang grol bzhin dgos pa rnam pa gnyis yin
NK034(ngi)007:1786: te rgyud gzhan the rang shar gyi tshom gcod pas
NK034(ngi)007:1787: rang rtog med rig pa rang shar grol khong don
NK034(ngi)007:1788: man ngag du zhe na rnam gsum ste gcig pu
NK034(ngi)007:1789: grogs dang bral bar 'dug pas rang rang gcig pur
NK034(ngi)007:1790: 'dug pas thams cad grogs su shar te rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:1791: yang gcer bu phyungs zhes bya'o //
NK034(ngi)007:1792: lug rgyud rten med mkha' la phyungs pas rig rig
NK034(ngi)007:1793: pa lus la mi bzhag par mkha' la phyungs te
NK034(ngi)007:1794: de nyid la bltas pas ye shes rtsal dang 'od
NK034(ngi)007:1795: du 'char chos nyid kyi rtsal lu gu rgyud sku'i
NK034(ngi)007:1797: de yang dang po shes la thabs kyi rig pas snang ba cer bzhag /
NK034(ngi)007:1798: de yang 'od dang thig le dang rig pa nyid
NK034(ngi)007:1799: la bdag tu 'ching ba'i blos mi gzung bar rang
NK034(ngi)007:1800: snang rang grol du snang ba thams cad thad kar
NK034(ngi)007:1801: gcod pa'o // dbyings su shar bas grol le'u dgu
NK034(ngi)007:1802: yis rgyud gzhung don rnams rdzogs i ti rgya rdzogs
NK034(ngi)007:1803: pa rang byung zhes bya ba'i don bdun te ngo
NK034(ngi)007:1804: bo dbang bzhi 'bras bu rdzogs rang la gnas pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1805: nges tshig rang las byung phyir gzhan nas bcug pa
NK034(ngi)007:1806: lta bu min bskur dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin
NK034(ngi)007:1807: te ma bskur gzhi la gnas pas rdzogs blo rab
NK034(ngi)007:1808: la bskur rgyu med par bstan gzhan min de ye
NK034(ngi)007:1809: nas rang la yod pa'i gnad kas /
NK034(ngi)007:1810: nyid las byung bas rang rdzas bcas phyi rdzas la
NK034(ngi)007:1811: brten nas dman pa rnams grol bar byed pas bskur
NK034(ngi)007:1812: du yod phyir byung byin rlabs rgyun mi chad pas
NK034(ngi)007:1813: dper na chu bo'i rgyun lta bu dgos pa rnam
NK034(ngi)007:1814: pa gnyis yin te mtshon pa rdzas kyis dbang po
NK034(ngi)007:1815: dman pa rnams la rdzas kyis brda don rtogs rig
NK034(ngi)007:1816: pa rtsal gyis blo rab la rig pa'i rang ngo
NK034(ngi)007:1817: sprad pas rang byung rnyed khong don man ngag gsum
NK034(ngi)007:1818: yin te phyi nang dbang rdzas dang dkyil 'khor la
NK034(ngi)007:1819: brten pa ni rnam gnyis kyis dbang po rtul po
NK034(ngi)007:1820: sngags kyi skal ba dang mi ldan pa rnams 'jug
NK034(ngi)007:1821: pa'i dgos pa yod gzhug par bya gsang ba rig
NK034(ngi)007:1822: ma la brten pa shes rab ye shes kyis chags
NK034(ngi)007:1823: pa can rnams snyoms 'jug gi bde ba la brten
NK034(ngi)007:1824: nas rig pa'i bde ba la blta ru gzhug lam
NK034(ngi)007:1825: du drang rang rig yongs rdzogs tshig dbang zhes bya
NK034(ngi)007:1826: ste gdams pa dngos kyis dbang chen gyis skal ldan
NK034(ngi)007:1827: la lus yul rig pa'i gnad kyi man ngag bstan
NK034(ngi)007:1828: de nyid rnam pa gsum yin te lus ni lus
NK034(ngi)007:1829: dwangs snyigs 'byed par byed pas na sku gsum gyi
NK034(ngi)007:1830: gnad yin te / dang po ma'i mngal du ma
NK034(ngi)007:1831: tshud pa'i dus chos skur gnas de nas mer mer
NK034(ngi)007:1832: po sogs na zla ba bcu'i bar la longs sku
NK034(ngi)007:1833: ste shes pa nang gsal btsas nas sprul sku drag
NK034(ngi)007:1835: dal byed sku gsum rdzogs rtsa ni 'gul byed byang
NK034(ngi)007:1836: g.yas na thabs kyi rtsa ste ye shes skye ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:1837: rgyu / g.yon na shes rab kyi rtsa ste rtogs
NK034(ngi)007:1838: pa 'char sems rang mig ni lta byed sgron ma
NK034(ngi)007:1839: byung g.yas na ye shes kyi rlung gi cha gser
NK034(ngi)007:1840: gyi rlangs pa tsam las 'od dang thig le stong
NK034(ngi)007:1841: rgyu / pa / g.yon shes pa'i rtsa rta rnga
NK034(ngi)007:1842: bcur gshags tsam gyi cha las shes rab rang byung
NK034(ngi)007:1843: gi sgron ma dang rgyang zhags chu'i sgron ma gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:1844: dbus rlung gi zer til 'bru'i bdun cha tsam las
NK034(ngi)007:1845: tshangs pa'i bu gar rig pa rtog med pa'i mdangs
NK034(ngi)007:1846: rgyu / pa / rgyu'o // rlung gi cha la
NK034(ngi)007:1847: rna ba gnyis nas rgyu ste rtags su mnan pas
NK034(ngi)007:1849: lung chen brgyad kyis gzhung don rdzogs i ti rgya
NK034(ngi)007:1850: kun tu bzang po klong drug gi rgyud kyi tshig
NK034(ngi)007:1851: don bshad par bya ngo bo chos nyid rang gi
NK034(ngi)007:1852: rig pa gcig pur sdud nges tshig rnam pa gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:1853: yin te zad cing bri ba med phyir chos dbyings
NK034(ngi)007:1854: rgya che ba la mtha' yas pas klong 'gro drug
NK034(ngi)007:1855: gnas su dag phyir drug dbye ba dag ni bzhi
NK034(ngi)007:1856: yin te rnam dag shes rab kyis dbyings su skyel
NK034(ngi)007:1857: bas klong rigs drug gi skye gnas dag par byed
NK034(ngi)007:1858: pas gtan nas sprug phyir drug yul rkyen rang sar
NK034(ngi)007:1859: grol bas klong rnam dag du 'khrul pa glo bur
NK034(ngi)007:1860: gyi chos ma dag phyir drug dper na khyung chen
NK034(ngi)007:1861: thad kar gcad de 'gro ba bzhin mkha' lding 'dra
NK034(ngi)007:1862: dgos pa rnam pa gnyis yin te 'khor ba'i nyon
NK034(ngi)007:1863: mongs pa rba klong skems pas klong 'khrul pa'i rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:1864: pa rtsad gcod drug khong don man ngag rnam gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:1865: te rigs drug gi skye gnas rang dag la gtong
NK034(ngi)007:1866: ba'i thabs 'bros khungs gcod pas drug rang snang lhug
NK034(ngi)007:1867: nyams su len pas dbyings rig 'du 'bral med par
NK034(ngi)007:1868: par 'dug pas klong de yi man ngag rnam gsum
NK034(ngi)007:1869: ste 'gro drug 'bros skye ba bzhi khungs bcad pas
NK034(ngi)007:1870: yul gzugs sogs drug rnam par dag rang snang lhug
NK034(ngi)007:1871: par shar bas 'byung sa chu me rlung bzhi'i rkyen
NK034(ngi)007:1872: dang bral lus kyi gnad gsum snying rtsa mig gi
NK034(ngi)007:1873: de nyid gzir bas 'khrul pa dag par byed phyags
NK034(ngi)007:1874: mas btab rig pa'i 'bros khungs ma rtogs pa'i yul
NK034(ngi)007:1875: yul can gtibs pas 'khor ba'i rdos thag bcad gnas
NK034(ngi)007:1876: gsum mig gcig tu dril bas gtad sa'i 'ben dang
NK034(ngi)007:1877: rdo rje lu gu rgyud phrad skabs ni rnam pa
NK034(ngi)007:1878: drug dag gis gzhung gi tshad rnams rdzogs pa'o i
NK034(ngi)007:1879: ti rgya sku gdung 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i don
NK034(ngi)007:1880: la bdun ngo bo mi 'gyur ye shes stong pa
NK034(ngi)007:1881: rgya yan gyi lta ba so nges tshig sangs rgyas
NK034(ngi)007:1882: thams cad kyi brgyud pa rang la yod tshul gtan
NK034(ngi)007:1883: la 'bebs pa'i phyir sku gdung 'bar ba zhes bya'o
NK034(ngi)007:1884: zhes bya ste rang gi rtags bzhi yin /
NK034(ngi)007:1885: dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin te sku gsum gtan
NK034(ngi)007:1886: la 'bebs pas sku lta ba rang byung ye dag
NK034(ngi)007:1887: chen po'i dgongs pa 'gyur med gdung sgron mas rang
NK034(ngi)007:1888: gi lus rnams khyab pas 'bar dper na rgyal rigs
NK034(ngi)007:1889: btsun la spyod pa chen po po lta bu'o dgongs
NK034(ngi)007:1890: pa rig nyams su blangs pa'i rtogs rnams ston khong
NK034(ngi)007:1891: don man ngag rnam gsum ste gnad gsum gyis nyams
NK034(ngi)007:1892: su blangs pa'i stobs kyis goms tshad rgyud nyid smin
NK034(ngi)007:1893: pas sku dag pa'i mkha' la nam mkha' dang rig
NK034(ngi)007:1894: pa mig gsum mi 'bral bas gzer chen thebs pas
NK034(ngi)007:1895: gdung nyams blangs rang nyams gong nas gong du 'phel
NK034(ngi)007:1896: ba goms pa'i rtags dang ldan pas 'bar gnad gsum
NK034(ngi)007:1897: man ngag tshad la ni nyams su blangs pas goms
NK034(ngi)007:1898: lus ni sku gsum rang lus pas 'bras bu phyir
NK034(ngi)007:1899: mi ldog par bstan bag rdul dengs pa'i nam mkha'
NK034(ngi)007:1900: la gzhan nas ma btsal bar sangs rgya ba'i dgos
NK034(ngi)007:1901: pa yod rten dang bral ba'i rig pa gtad rdo
NK034(ngi)007:1902: rje lu gu rgyud de bsgoms pa'i tshe tshig rnams
NK034(ngi)007:1904: nyams blangs goms pa'i rtags ni rnam gsum ste phyi
NK034(ngi)007:1905: lus dang nang ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba rtags
NK034(ngi)007:1906: yin no lus kyi rtags ni rnam pa gnyis yin
NK034(ngi)007:1907: te sngon phung po yod kyi bar du rtags dang
NK034(ngi)007:1908: phyis phung po bor ba'i kyi rtags yin no sngon
NK034(ngi)007:1909: du rig pa'i gnad gzir goms pa yis 'di dag
NK034(ngi)007:1910: rnams ni 'dod pa med kyang 'byung chos nyid snum
NK034(ngi)007:1911: dang ldan pas lus la snum sha chags skye med
NK034(ngi)007:1912: rtsa ba mthong bas lus kyi 'bu srin dengs ye
NK034(ngi)007:1913: shes rlung tshad zin pas gzugs med rlung ltar mgyogs
NK034(ngi)007:1914: rdos bcas 'khrul pa zhig pas phyi nang gi 'khrul
NK034(ngi)007:1915: pa rang sar dengs pas shing bal 'dab ltar yang
NK034(ngi)007:1916: rang lus sku ru grol sha khrag mi snang bas
NK034(ngi)007:1917: bas mkha' la bya ltar 'gro sngon du 'di dag
NK034(ngi)007:1918: 'dod pa med kyang 'byung rigs kyi bu de mya
NK034(ngi)007:1919: ngan 'da' ba'i tshe phyis kyi rtags ni dbyings nyid
NK034(ngi)007:1920: smin pa'i rtags su phung po la 'ja' zug pa
NK034(ngi)007:1921: sogs 'od rnams 'byung thig le smin pa'i rtags su
NK034(ngi)007:1922: rigs lnga'i gdung yong ste sku gsum sa la goms
NK034(ngi)007:1923: pas lha'i gzugs sku yang 'byung de ltar rtags ni
NK034(ngi)007:1924: mi 'dod bzhin du gang zag 'dren pa'i don du
NK034(ngi)007:1925: 'byung ngag gi nang rtags rnam pa 'di don nyid
NK034(ngi)007:1926: yin no chos nyid ma dang goms pas ci smras
NK034(ngi)007:1927: gzhan la phan gzhan la nus pa 'jug cing byin
NK034(ngi)007:1928: rlabs skye 'jig rten snang ba nub pas 'khrul pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1929: tshig mi 'byung rgya la byung yang gzhan don du
NK034(ngi)007:1930: 'gyur spros bral chos nyid rtogs pas lkugs pa lta
NK034(ngi)007:1931: bur 'gyur 'di dag rnams ni rang bzhin babs kyis
NK034(ngi)007:1932: 'byung gsang ba sems kyi las su 'di lta bu
NK034(ngi)007:1933: yang 'byung theg chen don dang phrad pas 'gro la
NK034(ngi)007:1934: snying rje rang bzhin gyis skye 'khrul snang zhen pa
NK034(ngi)007:1935: 'gags pas gang bsam yul der phyin shes bya rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:1936: la shar bas pha rol gyi sems shes pa sogs
NK034(ngi)007:1937: mngon shes drug kyang 'char snang srid stong par shes
NK034(ngi)007:1938: pas dngos po'i mtha' zad pas shes pa gar gtad
NK034(ngi)007:1939: sar mer gyis 'jug nus gang gtad lhan gyis 'ju
NK034(ngi)007:1940: sems nyid mkha' la phyungs pas chu la nya ltar
NK034(ngi)007:1941: bying ba med cir snang chos skur grol bas ri
NK034(ngi)007:1942: la zang thal lo thogs med du le'u gsum gyis
NK034(ngi)007:1943: gzhung tshad rdzogs i ti rgya rgya rgya rin chen
NK034(ngi)007:1944: spungs pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud la bdun te ngo
NK034(ngi)007:1945: bo rig pa'i yon tan bskyed par byed nges tshig
NK034(ngi)007:1946: rnam pa gnyis yin te dbyings rig /
NK034(ngi)007:1947: yon tan rdzogs pas rin po che ngo bo la
NK034(ngi)007:1948: mi zad ye shes rab rdzogs spungs dbye ba rnam
NK034(ngi)007:1949: pa gsum yin te gzhi nas dngos po rang gi
NK034(ngi)007:1950: yon tan du byung ba 'khrul pa dag pas rin
NK034(ngi)007:1951: po che zag med ye shes chen po'i dbyings rig
NK034(ngi)007:1952: gnyis med don spungs pa 'gyur med lta ba ma
NK034(ngi)007:1953: 'gags pa rgyun du gnas pas rgyud du bstan dper
NK034(ngi)007:1954: na phyugs po'i bang mdzod sgo phyes bzhin nor rdzas
NK034(ngi)007:1955: ci 'dod 'byung ba dang 'dra dgos pa yon tan
NK034(ngi)007:1956: a nu dbyings dang rig pa ltar snang ba dang
NK034(ngi)007:1957: stong cha la bzhag pa ma yin tshad rnams 'dzin
NK034(ngi)007:1958: khong don man ngag rnam gnyis te yon tan du
NK034(ngi)007:1959: ma rdzogs pa'i rig gnad gzir zhing nyams su blang
NK034(ngi)007:1960: ba dang rgya che 'khrul snang 'gags te rig pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:1961: snang ba zad pa med pa'i dbyings rig spungs rig
NK034(ngi)007:1962: pa nyid kyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs su snang zhing
NK034(ngi)007:1963: 'char ba rin po che 'khrul pa nyid kyang de
NK034(ngi)007:1964: yi rtsal du snang sangs rgyas nyid kyi mdzad pa
NK034(ngi)007:1965: du ma yang rig pa'i rtsal te de nyid rang
NK034(ngi)007:1966: gi ngang rig pa'i gnas de snying yin pas chos
NK034(ngi)007:1967: kyi sku yang snying khar gnas rig pa rtog med
NK034(ngi)007:1968: yod rig pa'i lam ni rtsa yin pas thig le
NK034(ngi)007:1969: nyag gcig rtsa rdo rje lu gu rgyud phra la
NK034(ngi)007:1970: breng chags pa nas 'gyu rig pa'i sgo ni mig
NK034(ngi)007:1971: skyon med yin pas lta ba rig pa nyid mig
NK034(ngi)007:1972: gis mthong bas lta ba zer khyab che mig nas
NK034(ngi)007:1973: 'char rig pa'i yul ni mkha' sprin med yin pas
NK034(ngi)007:1974: gzung dka' rig pa khyab gdal nam mkhar zin rig
NK034(ngi)007:1975: pa'i ltos ni 'di la snang bas 'khor ba ste
NK034(ngi)007:1976: gzung dka' nyag gcig cha phra kun tu khyab rig
NK034(ngi)007:1977: pa'i dgra grogs zer ba'ang ni myang 'das te gnad
NK034(ngi)007:1978: gzir rig ngo stong gsal mthong rig pa'i gol sa
NK034(ngi)007:1979: sku gsum ste 'bras bu la zhes 'dod kyis mthar
NK034(ngi)007:1980: ni lhung bar 'gyur rig pa'i sgrib pa blos byas
NK034(ngi)007:1981: kyis lta sgom med pa la bdag tu 'dzin pa
NK034(ngi)007:1982: rnams ste byas pa rnams ni 'jigs pa'i rgyu rig
NK034(ngi)007:1983: pa'i rang snang du ma shes na 'khrul pa 'od
NK034(ngi)007:1984: yin te gzhan 'byung gnyis 'dzin gyis 'khor bar 'khrul
NK034(ngi)007:1985: pa'i rtsa ba can dbyings kyi gnas ni tsit+ta tshon
NK034(ngi)007:1986: sna lnga'i gru gub sdogs pa ltar ste nam mkha'i
NK034(ngi)007:1987: khams ni zab cing rgya che'i ye shes snying na
NK034(ngi)007:1988: gnas dbyings kyi lam 'gul ba dang bcas pa ni
NK034(ngi)007:1989: rlung yin pas shes pa'i dwangs ma nam mkhar 'od
NK034(ngi)007:1990: du gsal dbyings kyi sgo ni mdzod spu nas dang
NK034(ngi)007:1991: po mthing kha goms pas lnga ldan khyab chen shes
NK034(ngi)007:1992: pa'i grogs dbyings kyi yul ni mig yin pas mthong
NK034(ngi)007:1993: byed mig zur la mnan pas rgyun du gnas dbyings
NK034(ngi)007:1994: kyi zad sa 'byung rkyen nam mkha' ste ris med
NK034(ngi)007:1995: yul la 'od sku thig le sogs khyab par gdal
NK034(ngi)007:1996: dbyings kyi 'bras bu lus yin pas 'di nyid du
NK034(ngi)007:1997: rtog pa med pas mthong byed 'khrul snang 'di la
NK034(ngi)007:1998: phyis re ba med par gcod dbyings kyi gol sa
NK034(ngi)007:1999: 'od yin pas rang snang du ma shes na gser
NK034(ngi)007:2000: sgrog thag sgrog 'ching ba mnyam dbyings kyi grogs ni
NK034(ngi)007:2001: 'byung lnga bas rkyen 'od du grol 'byung lnga zad
NK034(ngi)007:2002: pas 'khrul pa'i zhen yul 'gags de phyir yon tan
NK034(ngi)007:2003: thams cad ni dbyings yul dang rig yul can par
NK034(ngi)007:2004: la spungs pas spungs le'u lnga yi gzhung tshad rdzogs
NK034(ngi)007:2005: i ti rgya rgya rgya nag mo khros ma zhes
NK034(ngi)007:2006: bya bas ngo bo 'di bstan pa bsrung ba'i don
NK034(ngi)007:2007: du 'gal rkyen cham la 'bebs nges tshig rnam pa
NK034(ngi)007:2008: gnyis yin te mi 'gyur ye shes nag mo la
NK034(ngi)007:2009: dug gi rtsad gcod khros ma yin dbye ba rnam
NK034(ngi)007:2010: pa lnga yin te gti mug khros pas 'i rgyal
NK034(ngi)007:2011: mo sha la dbab e kar gcig nga rgyal khros
NK034(ngi)007:2012: pas 'i rgyal mo srog la dbab tsa tir byung
NK034(ngi)007:2013: 'dod chags khros pas 'i rgyal mo khrag la dbab
NK034(ngi)007:2014: bdag gzhan dpal phrag dog khros pas 'i rgyal mo
NK034(ngi)007:2015: dbugs la dbab mi 'gyur nag zhe sdang khros pas
NK034(ngi)007:2016: 'i rgyal mo rus la dbab 'byung khungs mo dper
NK034(ngi)007:2017: na gcod par byed spu gri lta bu'o dgos pa
NK034(ngi)007:2018: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dam pa bsrung khong don
NK034(ngi)007:2019: man ngag rnam pa gsum khros pa'i dus tshod man
NK034(ngi)007:2020: ngag dang zla bas 'byed bsam pa gnag pa'i man
NK034(ngi)007:2021: ngag dang bsam le mas 'grub mo ste sgong thun
NK034(ngi)007:2022: dug thun mda' thun drug man ngag go dus tshod
NK034(ngi)007:2023: dpyid zla sogs ra bzhi brgyad dang drug bcu bzhi
NK034(ngi)007:2024: bcu dgu go rim bzhin thun dang sbyor ka bya
NK034(ngi)007:2025: dpyid zla 'bring po'i bzhi'i mar ngo nyi shu nyis
NK034(ngi)007:2026: dang lnga bdun dang gnam stong go rim bzhin dpyid
NK034(ngi)007:2027: zla sogs tha chung bzhi dang brgyad dang dgu bcu
NK034(ngi)007:2028: gcig bcas te go rim bzhin bsam pa thod pa
NK034(ngi)007:2029: dang khrag rdzas sngags badz+ra ting ting nyal lugs kha
NK034(ngi)007:2030: byang du lta ba so thun drug re re ya
NK034(ngi)007:2031: phral gcig tu dril ba dang snying de'i nang nas
NK034(ngi)007:2032: thun gtso ste bsad ma ma tsa tsha sngags bcu
NK034(ngi)007:2033: ma ma khrom b+h+yo sogs khrom bcu btab ste b+h+yo
NK034(ngi)007:2034: yis 'grub le'u brgya dang bcu gcig gi gzhung gi
NK034(ngi)007:2035: tshad rnams rdzogs pa'o de ltar spros la dga' ba
NK034(ngi)007:2036: la te rgyud kyi don rnam pa bdun du rab
NK034(ngi)007:2037: phye nas bstan pa 'dzin skyong bsrung ba yi don
NK034(ngi)007:2038: du de nyid bstan pa'o mchog tu nyams len gnad
NK034(ngi)007:2039: gsum du bsdus te dril nas gang zag ni gcig
NK034(ngi)007:2040: gi cha rkyen dag tu bstan rgyud rnams kun gyi
NK034(ngi)007:2041: snying phyungs pas dang 'dra ste snying khrag man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2042: dbyings dang rig par byung gnad gsum ldan pa'i mchus
NK034(ngi)007:2043: gzhibs nas sngar ma myong ba'i nyams myong ro rnyed
NK034(ngi)007:2044: de ro myong snying la mda' phog bzhin phyi phyir
NK034(ngi)007:2045: ldog pa ma yin no gsang ba bla na med
NK034(ngi)007:2046: pa 'di don man ngag mi shes par phyi nang
NK034(ngi)007:2047: gsang ba gding 'cha' ba dbul po'i mdzod nang na
NK034(ngi)007:2048: med pas yod ltar byas pa bu sgo bcad 'dra
NK034(ngi)007:2049: de phyir 'di ni snying la phur rgyud kun snying
NK034(ngi)007:2050: ni 'dir phyungs pas rgyud tshig rnams kyis ci zhig
NK034(ngi)007:2051: bya 'di nyid nyams su len par gyis a ti
NK034(ngi)007:2052: rgyud thams cad kyi khong snying phyungs pa dkar po
NK034(ngi)007:2053: dung gis bris pa'i dung ris ma zhes kyang bya
NK034(ngi)007:2054: sgron ma snang byed ces bya ba dur khrod b+ha
NK034(ngi)007:2055: sing du ye shes mdos lung bstan te mkhas pa
NK034(ngi)007:2056: bi ma las rdo rje'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2057: don du mdzad pa'o long ba'i sna khrid dang 'dra
NK034(ngi)007:2058: ba rdzogs so gter nas gter du btsas pa 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2059: sngags kyi srung mas srungs shig 'di ni 'dzam bu
NK034(ngi)007:2060: gling gzhan na med par yid ches so las can
NK034(ngi)007:2061: gcig dang 'phrad par shog i ti rgya rgya rgya
NK034(ngi)007:2062: rgya rgya rgya rgya rgya rgya shu b+ham dung yig
NK034(ngi)007:2063: can gyi rgyab yig ste gnad kyi yi ge bzhugs
NK034(ngi)007:2064: rgyud kyi gnad yig gsang ba zer rgya gar skad
NK034(ngi)007:2065: du a khya ra tan+t+ra nan gu h+ya n+aa ma
NK034(ngi)007:2066: bod skad du rgyud kyi gnad tshig gsang ba zhes
NK034(ngi)007:2067: bya ba bcom ldan 'das gab pa rnams mngon du
NK034(ngi)007:2068: ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo gang dag rgyud kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2069: gsang ba'i tshig rnams kyi de yi don la the
NK034(ngi)007:2070: tshom gcad pa'i phyir gsang ba dung gi yi ge
NK034(ngi)007:2071: can la yang tig la 'bebs pa'i snying tig sgron
NK034(ngi)007:2072: ma 'di mun pa rnams la snang ba'i 'od bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:2073: du rtsa tig snying gi dkyil du phab nas ni
NK034(ngi)007:2074: gsang ba'i yang gsang thugs kyi bcud rnams ni bla
NK034(ngi)007:2075: ma'i man ngag rim nas rim brgyud pa'i thugs kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2076: bcud rnams bdag gis 'dir bkod la snying po'i yang
NK034(ngi)007:2077: snying gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bcud rnams bsdus nas
NK034(ngi)007:2078: nyams len phyogs gcig tu bsdebs te skal ldan gcig
NK034(ngi)007:2079: gi cha rkyen du bcu bdun rgyud kyi gsang don
NK034(ngi)007:2080: gcig tu bstan de yi phyir na rgyud lung tshig
NK034(ngi)007:2081: rnams la 'grub dang mi 'grub man ngag bcud du
NK034(ngi)007:2082: ni gsang ba'i rgyab yig med na 'grub mi srid
NK034(ngi)007:2083: de yi phyir na yi ge 'di nyid gces 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2084: med rgyud la dgos pa ci yang med tshig gis
NK034(ngi)007:2085: nges pa'i snying po mi mthong ba mchu 'gyur sgra
NK034(ngi)007:2086: yis sna tshogs smra byed kyang don gyi phyogs su
NK034(ngi)007:2087: rdul tsam nye ba med des na gsang ba'i sgron
NK034(ngi)007:2088: ma 'di med na mun khung nang gi phyag rgya
NK034(ngi)007:2089: bsgyur ba 'dra 'di ni gsang ba dung gi yi
NK034(ngi)007:2090: ge can tig la 'bebs pa'i mi 'gyur thig yin
NK034(ngi)007:2091: no 'dir tshig rgyud rnams kyi rgyab yig gi man
NK034(ngi)007:2092: ngag ni mdo rgyud kyi don gsal ba zhes bya
NK034(ngi)007:2093: ste gsang ba dung gi yi ge can yin no
NK034(ngi)007:2094: man ngag de'i rgyab tu 'di med na rnal 'byor
NK034(ngi)007:2095: ba rnams kyis don mi 'grub ste tshi chad pa
NK034(ngi)007:2096: las don med do de'i phyir na 'di rab tu
NK034(ngi)007:2097: gsang bar bya'o tshig gi rgyud rnams la re re
NK034(ngi)007:2098: la bdun bdun gyis bstan pa ni ngo bo dang
NK034(ngi)007:2099: nges tshig dang dbye ba dang dgos pa'i don dang
NK034(ngi)007:2100: mtshon pa'i dpe dang khong bcud kyi man ngag dang
NK034(ngi)007:2101: le'u'i grangs du yod pa dang bdun gyis rgyud de
NK034(ngi)007:2102: dag gi rim pa bstan pa yin te de yang
NK034(ngi)007:2103: ngo bos ni rang gi rig pa'i mtshon tshul ston
NK034(ngi)007:2104: pa yin gyi gzhan ston ma yin no nges tshig
NK034(ngi)007:2105: gis ni rgyud de mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i tshig
NK034(ngi)007:2106: yin gyi nyams su len pa'i thabs su ni ma
NK034(ngi)007:2107: yin no dbye bas ni tshig gi rim pa bshad
NK034(ngi)007:2108: pa yin gyi rig pa gtan la 'bebs pa ni
NK034(ngi)007:2109: ma yin no dgos pa'i don ni sems can gyi
NK034(ngi)007:2110: dbang po las phye ba yin gyi gnas lugs la
NK034(ngi)007:2111: ni ma yin no mtshon pa'i dpe ni rgyud de
NK034(ngi)007:2112: nyid rang che bstan pa yin gyi rig pa la
NK034(ngi)007:2113: ni ma yin no khong don gyi man ngag gis
NK034(ngi)007:2114: ni rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi nyams su blang ba
NK034(ngi)007:2115: yin gyi tshogs su bshad pa ni ma yin no
NK034(ngi)007:2116: le'u'i grangs du yod pas ni gang zag rnams kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2117: rgyud la bsnan phri mi 'dod pa'i don du bstan
NK034(ngi)007:2118: pa yin gyi gzhan gyi dgos pa ci yang med
NK034(ngi)007:2119: do de'i phyir na bdun po de dag gis gang
NK034(ngi)007:2120: zag gcig 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i thabs la ni
NK034(ngi)007:2121: bdun char dgos pa ma yin te khong bcud kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2122: man ngag rnams kyi 'di nyid du sangs rgya bar
NK034(ngi)007:2123: byed pa'i thabs bstan pa yin no 'tshang rgya bar
NK034(ngi)007:2124: byed pa'i gnad kyi yi ge rnams bsdus nas gcig
NK034(ngi)007:2125: tu bstan pa ni sngon du rdzogs pa rang byung
NK034(ngi)007:2126: gi rgyud kyi man ngag gi rten khyad par can
NK034(ngi)007:2127: bsgrub pa ste phyi nang gi dbang gis spros pa
NK034(ngi)007:2128: dang bcas pa'i blo can gyi don yin te 'dii
NK034(ngi)007:2129: yi dus na lus sku gsum du gtan la phab
NK034(ngi)007:2130: nas lus kyi gnad du rtsa bstims pa yin no
NK034(ngi)007:2131: gsang ba shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ni gang
NK034(ngi)007:2132: zag chags pa can gyi don yin te de'i man
NK034(ngi)007:2133: ngag tu chags can gyi pra khrid kyi sngon du
NK034(ngi)007:2134: 'gro ba'i man ngag byas nas gnas pa rtsa'i thems
NK034(ngi)007:2135: kyis rtsa bstims de ma bstims na rlung mi zin
NK034(ngi)007:2136: mi 'gyur ba yi ge'i thems kyis rlung bstims de
NK034(ngi)007:2137: ma bstims na las rlung log nas lus kyi 'byung
NK034(ngi)007:2138: ba 'khrugs bkod pa byang chub sems kyi thems kyis
NK034(ngi)007:2139: lus bstims de ma bstims na kun rdzob kyi thig
NK034(ngi)007:2140: le la dbang mi thob bo de dag yang gzhan
NK034(ngi)007:2141: don gyi thabs yin gyi sangs rgya ba la ni
NK034(ngi)007:2142: dgos pa ma yin no rang rig yongs su rdzogs
NK034(ngi)007:2143: pa'i dbang gi man ngag gi spros bcas kyi don
NK034(ngi)007:2144: khyad par can sgrub par byed pa'o rgyud kyi nang
NK034(ngi)007:2145: nas bstan pa'i dbang de kun ni drang zhing bkri
NK034(ngi)007:2146: ba'i don yin no rdzogs pa rang byung gi rgyab
NK034(ngi)007:2147: yig gsang ba snying po dung yig can gyi snying
NK034(ngi)007:2148: thig rdzogs so rgya rgya rgya sprul sku sgrub par
NK034(ngi)007:2149: byed pa sgra thal 'gyur gyi rgyud kyi rgyab yig
NK034(ngi)007:2150: gsang ba ni 'di ni 'jig rten 'di na mngon
NK034(ngi)007:2151: shes la sogs pa'i rtags phyungs te gzhan 'jug par
NK034(ngi)007:2152: bya ba'i yan lag tu bstan pa yin te 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2153: la brten nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la lam
NK034(ngi)007:2154: du byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa nyid kyi nyams len
NK034(ngi)007:2155: bstan pa yin gyi nyams su blang ba dngos gzhi
NK034(ngi)007:2156: ni ma yin no de yang nyams su len pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2157: dngos gzhi de nyid kyi grogs su 'gro ba'i man
NK034(ngi)007:2158: ngag gzhan ni dape'o de rang gis 'grub pa yin
NK034(ngi)007:2159: no 'byung lnga'i sgra don nyams su len pa'i dus
NK034(ngi)007:2160: na gnad bsdus pa ni 'di ltar yin te 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2161: kun gyi sngon du ni lus ngag gi gnad gtims
NK034(ngi)007:2162: pa gal che'o lus ngag gi gnad gtims pa'i rjes
NK034(ngi)007:2163: la gang mos pa'i spyod lam rtsom pa ni sems
NK034(ngi)007:2164: rnal du 'bebs pa'i dgos pa yod pas gal che
NK034(ngi)007:2165: de la thog mar me'i dbyibs la brtags pa ni
NK034(ngi)007:2166: mtshan mo'i dus su ri yi rtse la phyin la
NK034(ngi)007:2167: brtag pa yin gyi gam nas ni mthong ba ma
NK034(ngi)007:2168: yin no lhag ma ni dpe rang na zhib 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2169: ni gnad yin no kha dog la brtag pa'i dus
NK034(ngi)007:2170: na rgyang grags phyed kyis ni lkog gi phyogs nas
NK034(ngi)007:2171: blta bar bya'o de na sgra dngos gzhi la nyams
NK034(ngi)007:2172: su len pa'i dus na rlung gang nas byung ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:2173: me'i rgyab tu 'dug pa yin te 'dom do tsam
NK034(ngi)007:2174: zer yang skyes bus rdo ba 'phangs pas sleb pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2175: tshad tsam yin no de'i tshe rna bar shes pa
NK034(ngi)007:2176: bcug ste ma yengs pa gtso che de'i dus na
NK034(ngi)007:2177: zhag gsum lon nas bde sangs pa zhig 'ong bzhi
NK034(ngi)007:2178: la dga' yal ba zhig 'ong bdun na mi rnams
NK034(ngi)007:2179: kyi shes pa la ci yod pa skad ston pas
NK034(ngi)007:2180: shes pa 'ong bcu la dmyal ba'i skad shes bcu
NK034(ngi)007:2181: gcig la yi dwags rnams kyi skad shes bcu gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:2182: la byol song rnams kyi skad shes bcu gsum la
NK034(ngi)007:2183: lha ma yin gyi skad shes bcu bzhi la lha
NK034(ngi)007:2184: rnams kyi skad shes te mngon par shes pa rnams
NK034(ngi)007:2185: dus gcig tu 'char ro de ni dbang po yang
NK034(ngi)007:2186: rab rnams kyi'o 'bring gis de ltar lan bdun gyis
NK034(ngi)007:2187: 'grub pa yin te 'di ni lo re la lan
NK034(ngi)007:2188: grangs de snyed du bya'o tha mas ni bco lnga
NK034(ngi)007:2189: byas pas 'grub pa la the tshom med do i
NK034(ngi)007:2190: ti chu'i sgra la spyod na dus ni ston char
NK034(ngi)007:2191: chad du nye ba'i dus ni gnad yin no de
NK034(ngi)007:2192: yang mtshan mo shin tu thag ring ba nas shes
NK034(ngi)007:2193: pa rna bar gtad de ma yengs pa rab tu
NK034(ngi)007:2194: gces so de'i tshe bying na chu bo'i rtsar 'dug
NK034(ngi)007:2195: ste shes pa gtad rgod na mgo bstums te dar
NK034(ngi)007:2196: gcig 'dug go nyin mo chu'i dkyil du shes pa
NK034(ngi)007:2197: gtad pa ni man ngag go de ltar lus kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2198: gnad dang bstun nas byas na zla ba gcig na
NK034(ngi)007:2199: mkha' 'gro mas chos smra ba'i skad sna tshogs pa
NK034(ngi)007:2200: 'ong gnyis na rang la chos sna tshogs pa'i nyams
NK034(ngi)007:2201: skyes gsum na chos las grol ba'i nyams ni dbang
NK034(ngi)007:2202: po rab la 'ong 'bring la dgu tha ma bco
NK034(ngi)007:2203: brgyad na de ltar mi 'ong mi srid do 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2204: ni shes rab sna tshogs pa bsgrub pa zhes bya
NK034(ngi)007:2205: ba'i man ngag yin no i ti rlung gi sgra
NK034(ngi)007:2206: la spyod pa ni sngon du 'gro ba spyir 'dra
NK034(ngi)007:2207: lhag ma dben zhib rlung phyogs kyi zhur khung la
NK034(ngi)007:2208: rna ba gtad de shes pa rna bar gzhug pa
NK034(ngi)007:2209: man ngag de yang res mgo bstums shing nyal ba
NK034(ngi)007:2210: ni gnad 'di'i dus su kha zas ni sha chen
NK034(ngi)007:2211: po dang mar bzang po dang bu ram rnying pa
NK034(ngi)007:2212: brten no 'di ltar nyams su blangs pas dbang po
NK034(ngi)007:2213: rab kyis zla ba gcig na nam mkha' la rgyu
NK034(ngi)007:2214: nus 'bring gis zla ba lnga'am bcu gcig na tha
NK034(ngi)007:2215: mas lo gsum na nam mkha' la rgyu nus te
NK034(ngi)007:2216: 'di ni phyi'i rlung sbyong ba'i man ngag go i
NK034(ngi)007:2217: ti sa'i sgra la spyod pa ni sgo nga kha
NK034(ngi)007:2218: dog tshon gyis bsgyur ba la sogs pa'i lag pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2219: 'du byed bsgom pa ste 'di la rtag tu sbyangs
NK034(ngi)007:2220: na dbang po rab zla ba drug nas 'byung ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:2221: dgras mi tshugs 'bring bco brgyad na tha ma na
NK034(ngi)007:2222: lo drug na 'byung ba rnams kyi dgras mi tshugs
NK034(ngi)007:2223: pa yin no i thi nam mkha'i sgra la spyod
NK034(ngi)007:2224: pa'i rnal 'byor ni lus brgyangs pas rlung rang so
NK034(ngi)007:2225: na gnas pa yin no dbugs drag po phyir bton
NK034(ngi)007:2226: te mi 'gyur ba drag po'i yi ge ha ha
NK034(ngi)007:2227: nyis brtsegs ngag tu 'don no lus kyi nang du
NK034(ngi)007:2228: dbugs chags su mi gzhug pa ni gnad yin no
NK034(ngi)007:2229: mig gis mthong tshad kyi nam mkha'i steng du 'phang
NK034(ngi)007:2230: ba ni rlung gi tshad 'dzin pa yin de yang
NK034(ngi)007:2231: dbang po rab kyis lo gsum na mig gis mthong
NK034(ngi)007:2232: tshad kyi nam mkha' la rgyu bar nus 'bring gis
NK034(ngi)007:2233: dgu na tha mas bco brgyad na rgyu bar nus
NK034(ngi)007:2234: pa the tshom med do 'di ni nges pa kho
NK034(ngi)007:2235: na'o 'di ni rang gi rig pa phyi'i dbyings la
NK034(ngi)007:2236: bor ba'i man ngag go i thi de yi yon
NK034(ngi)007:2237: tan ni dpe na zhib bo sgra thal 'gyur gyi
NK034(ngi)007:2238: rgyud kyi rgyab yig man ngag gi rgyal po dung
NK034(ngi)007:2239: yig can gyi snying tig gtan la 'bebs pa rdzogs
NK034(ngi)007:2240: so las can gcig dang phrad par shog sa ma
NK034(ngi)007:2241: ya kha tham rgya rgya rgya de ltar sprul pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2242: sku bsgrubs nas gzhan don rdzogs par byas te da
NK034(ngi)007:2243: rig pa'i gnas tshul gtan la dbab pa'i phyir bkra
NK034(ngi)007:2244: shis mdzes ldan gyi gnad kyi man ngag bstan pa
NK034(ngi)007:2245: ni 'di ni shes par bya ba'i chos yin pa
NK034(ngi)007:2246: las nyams su blang du btub pa ni ma yin
NK034(ngi)007:2247: te de nyid la khong don man ngag bzhir bstan
NK034(ngi)007:2248: pa'i ma 'khrul pa'i ye shes kyi man ngag ni
NK034(ngi)007:2249: nyams su blang bar bstan pa yin no de'i sngon
NK034(ngi)007:2250: du yi ge ma ru nas byung ba'i 'khor 'das
NK034(ngi)007:2251: ru shan 'byed pa'i spyod pa byas nas de la
NK034(ngi)007:2252: rtags byung ba dang rang gi rig pa nyid mngon
NK034(ngi)007:2253: du gtan la ma phabs na snang ba'i dngos po
NK034(ngi)007:2254: 'di zad par byed pa la rig pa mngon sum
NK034(ngi)007:2255: gyis yin gyis stong pas ni snang ba'i dngos po
NK034(ngi)007:2256: 'di zad par nus pa ma yin no de'i phyir
NK034(ngi)007:2257: na dngos pos dngos po zad par byed pa yin
NK034(ngi)007:2258: gyi stong pas ni stong pa zad par nus la
NK034(ngi)007:2259: mngon sum gyis mngon sum zad par nus pas na
NK034(ngi)007:2260: rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor ba rang
NK034(ngi)007:2261: gis rang grol bar bstan pa yin no des na
NK034(ngi)007:2262: gsang ba mchog gi man ngag 'di yi lugs kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2263: tshig gis rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgya bar
NK034(ngi)007:2264: mi nus pa dang rdzogs chen spyi la sogs te
NK034(ngi)007:2265: theg pa rim pa dgu la sogs pa'i tshig rnams
NK034(ngi)007:2266: dang mu stegs rtag chad dang 'jig rten tha mal
NK034(ngi)007:2267: pa'i tshig la 'di gsum khyad par rdul tsam yang
NK034(ngi)007:2268: med pa ni tshig tu mnyam pa dang don ni
NK034(ngi)007:2269: yid dpyod yin par mnyam pa'i phyir ro de ltar
NK034(ngi)007:2270: tshig la sangs rgyas med par yid ches nas don
NK034(ngi)007:2271: gyi rig pa mngon sum du bstan par bya ba
NK034(ngi)007:2272: ni de ltar lus ngag gi zhen pa rang log
NK034(ngi)007:2273: pa'i rnal 'byor pas yul nam mkha' stong ba 'khrul
NK034(ngi)007:2274: pa med pa ni sprin dang bral ba la bya
NK034(ngi)007:2275: rig pa 'khrul pa med pa ni rdo rje lu
NK034(ngi)007:2276: gu rgyud kyi sku nam mkha' la gtad pa yin
NK034(ngi)007:2277: te shin tu dben pa'i gnas su mi skad la
NK034(ngi)007:2278: sogs mi thos pa'i sar nyams su blang bar bya'o
NK034(ngi)007:2279: dbang po 'khrul pa med pa ni mig mi 'gul
NK034(ngi)007:2280: ba gnad yin no de'i phyir mi 'gul ba rnam
NK034(ngi)007:2281: pa gsum la gnad bstun pa ni rab tu zab
NK034(ngi)007:2282: mo gzer rnam pa gsum gyi man ngag gis de'i
NK034(ngi)007:2283: rgyab rten gyi gnad yin te de ni dpe na
NK034(ngi)007:2284: zhib bo bkra shis mdzes ldan gyi rgyud kyi rgyab
NK034(ngi)007:2285: yig man ngag gi rgyal po dung yig can gyi
NK034(ngi)007:2286: snying tig gnad la 'bebs pa rdzogs so i ti
NK034(ngi)007:2287: rgya rgya rgya kun tu bzang po thugs kyi me
NK034(ngi)007:2288: long gi gnad kyi man ngag gsum la dngos po
NK034(ngi)007:2289: ma shes pa'i gol sa dang blos brtags rim pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2290: gol sa'i man ngag gnyis ni shes par bya ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:2291: chos yin gyi nyams su blang du btub pa ni
NK034(ngi)007:2292: ma yin no de'i phyir na nyams su blang ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:2293: man ngag ma shes na 'khrul pa yin te de
NK034(ngi)007:2294: yang dngos po rags pa'i snang ba 'di ma zad
NK034(ngi)007:2295: par nang gi lus kyi 'byung ba 'di mi 'dzad
NK034(ngi)007:2296: nang gi 'byung ba ma zad na nyon mongs pa
NK034(ngi)007:2297: zad mi srid nyon mongs pa ma zad na sangs
NK034(ngi)007:2298: rgya mi srid pas dngos po zad par byed pa
NK034(ngi)007:2299: la lus ngag gi gnad gcun dgos te de yang
NK034(ngi)007:2300: dang po lus kyi gnad 'dug stangs gsum yin no
NK034(ngi)007:2301: 'di rab tu zab pas 'di ma byas na nyams
NK034(ngi)007:2302: su blangs kyang ye shes skye mi srid do ye
NK034(ngi)007:2303: shes de lus la gnas shing lus la brten pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2304: phyir ro lhag ma ni dpe na zhib bo des
NK034(ngi)007:2305: na rig pa'i ye shes de tshig gis gtan la
NK034(ngi)007:2306: mi phebs pa'i gnad ni ngag yin te nyams su
NK034(ngi)007:2307: len pa'i rnal 'byor pas rtag tu ngag bcad pa
NK034(ngi)007:2308: gnad yin ngag ma bcad na brjod du med pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2309: don blo la skye mi srid do de'i phyir yid
NK034(ngi)007:2310: dpyod 'dzin pa'i lta ba rnams la brjod du med
NK034(ngi)007:2311: ces pa ni ngag 'gags pas rang brjod 'gags rang
NK034(ngi)007:2312: brjod 'gags pas gzhan brjod kyi rnam rtog skye mi
NK034(ngi)007:2313: srid des na ngag bcad pa ni rab tu zab
NK034(ngi)007:2314: bo de'i phyir na lus ngag gnyis kyi gnad kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2315: man ngag dngos po yin pas dngos po 'di kun
NK034(ngi)007:2316: rang zad la 'gro ba'i gnad yin no de gnyis
NK034(ngi)007:2317: kyi gnad gcun pas yid kyi gnad ni rang shugs
NK034(ngi)007:2318: la 'bebs pa yin pas 'di bcos shing dpyad du
NK034(ngi)007:2319: med do de ltar lus ngag gi gnad la brten
NK034(ngi)007:2320: nas dbyings nam mkha' la gtad pas 'od lnga'i snang
NK034(ngi)007:2321: ba mi 'char mi srid do de shar ba'i dus
NK034(ngi)007:2322: na lu gu rgyud la rang dbang mi thob mi
NK034(ngi)007:2323: srid do de thob pas chos nyid zad pa'i sa
NK034(ngi)007:2324: la rang spyod pas na rgyud lung gi tshig la
NK034(ngi)007:2325: brten mi dgos pas gzhi yi tshig dang 'khrul pa
NK034(ngi)007:2326: dang de ldog tshul rnams gtan la 'bebs pa ni
NK034(ngi)007:2327: blun po yin te rang gi ngo bo mthong ba
NK034(ngi)007:2328: la ci yang bya mi dgos pa'i gnad yin no
NK034(ngi)007:2329: tshig 'di kun gyis ni ngo bo mthong mi srid
NK034(ngi)007:2330: do ngo bo ma mthong na tshig la dgos pa
NK034(ngi)007:2331: ci yang med pa'i phyir ro kun tu bzang po
NK034(ngi)007:2332: thugs kyi me long gi rgyab yig man ngag gi
NK034(ngi)007:2333: rgyal po dung yig can gyi snying tig la 'bebs
NK034(ngi)007:2334: pa'i gsang ba rdzogs so i ti rgya rgya rgya
NK034(ngi)007:2335: rgyud kyi rgyal po sgron ma 'bar ba'i khong don
NK034(ngi)007:2336: gyi man ngag lnga la lhag ma ni shes par
NK034(ngi)007:2337: bya ba'i chos yin gyi ye shes rtags kyi sgron
NK034(ngi)007:2338: ma'i man ngag ni nyams su blang du btub pa
NK034(ngi)007:2339: ma yin no de yang 'khor 'das ru shan 'byed
NK034(ngi)007:2340: pa'i spyod pa la sogs sngon du ma byas na
NK034(ngi)007:2341: rnal 'byor pa'i lus ngag gi zhen pa mi ldog
NK034(ngi)007:2342: de'i zhen pa ma log na 'khor 'das ru shan
NK034(ngi)007:2343: mi phyed de ma phyed na 'jig rten pa dang
NK034(ngi)007:2344: khyad med pas nyams su blangs kyang ngo bo nyid
NK034(ngi)007:2345: mthong mi srid do des na 'khor 'das ru shan
NK034(ngi)007:2346: 'byed pa'i gdams ngag zab bo de nas lus ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2347: gi gnad gcun pa gal che'o de yang lus gnad
NK034(ngi)007:2348: snying snying gnad rtsa rtsa'i gnad mig yin pas ni
NK034(ngi)007:2349: dpe ltar gyis 'grub de yang nyin mo lta stangs
NK034(ngi)007:2350: bzhis bltas pas nyams gong nas gong du 'phel ba
NK034(ngi)007:2351: 'byung mtshan mo shes bya bum par bcug pa ni
NK034(ngi)007:2352: dus bzhi'i yi ger blta thig le rtsa'i nang du
NK034(ngi)007:2353: sba ba'i gnad ni dbugs nang du rngub steng 'og
NK034(ngi)007:2354: dbugs kyi skad 'don de ni so dang mchu bstun
NK034(ngi)007:2355: te lce yang 'gyur ldog med par 'byung ba yin
NK034(ngi)007:2356: 'di ni mtshan mo'i rim pa bzhin te ig skad
NK034(ngi)007:2357: ni brtsegs ma dang ring po gnyis res 'jog tu
NK034(ngi)007:2358: bya'o 'di ltar nyams su blangs pa'i ni nyin mtshan
NK034(ngi)007:2359: med pa'i snang ba myur du skye ba'i gnad yin
NK034(ngi)007:2360: no de ltar gyi ye shes nyams su blangs pas
NK034(ngi)007:2361: ni rtags 'byung ba yin te 'di kun dgos pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2362: rgyu med dgos pa yang yod pa yin te rang
NK034(ngi)007:2363: byung du 'byung ba yin te de yang lus ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2364: gi gnad gcun pa'i gnad kyis sngon du lus ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2365: la rtags rnams 'ong de nas rig pa'i ye shes
NK034(ngi)007:2366: mngon sum du nyams su blangs pas sku rnam pa
NK034(ngi)007:2367: gsum gyi lam rtags 'byung ngo de ltar rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:2368: tshad la phebs nas rtags las 'das pa'i snang byed
NK034(ngi)007:2369: ces bya'o de yang skyes bu yang rab la zla
NK034(ngi)007:2370: ba bdun rtags 'byung 'bring la lo bdun na rtags
NK034(ngi)007:2371: de kun 'byung tha ma la lo bcu bzhi la
NK034(ngi)007:2372: 'byung ba la the tshom med do skyes bu la
NK034(ngi)007:2373: la ni nyi ma bdun na 'byung ba yang yod
NK034(ngi)007:2374: do de'i phyir na 'di kun la ma yengs pa
NK034(ngi)007:2375: rab tu gces so nyams su ma blangs na nyams
NK034(ngi)007:2376: su myong ba rgyud la skye sring mi srid do
NK034(ngi)007:2377: nyams su myong ba rgyud la ma skyes na yid
NK034(ngi)007:2378: dpyod kyi lta ba yin te yid dpyod kyi lta
NK034(ngi)007:2379: bas sangs mi rgya bar la chod do de'i phyir
NK034(ngi)007:2380: na snying gi gdams gsang ba'i yi ge ma ru
NK034(ngi)007:2381: gces so de ni su la yang grags su mi
NK034(ngi)007:2382: rung ngo sgron ma 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyab yig
NK034(ngi)007:2383: man ngag rgyal po dung yig can gyi snying tig
NK034(ngi)007:2384: rdzogs so rgya rgya rgya rdo rje sems dpa'i snying
NK034(ngi)007:2385: gi me long gi khong don gyi man ngag ni
NK034(ngi)007:2386: gsum las lhag ma ni shes par bya ba'i chos
NK034(ngi)007:2387: yin gyis nyams su blang bya ma yin pas sku
NK034(ngi)007:2388: gsum gyi ngo sprod ni lus ngag yid gsum gcun
NK034(ngi)007:2389: pa las lam du sku gsum gyi snang ba rang
NK034(ngi)007:2390: 'char ba yin te de'i sngon du 'khor 'das ru
NK034(ngi)007:2391: shan 'byed pa'i spyod pa bstan pa ni tshig gi
NK034(ngi)007:2392: spyod pa rnams las rang log nas sprul pa'i sku
NK034(ngi)007:2393: mngon du bsgrub pa'i man ngag yin de nas rig
NK034(ngi)007:2394: pa mngon sum du bla mas bstan nas nya mas
NK034(ngi)007:2395: gong nas gong du 'phel ba ni longs spyod rdzogs
NK034(ngi)007:2396: pa'i sku bsgrub pa yin no de nas rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:2397: tshad la phebs pa'i ngo bo ni chos sku'i ngo
NK034(ngi)007:2398: bo nyid bsgrubs te grub pa yin no de kun
NK034(ngi)007:2399: yang gong du lus ngag gi gnad las 'byung ba
NK034(ngi)007:2400: yin te lus kyi gnad kyis sprul sku lam du
NK034(ngi)007:2401: snang ngag gi gnad kyis longs sku lam du snang
NK034(ngi)007:2402: yid kyi gnad kyi chos sku lam du snang bas
NK034(ngi)007:2403: na sku gsum gyi lam du shar ba yin gyi
NK034(ngi)007:2404: 'bras bu ma yin no sku zhes bya ba zhig
NK034(ngi)007:2405: byung phan chad snang ba zhig yod dgos snang ba
NK034(ngi)007:2406: yod pas sku yod dgos pas mdor na sku ni
NK034(ngi)007:2407: lus yin pas so de'i phyir na lus med lus
NK034(ngi)007:2408: te lus kyi mchog lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa
NK034(ngi)007:2409: po zer bas na chos nyid zad pa ni lus
NK034(ngi)007:2410: kyi sgro 'dogs dang bral ba ste 'di nyid las
NK034(ngi)007:2411: ye shes dang 'od dang sku'i snang ba mi snang
NK034(ngi)007:2412: bas so 'di nyid la ye shes bzhi'i grangs mtha'
NK034(ngi)007:2413: yang rang log pa'o de'i phyir na lus kyi gnad
NK034(ngi)007:2414: dang de snang ba yul gyi gnad dang de 'char
NK034(ngi)007:2415: ba rang gi ngo bo rig pa'i gnad dang de
NK034(ngi)007:2416: la lta bas na sgron ma'i gnad dang bzhir nyams
NK034(ngi)007:2417: su blangs pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo de gtan la
NK034(ngi)007:2418: 'bebs pa ste rang gi 'dug tshul mthong ba'i skal
NK034(ngi)007:2419: ldan zhes bya'o rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me
NK034(ngi)007:2420: long gi rgyab yig gsang ba man ngag gi rgyal
NK034(ngi)007:2421: po dung yig can gyi snying thig rdzogs so las
NK034(ngi)007:2422: can de dang 'phrad par shog rgya rgya rgya dpal
NK034(ngi)007:2423: ldan sngags kyi srung ma rag gdong mas bka' 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2424: srungs shig sa ma ya bye ma las sgra rang
NK034(ngi)007:2425: 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o rig pa rang shar gyi khong
NK034(ngi)007:2426: don gyi man ngag la lngas bstan pa'i tshig 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2427: kun yang shes par bya ba'i chos yin gyi ngo
NK034(ngi)007:2428: bo snying tig ma yin no 'di ni nyams su
NK034(ngi)007:2429: len na gnad gsum gyis nyams su blang du btub
NK034(ngi)007:2430: pas 'di nyid la yang sngon du 'khor 'das ru
NK034(ngi)007:2431: shan 'byed pa'i spyod pa ma byas na lus ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2432: yid kyi zhen pa mi ldog cing de nyid kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2433: bar chad mi sol bas 'di rab tu gces so
NK034(ngi)007:2434: de nas yul gyi gnad ma gcun na phyi yi
NK034(ngi)007:2435: 'byung ba lnga mi zad pas yul gyi gnad gal
NK034(ngi)007:2436: che de nas lus kyi gnad ma gcun na nang
NK034(ngi)007:2437: gi 'byung ba rang zad la mi 'gro bas 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2438: gal che'o 'di nyid ma zad na snang ba 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2439: nyid la zag med du sangs mi rgya'o rig pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2440: gnad ma gcun na lta sgom spyod pa'i gzhi stongs
NK034(ngi)007:2441: pas 'di rab tu gces so de dag gi gzhi
NK034(ngi)007:2442: stongs na snang ba tshad la mi phebs so snang
NK034(ngi)007:2443: ba tshad la ma phebs na yid dpyod 'dzin pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2444: lta ba rnams dang khyad ci yang med do des
NK034(ngi)007:2445: na 'di dag rab tu gal che bas nyams su
NK034(ngi)007:2446: len pa gal che de yang rnal 'byor pa rab
NK034(ngi)007:2447: kyi gnas ni ri khrod du ri dwags lta bu
NK034(ngi)007:2448: yin 'bring ni phyogs med du tha mal par bardzusa
NK034(ngi)007:2449: nas ldom ste sprang po lta bu yin rnal 'byor
NK034(ngi)007:2450: pa tha ma ni dgon par gnas te 'phyi ba
NK034(ngi)007:2451: lta bu yin no 'di gsum dang mi ldan par
NK034(ngi)007:2452: sangs mi rgya'o rig pa rang shar gyi rgyab yig
NK034(ngi)007:2453: man ngag gi rgyal po dung yig can gyi snying
NK034(ngi)007:2454: thig rdzogs so i ti rgya rgya rgya nor bu
NK034(ngi)007:2455: phra bkod kyi rgyud kyi khong don gyi man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2456: bstan pa ni bzhi ste spyod pa'i man ngag gis
NK034(ngi)007:2457: nyams len pa spyi la bying rgod la sogs pa
NK034(ngi)007:2458: la phan pa'i gnad yin no de yang snang ba
NK034(ngi)007:2459: dbang bsgyur spyod pa'i man ngag ni nyams su len
NK034(ngi)007:2460: pa'i gnad yin te 'di yi dus su sgra thal
NK034(ngi)007:2461: 'gyur gyi man ngag bzhin du 'byung ba lnga'i sgra
NK034(ngi)007:2462: la mngon sum du goms pa rab tu gces so
NK034(ngi)007:2463: de ni phyi rol gyi snang ba zad par bya
NK034(ngi)007:2464: ba'i don du rab tu zab bo de nas 'dug
NK034(ngi)007:2465: tshul la gnas pa'i spyod pas rig pa mngon sum
NK034(ngi)007:2466: gyi man ngag nyams su blangs pas sangs rgya ba
NK034(ngi)007:2467: la the tshom med do de'i man ngag dpe na
NK034(ngi)007:2468: zhib pas des 'grub pa yin no de'i phyir na
NK034(ngi)007:2469: tshig ma yin par don gyis ye shes dge sdig
NK034(ngi)007:2470: las 'das pa'i gnad bstan pa'o khyad par rang gi
NK034(ngi)007:2471: lta ba ni nyams su blang ba'i gnad yin de
NK034(ngi)007:2472: yang mngon sum du 'khor 'das ru shan 'byed pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2473: spyod pa gal che de nas gnad gsum gyi man
NK034(ngi)007:2474: ngag gis rtags dang tshad dang zad pa gsum du
NK034(ngi)007:2475: gtan la phab nas rang gi rig pa mngon sum
NK034(ngi)007:2476: mthong bas gzhan la yid mi 'jug pa'i gnad do
NK034(ngi)007:2477: de'i phyir na nyams su len pa'i gnad rnam pa
NK034(ngi)007:2478: gsum du bsdus nas bstan pa yin no 'bras bu
NK034(ngi)007:2479: ni khyad par gyi 'bras bu sku gsum rang zad
NK034(ngi)007:2480: la song bas rang gi 'bras bu snang ba 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2481: nyid la gtan la phebs pa yin no lhag ma
NK034(ngi)007:2482: ni shes bya'i chos yin gyi nyams su blang du
NK034(ngi)007:2483: btub pa dum re tsam yod kyang khyad par ba
NK034(ngi)007:2484: ma yin no de'i phyir na nyams su blangs pa
NK034(ngi)007:2485: la ni ci yang dgos pa ma yin te bla
NK034(ngi)007:2486: ma'i man ngag rab tu gces so 'di ni nyams
