NK034(ngi)007:2487: su blang bya'i rim pa bstan pa yiin gyi tshig
NK034(ngi)007:2488: gis ni 'tshang rgya ba rdul brgyar gshags pa'i cha
NK034(ngi)007:2489: tsam yang phan pa med do de yang tshig gi
NK034(ngi)007:2490: lta ba thams cad yid dpyod yin gyi dngos po'i
NK034(ngi)007:2491: gshis la rdul tsam yang reg pa med do de'i
NK034(ngi)007:2492: phyir na rig pa mngon sum gyi gdams ngag 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2493: rab tu gsang ngo rgyud kyi rgyal po nor bu
NK034(ngi)007:2494: phra bkod kyi rgyab yig gsang ba man ngag gi
NK034(ngi)007:2495: rgyal po dung yig can gyi snying tig rdzogs so
NK034(ngi)007:2496: bi ma las sgra rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o i
NK034(ngi)007:2497: ti rgya ngo sprod spras pa'i rgyud kyi khong don
NK034(ngi)007:2498: gyi man ngag la bzhi las gnad rnam pa gsum
NK034(ngi)007:2499: gyi ngo sprod kyis rig pa'i ngo bo de nyams
NK034(ngi)007:2500: su len par 'dod pas sngon du 'khor 'das ru
NK034(ngi)007:2501: shan 'byed pa'i lus ngag gi spyod pa ni rab
NK034(ngi)007:2502: tu gces so de yang sgron ma mig nas 'char
NK034(ngi)007:2503: bas ye shes kyi gnad gal che 'od ni mkha'
NK034(ngi)007:2504: la snang bas yul gnad nam mkha' rab tu zab
NK034(ngi)007:2505: ste sprin med pa gces so rang gi mig gis
NK034(ngi)007:2506: rig pa lu gu rgyud mthong bas mig mi bde
NK034(ngi)007:2507: na bcos pa'i thabs rab tu zab ste 'di ni
NK034(ngi)007:2508: 'byung ba cha snyoms par byed pa'i man ngag go
NK034(ngi)007:2509: de yang mig mi bde ba'am tsha ba'am mchi ma
NK034(ngi)007:2510: 'dzag pa snyam byed na mgo gos kyis bstums te
NK034(ngi)007:2511: mig rab tu btsum la dar cig bsdad de nas
NK034(ngi)007:2512: khad kyis langs te dal gyis mig phye la g.yas
NK034(ngi)007:2513: su yud kyis blta de nas mig dal gyis g.yon
NK034(ngi)007:2514: du yud kyis blta de nas steng du blta de
NK034(ngi)007:2515: nas 'og tu yud kyis blta ste de nas sa
NK034(ngi)007:2516: rdo'am shing bu'am mtshan ma can zhig la yun ba
NK034(ngi)007:2517: gcig tu mig ha re bltas pas lus kyi 'byung
NK034(ngi)007:2518: ba 'khrugs par mi 'gyur te de nas yang dal
NK034(ngi)007:2519: gyis seng ge'i lta stangs kyis blta'o des ni 'byung
NK034(ngi)007:2520: ba mi 'khrugs par byed pa'i man ngag zab bo
NK034(ngi)007:2521: de ltar gnad gsum gtims pas sku gsum gyi snang
NK034(ngi)007:2522: ba lam du 'char ba la the tshom med do
NK034(ngi)007:2523: lhag ma ni shes bya'i chos yin no ngo sprod
NK034(ngi)007:2524: spras pa'i rgyud kyi rgyab yig gsang ba man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2525: gi rgyal po dung yig can gyi snying thig rdzogs
NK034(ngi)007:2526: so i ti rgya kun tu bzang po klong drug
NK034(ngi)007:2527: khong don gyi man ngag gnyis su bstan pa yin
NK034(ngi)007:2528: te de'i man ngag rnams la rang snang lhug par
NK034(ngi)007:2529: mthong ba'i man ngag las lus kyi gnad gsum gyi
NK034(ngi)007:2530: man ngag 'di rig pa mngon du bya ba'i chos
NK034(ngi)007:2531: yin te 'di la yang sngon 'gro dang dngos gzhi
NK034(ngi)007:2532: gnyis yin sngon 'gro ni lus ngag sems kyi bya
NK034(ngi)007:2533: ba btang ba yin no dngos gzhi ni 'dug stangs
NK034(ngi)007:2534: gsum yin no de dag gi sngon du 'khor 'das
NK034(ngi)007:2535: ru shan 'byed pa'i spyod pa'i man ngag gal che'o
NK034(ngi)007:2536: de nas gnad gsum gcig tu dril ba'i man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2537: gis rig pa mngon sum du bltas pas te man
NK034(ngi)007:2538: ngag gi rgyal po nyams su len pa'i gnad zangs
NK034(ngi)007:2539: yig can dang 'brel lo de ltar rig pa nyid
NK034(ngi)007:2540: bstan pa dang de nyid nyams su blangs pas snang
NK034(ngi)007:2541: ba skyes pa dang rig pa tshad la phebs pa
NK034(ngi)007:2542: dang chos nyid zad pa dang bzhi rim gyis skyes
NK034(ngi)007:2543: pas sangs rgyas par byed pa'i sa dang 'di nyid
NK034(ngi)007:2544: la phrad par byed pa'i man ngag rab tu zab
NK034(ngi)007:2545: par bstan pa theg pa gzhan las 'di nyid khyad
NK034(ngi)007:2546: par 'phags par bstan pa yin no lhag ma ni
NK034(ngi)007:2547: shes par bya ba'i chos yin no kun tu bzang
NK034(ngi)007:2548: po klong drug pa'i rgyab yig gsang ba man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2549: gi rgyal po dung yig can gyi snying thig rdzogs
NK034(ngi)007:2550: so bi ma las sgra rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o
NK034(ngi)007:2551: s+aa m+aa y+aa rgya rgya rgya gsang ba yi ge
NK034(ngi)007:2552: med pa'i khong don gyi man ngag gsum las zhal
NK034(ngi)007:2553: chems kyi man ngag gis nyams su len pa yin
NK034(ngi)007:2554: te 'di la sngon du 'khor 'das ru shan 'byed
NK034(ngi)007:2555: pa'i lus ngag gi spyod pa ni rab tu gal
NK034(ngi)007:2556: che de yang rig pa'i sngon du bya ba'i chos
NK034(ngi)007:2557: dang dngos gzhi'i chos dang chos nyid zad pa dang
NK034(ngi)007:2558: gsum yin no sngon du bya ba la sngon 'gro
NK034(ngi)007:2559: dang dngos gzhi gnyis yin pa las 'khor ba las
NK034(ngi)007:2560: blo ldog pa'i skal ldan 'khor ba las thar bar
NK034(ngi)007:2561: 'dod pa des bla ma la gdams pa zhu ba
NK034(ngi)007:2562: la sngon du slob mas bya ba gsum gtong dgos
NK034(ngi)007:2563: pas thing ngam zhes dris things zer na bya ba
NK034(ngi)007:2564: gsum gtong ba ni sngon 'gro lags so de nas
NK034(ngi)007:2565: nang gi bya ba gsum gtang ba ni lus ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2566: yid gsum sor gzhug par byed pa'i thabs te rab
NK034(ngi)007:2567: tu zab de nas mi 'gul ba gsum gsang ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:2568: gnad yin pas 'di dag la sogs pa ni dpe
NK034(ngi)007:2569: na ji ltar 'dug pas 'grub pa yin no lhag
NK034(ngi)007:2570: ma ni shes par bya ba yin no gnad 'ga'
NK034(ngi)007:2571: 'dug pa ni mkhas pas dpyad par bya'o de'i phyir
NK034(ngi)007:2572: na sku gsum dang ye shes lnga zhes tshig tu
NK034(ngi)007:2573: 'bras bu yin zer ba ni 'bras bu ni ma
NK034(ngi)007:2574: yin te nyams len pa gcig gi lam du snang
NK034(ngi)007:2575: ba 'di dag 'char ba yin gyi 'bras bu ni
NK034(ngi)007:2576: min no de'i phyir na yid dpyod 'dzin pa'i lta
NK034(ngi)007:2577: bas sangs rgya mi srid do des na gsang ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:2578: yi ge 'di dag rab tu gces par gzung bar
NK034(ngi)007:2579: bya'o gsang ba yi ge med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyab
NK034(ngi)007:2580: yig man ngag gi rgyal po dung yig can gyi
NK034(ngi)007:2581: snying thig rdzogs so rgya rgya rgya sngags kyi srung
NK034(ngi)007:2582: mas srungs shig rgyud kyi rgyal po seng ge rtsal
NK034(ngi)007:2583: rdzogs kyi khong don gnad kyi man ngag gsum las
NK034(ngi)007:2584: lta ba phugs kyi man ngag la gnyis las 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2585: gnyis kyis nyams su blang ba dngos gzhi'i man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2586: bstan pa ste 'di dag gi sngon du 'khor 'das
NK034(ngi)007:2587: ru shan 'byed pa la sogs pa lus ngag gi
NK034(ngi)007:2588: gnad rnams gtan la phab nas dngos gzhi 'di ltar
NK034(ngi)007:2589: byed pa yin no nyams su longs pa'i tshad kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2590: man ngag ni nyams gong nas gong du 'phel ba
NK034(ngi)007:2591: yin gyi 'di la nan tan bya mi dgos te
NK034(ngi)007:2592: 'di ltar nyams su blangs pa'i mi skye mi srid
NK034(ngi)007:2593: do lhag ma ni shes bya yin no seng ge
NK034(ngi)007:2594: rtsal rdzogs kyi rgyud kyi rgyab yig man ngag gi
NK034(ngi)007:2595: rgyal po dung yig can gyi snying thig rdzogs so
NK034(ngi)007:2596: i ti rgya mu tig phreng ba'i rgyud kyi gnad
NK034(ngi)007:2597: yig khong don gyi man ngag rnam pa gsum las
NK034(ngi)007:2598: gnad rnam pa gsum gyis thob par byed pa'i man
NK034(ngi)007:2599: ngag gis nyams su blang ste de yang 'bad med
NK034(ngi)007:2600: grol ba'i man ngag ni gang zag le lo can
NK034(ngi)007:2601: 'jug par byed pa yin gyi sangs rgyas pa ni
NK034(ngi)007:2602: ma yin no de ci'i phyir zhe na yid dpyod
NK034(ngi)007:2603: 'dzin pa'i rdzogs chen rnams dang khyad par ci yang
NK034(ngi)007:2604: med pa'i phyir ro rtsol ba gnad gzir ba ni
NK034(ngi)007:2605: 'bad bcas zer yang thog ma gnad gzir ba'i dus
NK034(ngi)007:2606: su rtsol bar mngon tsam las 'di ni dal bas
NK034(ngi)007:2607: bsgrub pa'i gnad yig yin pas 'di nyams su ma
NK034(ngi)007:2608: blangs na 'tshang rgya mi srid pas 'di dag gi
NK034(ngi)007:2609: 'khor 'das ru shan 'byed pa la sogs pa lus
NK034(ngi)007:2610: ngag gi gnad rnams sngon du byas te snang ba
NK034(ngi)007:2611: khregs chod kyi man ngag gis snang ba 'di gtan
NK034(ngi)007:2612: la phab ste 'khrul pa rnams rang dag la gtong
NK034(ngi)007:2613: ba'i gnad yin no rig pa thod rgal gyi man
NK034(ngi)007:2614: ngag gis rig pa'i snang ba gtan la 'bebs pa
NK034(ngi)007:2615: ste 'dug stangs bzhi la sogs pa dpe na zhib
NK034(ngi)007:2616: pas des 'grub pa yin lhag ma ni shes bya'i
NK034(ngi)007:2617: chos yin pas de'i phyir na tshig gis sangs mi
NK034(ngi)007:2618: rgya ba'i gnad do rgyud kyi rgyal po mu tig
NK034(ngi)007:2619: phreng ba'i gnad yig gsang ba man ngag gi rgyal
NK034(ngi)007:2620: po dung yig can gyi snying thig rdzogs so sa
NK034(ngi)007:2621: ma y+aa rgya rgya rgya rig pa rang grol gyi
NK034(ngi)007:2622: rgyud kyi man ngag gi khong don gyi gnad yig
NK034(ngi)007:2623: man ngag gsum las gcig pu grogs dang bral ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:2624: man ngag gis rig pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i man
NK034(ngi)007:2625: ngag bstan te de yang su dang yang mi 'grogs
NK034(ngi)007:2626: pa ni gnad yin no 'di yi sngon du 'khor
NK034(ngi)007:2627: 'das ru shan 'byed pa'i spyod pa ni rab tu
NK034(ngi)007:2628: gal che'o de nas lu gu rgyud mkha' la 'byin
NK034(ngi)007:2629: pa'i man ngag ni rig pa dngos gzhi'i man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2630: yin te 'di ni shes rab kyi spyod yul ma
NK034(ngi)007:2631: yin par dbang po'i spyod yul du gtan la dbab
NK034(ngi)007:2632: tu yod pas na nges pa kho nar nyams su
NK034(ngi)007:2633: blangs pa gal che'o snang ba cer bzhag dbyings su
NK034(ngi)007:2634: grol ba'i man ngag gis ni nyams gong nas gong
NK034(ngi)007:2635: du 'phel ba'i snang ba gtan la 'bebs pa yin
NK034(ngi)007:2636: te tshad yig ces bya'o de ltar nyams su blangs
NK034(ngi)007:2637: pa las chos nyid zad par grol ba ni rang
NK034(ngi)007:2638: shugs kyis 'byung ba yin no 'di ni nyams su
NK034(ngi)007:2639: blang ba la thug pas nyams su blangs na dge
NK034(ngi)007:2640: sdig gang gis kyang phan gnod dang bral bas rang
NK034(ngi)007:2641: bzhin rdzogs pa chen po nyid yin par bstan pa'o
NK034(ngi)007:2642: man ngag 'di gsum gyis rang gi ngo bo nyams
NK034(ngi)007:2643: su blangs pas gang zag gcig sangs rgya bar byed
NK034(ngi)007:2644: pa'o rig pa rang grol gyi rgyud kyi rgyab yig
NK034(ngi)007:2645: gsang ba man ngag gi rgyal po dung yig can
NK034(ngi)007:2646: gyi snying thig rdzogs so rgya rin po che spungs
NK034(ngi)007:2647: pa'i rgyud kyi khong don gyi man ngag gi gnad
NK034(ngi)007:2648: yig ni man ngag gnyis las rgya che zad pa
NK034(ngi)007:2649: med pa'i dbyings rig gi man ngag gis nyams su
NK034(ngi)007:2650: blang ba dngos gzhi ste 'di la yang dang po
NK034(ngi)007:2651: ru shan 'byed pa rab tu gal che'o de nas
NK034(ngi)007:2652: dbyings kyi gnad dang rig pa'i gnad kyi man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2653: ni dpe na gsal bas des 'grub nges so lhag
NK034(ngi)007:2654: ma ni shes par bya ba'i chos yin gyi nyams
NK034(ngi)007:2655: su blang bya ni ma yin no de'i phyir na
NK034(ngi)007:2656: gnad kyi rgyab yig 'di rab tu gces so rin
NK034(ngi)007:2657: po che spungs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyab yig man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2658: gi rgyal po dung yig can gyi snying tig rdzogs
NK034(ngi)007:2659: so i ti rgya sku gdung 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2660: gnad yig khong don gyi man ngag ni gsum las
NK034(ngi)007:2661: gnad gsum man ngag gi tshad kyis nyams su blangs
NK034(ngi)007:2662: pas nyams su myong ba skye ste 'di'i sngon du
NK034(ngi)007:2663: 'khor 'das ru shan 'byed pa'i spyod pas lus ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2664: sbyong ba rab tu gces lus ngag gi gnad kyis
NK034(ngi)007:2665: sku gsum lam du blang bar bya ste 'di la
NK034(ngi)007:2666: ngo sprad pa'i thabs rab tu gsang ba'o de yang
NK034(ngi)007:2667: sku gsum gyi snang ba la bslabs nas phyir mi
NK034(ngi)007:2668: ldog pa yin no de nas rig pa sngon du
NK034(ngi)007:2669: yul la gtad pa ni bla ma'i man ngag ste
NK034(ngi)007:2670: de ltar gtad pas nyams gong nas gong du 'phel
NK034(ngi)007:2671: ba la sogs pa 'byung ba la the tshom med
NK034(ngi)007:2672: do de'i gsang ba'i man ngag 'di rab tu zab
NK034(ngi)007:2673: pas gzhan la tshig tsam yang brjod par mi bya'o
NK034(ngi)007:2674: de ltar nyams su blangs pas lus ngag yid kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2675: rtags ni nges pa kho nar 'ong ste 'di ni
NK034(ngi)007:2676: gang zag yid ches par bya ba'i don yin gyi
NK034(ngi)007:2677: nyams su len pa'i dngos gzhi la dgos pa ci
NK034(ngi)007:2678: yang med do de yang 'di ltar nyams su blangs
NK034(ngi)007:2679: na rtags 'di kun ni mi 'ong mi srid do
NK034(ngi)007:2680: 'di ni rtags yig ces bya ste dpe ltar 'ong
NK034(ngi)007:2681: nges pa yin no 'di ltar 'byung ba ni goms
NK034(ngi)007:2682: tshad las byung ba dang btsan thabs su 'byung ba
NK034(ngi)007:2683: gnyis yin no 'on kyang rtags yig la sogs pa
NK034(ngi)007:2684: lhag ma 'di kun shes bya yin no sku gdung
NK034(ngi)007:2685: 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyab yig gsang ba man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2686: gi rgyal po dung yig can gyi snying tig rdzogs
NK034(ngi)007:2687: so i ti rgya rgya rgya nyi zla kha sbyor
NK034(ngi)007:2688: gyi rgyud kyi gnad yig khong don gyi man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2689: bzhi las rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar dor nyams su
NK034(ngi)007:2690: blang ba ni gnad yin te 'dir nyams su ma
NK034(ngi)007:2691: blangs na bar do la re ba rnams ni rnam
NK034(ngi)007:2692: dpyod dus la ltos pa rnams dus der 'byung bar
NK034(ngi)007:2693: mi 'gyur ro chos nyid kyi bar do la sangs
NK034(ngi)007:2694: rgya bar byed pa la 'di nyid du nyams su
NK034(ngi)007:2695: blang ba gces so de yang 'khor 'das ru shan
NK034(ngi)007:2696: 'byed pa la sogs zangs yig can ltar byas nas
NK034(ngi)007:2697: nyams su blangs pa'i tshe skyes bu de gal te
NK034(ngi)007:2698: bar chod du ma song na 'di dag tu sangs
NK034(ngi)007:2699: rgya ba yin gyi bstan pa tsam gyis ma yin
NK034(ngi)007:2700: no de yang rig pa'i man ngag bla mas bstan
NK034(ngi)007:2701: nas nyams dum re tsam blangs nas bar chad na
NK034(ngi)007:2702: ni rang bzhin sprul sku'i zhing khams su dbugs phyung
NK034(ngi)007:2703: nas sangs rgya ba la the tshom med do nyams
NK034(ngi)007:2704: gong nas gong du 'phel ba'i snang ba thig le'i
NK034(ngi)007:2705: snang ba tshun chad la bar chad na chos nyid
NK034(ngi)007:2706: kyi bar do la sangs rgya ba la the tshom
NK034(ngi)007:2707: med do de'i phyir na 'di ni skye ba ma
NK034(ngi)007:2708: brgyud par sangs rgya ba'i gnad yin no de phan
NK034(ngi)007:2709: chad la ni sku gsum gyi snang ba lam du
NK034(ngi)007:2710: snang ba zhes bya ste phyir ldog pa ni ma
NK034(ngi)007:2711: yin no 'di nyid las 'byung bar rang zad las
NK034(ngi)007:2712: sangs rgya ba ma yin no de'i phyir na nyams
NK034(ngi)007:2713: su len pa la ni 'di kun la dgos pa
NK034(ngi)007:2714: med de tshig ces bya ba yin no 'di nyid
NK034(ngi)007:2715: la goms pa bar ma chad pa'i skyes bu rnams
NK034(ngi)007:2716: la ni bshad mi dgos par shugs kyis skye ba
NK034(ngi)007:2717: yin no nyi zla kha sbyor gyi rgyab yig man
NK034(ngi)007:2718: ngag gi rgyal po dung yig can gyi snying thig
NK034(ngi)007:2719: rdzogs so i ti rgya rgya rgya de dag gi
NK034(ngi)007:2720: bstan pa dam pa srung ba'i rgyud dpal nag mo
NK034(ngi)007:2721: khros ma'i rgyud kyi gnad yig khong don gyi man
NK034(ngi)007:2722: ngag gsum las bsam pas gnag pa'i man ngag ni
NK034(ngi)007:2723: nyams su len pa'i dus na bya ba yin gyi
NK034(ngi)007:2724: gzhan du ni 'grub pa ma yin no dus tshod
NK034(ngi)007:2725: ni thun dang zor gyii dus na sbyar ba yin
NK034(ngi)007:2726: gyi gzhan la ni ma yin te bsam le ma
NK034(ngi)007:2727: gsang ba ngan sngags 'dus pa'i rgyud le'u stong bzhi
NK034(ngi)007:2728: bcu yod pa las bsam pas 'grub pa'i le'u 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2729: phyungs pa yin te 'di min bsam le mas ni
NK034(ngi)007:2730: 'grub pa ma yin no bsam pa'i dus su rnal
NK034(ngi)007:2731: 'byor pa'i mgo bo lta lugs ni dus tshod 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2732: kun dang bstun dgos so 'di dang ma bstun na
NK034(ngi)007:2733: rnal 'byor pas las mi 'grub pas sngags pa yi
NK034(ngi)007:2734: chad pa las don mi 'byung ngo thun drug la
NK034(ngi)007:2735: sogs pa'i ngan sngags 'di dag ni gcig tu dril
NK034(ngi)007:2736: ba'i man ngag la b+h+yohsngagasa bdun btags nas bsgrub pa
NK034(ngi)007:2737: las de min du 'grub mi srid do thun ya
NK034(ngi)007:2738: bral ba rnams ni shes bya yin pa las lag
NK034(ngi)007:2739: tu blang du mi btub ste blangs kyang yi chad
NK034(ngi)007:2740: pa las don mi 'grub bo de'i phyir na gsang
NK034(ngi)007:2741: sngags kyi rgyud kun la rgyab yig med na gzugs
NK034(ngi)007:2742: kyi nang gi las tshogs dang 'dra ste 'grub mi
NK034(ngi)007:2743: srid pas yi chad pa las phan med do e
NK034(ngi)007:2744: ka tsa ti nag mo khros ma'i rgyud kyi rgyab
NK034(ngi)007:2745: yig man ngag gi rgyal po dung yig can gyi
NK034(ngi)007:2746: snying tig rdzogs so rgya de ltar gsang ba'i rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:2747: bcu bdun la khong don gyi man ngag de dag
NK034(ngi)007:2748: ni nyams su len pa'i skyes bu la de ltar
NK034(ngi)007:2749: ston pa yin gyi tshogs bshad du ma yin no
NK034(ngi)007:2750: dpe'i nang gi rgyud bcu bdun gang zag gcig gi
NK034(ngi)007:2751: cha rkyen du bsgrigs nas nyams su len par bstan
NK034(ngi)007:2752: nas yod de de ma yin pas rgyud re re
NK034(ngi)007:2753: nas gang zag re res nyams su blangs pa'i man
NK034(ngi)007:2754: ngag tu bsgrigs nas bstan pa yin no bshad cing
NK034(ngi)007:2755: spros pa la dga' na de ltar yang nyams su
NK034(ngi)007:2756: len pa'i lag len du bsgrigs nas bstan pa yin
NK034(ngi)007:2757: gyi yang dag par na rgyud kyi tshig kun la
NK034(ngi)007:2758: dgos ched med do de yang tshig gis rig pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2759: ye shes gtan la mi phebs pa'i gnad kyis so
NK034(ngi)007:2760: de'i phyir na gsang ba'i man ngag snying thig 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2761: nas theg pa gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2762: man ngag 'di rnams ston pa yin no de yang
NK034(ngi)007:2763: tshig gis sangs rgya ba la rdul tsam yang phan
NK034(ngi)007:2764: pa med par bstan pa dang rig pa'i ye shes
NK034(ngi)007:2765: de shes rab kyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa
NK034(ngi)007:2766: dang bla mas gdams ngag bstan na dbang po la
NK034(ngi)007:2767: rno rtul med pa dang nyams su len nus na
NK034(ngi)007:2768: las la bzang ngan med pa dang bla mas rig
NK034(ngi)007:2769: pa'i man ngag bstan pa'i mi la las dge sdig
NK034(ngi)007:2770: med par bstan pa dang sku gsum dang ye shes
NK034(ngi)007:2771: lnga'i snang ba rnams 'di nyid la lam du snang
NK034(ngi)007:2772: ba las 'bras bu ma yin pa dang drug gis
NK034(ngi)007:2773: theg pa gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pas rig
NK034(ngi)007:2774: pa nyid shes rab kyi spyod yul ma yin par
NK034(ngi)007:2775: dbang po'i spyod yul du gtan la phab nas 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2776: nyid la phyi nang gi 'byung ba rnams rang sar
NK034(ngi)007:2777: dwangs pas zag bcas kyi phung po mi snang bar
NK034(ngi)007:2778: lhag med du 'tshang rgya bas na man ngag 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2779: shin tu zab bar bstan pa'o man ngag gi rgyal
NK034(ngi)007:2780: po dung yig can 'di ni man ngag yin gyi
NK034(ngi)007:2781: kha byang ni ma yin no 'di la 'dra min
NK034(ngi)007:2782: gnyis yod pa las yang dag pa'i man ngag 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2783: lags so kha byang ni 'di bas nyung ba mi
NK034(ngi)007:2784: zab pa zhig yod do de'i phyir na 'di rab
NK034(ngi)007:2785: tu gces so rang bzhin rdzogs chen po thig le'i
NK034(ngi)007:2786: skor gyi rgyud 'di rnams kyang rgyud rkyang pa yin
NK034(ngi)007:2787: te sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas gsungs pa'i nang sbrel
NK034(ngi)007:2788: te bshad pa yin pa las 'grel pa bdag gis
NK034(ngi)007:2789: byas pa'i sku'i rgyud kyi don 'grel chung ba gcig
NK034(ngi)007:2790: yon tan gyi rgyud kyi dbu 'grel dang snying gi
NK034(ngi)007:2791: me long gi 'grel chung dang dbang 'grel dang bzhi
NK034(ngi)007:2792: las med do bshad na rgyud nang sdebs nas bshad
NK034(ngi)007:2793: pa yin no nyams su len pa'i gnad du man
NK034(ngi)007:2794: ngag gi yi ge rnams yin la yid ches 'jug
NK034(ngi)007:2795: par byed pa la rgyud rnams yin no de'i gdams
NK034(ngi)007:2796: pa snying tig la 'bebs pa ni yi ge gsum
NK034(ngi)007:2797: yin te rgyab yig dang tshad yig dang rtags yig
NK034(ngi)007:2798: dang gsum med na nyams su blangs kyang tshi chad
NK034(ngi)007:2799: pa las don ci yang med do man ngag gi
NK034(ngi)007:2800: rgyal po dung yig can gyi rgyab yig mkhas pa
NK034(ngi)007:2801: chen po bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs
NK034(ngi)007:2802: so bye ma las sgra rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o
NK034(ngi)007:2803: dpal ldan mgon po legs ldan nag pos bka' 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2804: srungs shig s+aa m+aa y+aa smug nag e ka tsa
NK034(ngi)007:2805: tis bka' 'di srungs shig sa ma y+aa lce btsun
NK034(ngi)007:2806: bdag gis 'o yug phyi gong rdza'i ra bar 'di
NK034(ngi)007:2807: kho na ltar nyams su blangs pas grub pa min
NK034(ngi)007:2808: re mgo khos mdo rgyud gsal bar byed pa'i man
NK034(ngi)007:2809: ngag dung yig can tshigs bcad 'di rnams lce btsun
NK034(ngi)007:2811: 'di ni gsang ba'i mdo rgyud thams cad las man
NK034(ngi)007:2812: ngag snying po bsdus pa'i bcud yin pas de yi
NK034(ngi)007:2813: man ngag mi 'gyur don bstan pa dmigs gtad rin
NK034(ngi)007:2814: chen gsal ba'i sgron ma yis 'di yi mdo don
NK034(ngi)007:2815: 'gyur med gsal bar byas gsang ba ngo bo nyid
NK034(ngi)007:2816: kyi debs kyis ni 'di yi don gyi man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2817: zab pa ni 'khrul med yin par shes pa gnad
NK034(ngi)007:2818: du phab mdo byang bsdus pa'i sgron mas rang ngo
NK034(ngi)007:2819: bstan rtsa tig snying 'bebs rgyab yig 'di dang bzhis
NK034(ngi)007:2820: gsang ba'i yang bcud man ngag dung yig can lhag
NK034(ngi)007:2821: ma med par yongs su rdzogs pa'o sa ma y+aa
NK034(ngi)007:2822: rgya rgya rgya shu b+ham mastu sarba dza ga tam
NK034(ngi)007:2823: mang+ga lam dung yig can rgyud kyi khong snying bsdebs
NK034(ngi)007:2824: pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so +thii rgya gar skad
NK034(ngi)007:2825: du tan+t+ra tsit+ta d+ha t+p+aa ye bod skad du rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:2826: kyi khong snying bsdebs pa rdo rje stong pa che
NK034(ngi)007:2827: la phyag 'tshal lo lung dang rig pas rgyud don
NK034(ngi)007:2828: gsal phye nas man ngag nges pa'i don 'di bstan
NK034(ngi)007:2829: par bgyi 'di dag rnams kyi snying phyung don bsdebs
NK034(ngi)007:2830: te gang zag gcig gi rgyud la goms par bya
NK034(ngi)007:2831: kye ma rigs kyi bu rnams 'di ltar goms shing
NK034(ngi)007:2832: brtan par gyis shig theg pa chen po'i rigs la
NK034(ngi)007:2833: gnas shing theg pa chen pos gzhan don mthar phyin
NK034(ngi)007:2834: par byas nas de nas gsang ba'i man ngag la
NK034(ngi)007:2835: 'jug par bya ba'i phyir na sgra thal 'gyur gyi
NK034(ngi)007:2836: rgyud kyi don gyi man ngag gis sprul pa'i sku
NK034(ngi)007:2837: bsgrubs te gzhan gyi don rdzogs par byas nas rang
NK034(ngi)007:2838: gi dgongs pa la gnas par bya ba'i phyir rtags
NK034(ngi)007:2839: bkod yi ge'i sgra don gyis grags stong dbyer med
NK034(ngi)007:2840: du shes par byas 'gro ba rigs drug gi rang
NK034(ngi)007:2841: sgras pha rol gyi don bya mi bya dang mngon
NK034(ngi)007:2842: par shes pa rgyud la smin par byas nas de
NK034(ngi)007:2843: nas 'byung ba lnga'i sgra don gyis rdzu 'phrul ya
NK034(ngi)007:2844: ma zung bsgrubs nas pha rol gyi don byed pa'o
NK034(ngi)007:2845: de nas rang gi rig pa'i don la 'jug pa
NK034(ngi)007:2846: ste bkra shis mdzes ldan gyi rgyud kyi man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2847: gis rig pa'i gnas tshul gtan la dbab ste 'khrul
NK034(ngi)007:2848: pa'i gzhi gtan la phab pa'i man ngag gis rig
NK034(ngi)007:2849: pa'i rang ngo shes par byas nas ma 'khrul pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2850: ye shes ngos bzung ba'i man ngag gis rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:2851: rang du gtan la phab nas 'khrul pa'i 'khrul lugs
NK034(ngi)007:2852: kyi man ngag gis rig pa'i shan phye nas de
NK034(ngi)007:2853: bzlog pa'i man ngag gis rig pa'i 'gro sa ngo
NK034(ngi)007:2854: shes par bya'o de ltar rig pa'i 'khrul gzhi gtan
NK034(ngi)007:2855: la phab nas da rig pa'i gol sa gcod pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2856: phyir kun tu bzang po thugs kyi me long gi
NK034(ngi)007:2857: man ngag gis gtan la 'bebs dgos te blos btags
NK034(ngi)007:2858: rim pa'i gol sa gcod pa'i man ngag gis rig
NK034(ngi)007:2859: pa theg pa gzhan gyi grub mtha'i phyogs su lhung
NK034(ngi)007:2860: ngam ma lhung gtan la phab nas nyams su blangs
NK034(ngi)007:2861: 'khrul pa'i gol sa gcod pa'i man ngag gis bla
NK034(ngi)007:2862: ma'i gdams ngag ma 'khrul bar gtan la phab ste
NK034(ngi)007:2863: dngos po gshis kyi 'dug tshul ma yin par 'dzin
NK034(ngi)007:2864: pa'i gol sa gcod pa'i man ngag gis rang gi
NK034(ngi)007:2865: rig pa'i 'dug tshul gtan la dbab pa'o de ltar
NK034(ngi)007:2866: rig pa'i gol sa bcad nas da rang gi rig
NK034(ngi)007:2867: pa sgron mar gtan la dbab pa'i phyir sgron ma
NK034(ngi)007:2868: 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi man ngag gis bstan te btags
NK034(ngi)007:2869: pa tshig gi sgron ma'i man ngag gis ming mtshon
NK034(ngi)007:2870: par byas nas rten 'brel rdzas kyi sgron ma'i man
NK034(ngi)007:2871: ngag gis skyes bu'i rtsol ba las ye shes skye
NK034(ngi)007:2872: ba'i dpe gtan la phab nas spyi mthun las kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2873: sgron ma'i man ngag gis rig pa zung 'jug gi
NK034(ngi)007:2874: dpe gzhan la phab nas mtshon pa dpe'i sgron ma'i
NK034(ngi)007:2875: man ngag gis rang gi rig pa la phyin ci
NK034(ngi)007:2876: log gi rtog pa bsal nas ye shes rtags kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2877: sgron ma'i man ngag gis lus kyi gnad skyes bu'i
NK034(ngi)007:2878: rtsol ba la brten nas nyams su blang bar bstan
NK034(ngi)007:2879: pa'o de ltar sgron ma gtan la phab nas da
NK034(ngi)007:2880: rang gi rig pa'i sgron ma de yang dpe du
NK034(ngi)007:2881: ma'i sgo nas ngo sprad nas ye shes ngos bzung
NK034(ngi)007:2882: ste sgron ma'i snang ba rang snang du gtan la
NK034(ngi)007:2883: dbab pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me
NK034(ngi)007:2884: long gi rgyud kyi man ngag rnams bstan te ngo
NK034(ngi)007:2885: sprod nyi shu rtsa gcig gis dbang po rab 'bring
NK034(ngi)007:2886: nyi shu rtsa gcig la sprad pas ye shes skye
NK034(ngi)007:2887: bar byas nas de yang dbang po gsum gyi don
NK034(ngi)007:2888: du bsdus nas bstan sgron ma'i snang ba'i man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2889: gi gnad bzhis gtan la phab ste nyams su len
NK034(ngi)007:2890: pa'i gnad btsal lo de ltar ngo sprad nas ngo
NK034(ngi)007:2891: sprod kyi man ngag de nyid rang yang lta sgom
NK034(ngi)007:2892: spyod pa gsum du gtan la dbab par bstan pa
NK034(ngi)007:2893: ni rig pa rang shar gyi rgyud kyi man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2894: gis bstan te spyod pa'i man ngag gis rang bzhin
NK034(ngi)007:2895: gyi snang ba gtan la phab nas sgom pa'i man
NK034(ngi)007:2896: ngag gis rang bzhin gyi blo mi gnas pa gnas
NK034(ngi)007:2897: par byas te rang gi rig pa nyid du gtan
NK034(ngi)007:2898: la phab nas lta ba'i man ngag gis rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:2899: sku gsum du gtan la phab ste gang zag bzhi'i
NK034(ngi)007:2900: don du ye shes bzhi skye ba'i rim pa bstan
NK034(ngi)007:2901: pa'o de ltar lta sgom du gtan la phab nas
NK034(ngi)007:2902: da lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu de dag gi
NK034(ngi)007:2903: skyon dang gol sa bcad cing bsal ba'i phyir nor
NK034(ngi)007:2904: bu phra bkod kyi rgyud kyi man ngag bstan te
NK034(ngi)007:2905: spyod pa gtso bor byed pa'i man ngag gis sgom
NK034(ngi)007:2906: pa'i bying rgod dang snang ba'i skyon rnams bsal bar
NK034(ngi)007:2907: byas nas sgom pa la gtso bor byed pa'i man
NK034(ngi)007:2908: ngag gis dbang po gsum gyi sems bzung ba'i cho
NK034(ngi)007:2909: ga dang gnas par byas nas lta ba gtsor byed
NK034(ngi)007:2910: pa'i man ngag gis spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid
NK034(ngi)007:2911: gtan la phab nas 'bras bu la gtsor byed pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2912: man ngag gis spyi dang rang gi 'bras bu ji
NK034(ngi)007:2913: ltar thob pa'i rim pa gtan la phab bo de
NK034(ngi)007:2914: ltar lta sgom spyod pa dang 'bras bu'i skyon dang
NK034(ngi)007:2915: gol sa bcad nas da rig pa'i ngo bo de
NK034(ngi)007:2916: lag len du bsgrig na ji ltar sgrig bstan pa
NK034(ngi)007:2917: ni ngo sprad spras pa'i rgyud kyi man ngag bstan
NK034(ngi)007:2918: te dpe don rtags gsum gyi man ngag gis snang
NK034(ngi)007:2919: ba la yid ches par byas nas rig pa dang
NK034(ngi)007:2920: 'od ye shes gsum gyi man ngag gis lag tu
NK034(ngi)007:2921: len pa'i grangs shes par byas nas sku gsum gyi
NK034(ngi)007:2922: ngo sprod kyi gdams ngag gis rig pa gtan la
NK034(ngi)007:2923: phab nas gnad gsum du bzhag pa'i ngo sprod kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2924: man ngag gis nyams su blangs pas lag len gtan
NK034(ngi)007:2925: la phab pa'o de ltar lag len gtan la phab
NK034(ngi)007:2926: nas da rigs drug gi skye ba'i sgo dgag pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2927: phyir kun tu bzang po klong drug pa'i rgyud kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2928: man ngag gis gtan la dbab par bya ste rigs
NK034(ngi)007:2929: drug gi 'bros khungs gcod pa'i man ngag gis yul
NK034(ngi)007:2930: drug rnams dag par byas nas rang snang lhug par
NK034(ngi)007:2931: shar ba'i man ngag gis snang ba'i rkyen thams cad
NK034(ngi)007:2932: dang bral bar bya'o de ltar rigs drug gi skye
NK034(ngi)007:2933: gnas bcad nas da nyams su blang ba dngos la
NK034(ngi)007:2934: 'jug par bya ste yi ge med pa'i rgyud kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2935: man ngag gis nyams su len pa dngos bstan to
NK034(ngi)007:2936: zhal chems kyi man ngag gis phyi nang gsang ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:2937: bya ba btang ste rkyen med kyi yul du gnas
NK034(ngi)007:2938: par byas nas bzhag thabs bzhi'i man ngag gis rig
NK034(ngi)007:2939: pa rang sor chud par byas nas dbyings dang rig
NK034(ngi)007:2940: pa'i man ngag gis dngos gzhi rig pa zag pa
NK034(ngi)007:2941: med pa'i thabs bstan pa'o de ltar nyams su blang
NK034(ngi)007:2942: ba'i thabs bstan nas da nyams su longs pa'i tshad
NK034(ngi)007:2943: gtan la dbab pa'i phyir seng ge rtsal rdzogs kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2944: rgyud kyi man ngag gis bstan te bsgom pa rnam
NK034(ngi)007:2945: pa lnga'i man ngag gis rang gis shes pa brtan
NK034(ngi)007:2946: tshad bzung la lta ba zhe phugs kyi man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:2947: gis rig pa mi 'gyur bar byas nas nyams su
NK034(ngi)007:2948: blangs pa dngos gzhi'i man ngag gis nyams gong nas
NK034(ngi)007:2949: gong 'phel bar bya'o de ltar nyams su blang ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:2950: tshad bstan nas da rig pa de phyir mi ldog
NK034(ngi)007:2951: par bya ba'i phyir mu tig phreng ba'i rgyud kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2952: man ngag gis rig pa ma smin pa smin par
NK034(ngi)007:2953: bya'o gal mdo bcu gcig gi man ngag gis rig
NK034(ngi)007:2954: pa khrigs su nyams su blangs nas gnad rnam pa
NK034(ngi)007:2955: gsum mthong ba'i man ngag gis goms pa'i gdings bcas
NK034(ngi)007:2956: nas 'khrul pa'i rang rkyen dag pa'i man ngag gis
NK034(ngi)007:2957: 'bad bcas dang 'bad med du grol bar bstan pa'o
NK034(ngi)007:2958: de ltar rig pa phyir mi ldog par byas nas
NK034(ngi)007:2959: da rig pa de byas pa ma yin par rang
NK034(ngi)007:2960: gis rang grol bar bya ba ni rig pa rang
NK034(ngi)007:2961: grol gyi rgyud kyi man ngag gis bstan te gcig
NK034(ngi)007:2962: pu grogs dang bral bar gnas pa'i man ngag gis
NK034(ngi)007:2963: snang ba la dbang bar byas nas rig pa mkha'
NK034(ngi)007:2964: la dbyung ba'i man ngag gis rdo rje lu gu
NK034(ngi)007:2965: rgyud dang 'dris par byas la snang ba cer bzhag
NK034(ngi)007:2966: gi man ngag gis 'khor 'das thams cad rang grol
NK034(ngi)007:2967: du bya'o de ltar rang grol du bstan nas da
NK034(ngi)007:2968: yon tan sna tshogs su shar ba thams cad dbyings
NK034(ngi)007:2969: rig rang gi ngo bo yin par bstan pa'i phyir
NK034(ngi)007:2970: rin po che spungs pa'i rgyud kyi man ngag bstan
NK034(ngi)007:2971: te yon tan du ma rdzogs pa'i rig pa'i gnad
NK034(ngi)007:2972: kyi man ngag gis thams cad rang gi rig pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2973: cho 'phrul du bltas nas rgya che ba dbyings rig
NK034(ngi)007:2974: gi man ngag gi gnad du ma'i sgo nas rang
NK034(ngi)007:2975: gi dbyings rig tu rtogs par bya'o de ltar yon
NK034(ngi)007:2976: tan sna tshogs su shar ba thams cad rang gi
NK034(ngi)007:2977: dbyings rig tu gtan la phab nas da gang zag
NK034(ngi)007:2978: rnams 'jug cing yid ches par bya ba'i phyir snga
NK034(ngi)007:2979: rtags phyi rtags ni sku gdung 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi
NK034(ngi)007:2980: gdams ngag bstan te gnad rnam pa gsum goms pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2981: tshad kyis rgyud smin pa'i man ngag gis lus la
NK034(ngi)007:2982: sku gsum 'byung ba'i rtags gtan la phab nas rnam
NK034(ngi)007:2983: par dag pa'i nam mkha' la gzer 'debs pa'i man
NK034(ngi)007:2984: ngag gis rig pa smin pa'i rtags bstan te nyams
NK034(ngi)007:2985: su blangs pa goms pa'i rtags kyi man ngag gis
NK034(ngi)007:2986: lus ngag yid gsum 'tshang rgya ba'i snga rtags dang
NK034(ngi)007:2987: phyi rtags kyis gzhan 'jug pa'i don bstan pa'o de
NK034(ngi)007:2988: ltar rtags dang ldan pa'i gang zag de mya ngan
NK034(ngi)007:2989: las 'da' bas da lam du bar do la ji
NK034(ngi)007:2990: ltar 'char ba'i snang ba bstan pa ni nyi zla
NK034(ngi)007:2991: kha sbyor gyi rgyud kyi gdams ngag gis gtan la
NK034(ngi)007:2992: dbab ste rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar do la shes
NK034(ngi)007:2993: pa gras thag bcad pa'i gdams ngag gis bla ma'i
NK034(ngi)007:2994: man ngag la yid ches par byas nas 'chi kha
NK034(ngi)007:2995: ma'i bar do la mi gsal ba gsal gdab pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:2996: man ngag gis rang gi rig pa brtan par byas
NK034(ngi)007:2997: nas chos nyid kyi bar do la rang gi rig
NK034(ngi)007:2998: pa ngos bzung ste 'tshang rgya bar bstan pa'o gal
NK034(ngi)007:2999: te ma smin pa'i dbang po rtul po rnams ni
NK034(ngi)007:3000: srid pa'i bar do la las kyi 'phro 'thud pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:3001: man ngag gis rang bzhin sprul pa sku'i zhing khams
NK034(ngi)007:3002: su dbugs phyung nas skye ba gcig gis bar do
NK034(ngi)007:3003: med par yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
NK034(ngi)007:3004: bstan pa'o de ltar de dag gi sngon du ni
NK034(ngi)007:3005: rten khyad par can du bsgrub pa'i phyir rdzogs pa
NK034(ngi)007:3006: rang byung gi rgyud kyi man ngag gis dbang rnam
NK034(ngi)007:3007: bzhi bstan te phyi nang gi dbang gi man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:3008: gis dbang po rtul po rnams zhugs par byas nas
NK034(ngi)007:3009: gsang ba shes rab ye shes gsal bar byed pa'i
NK034(ngi)007:3010: gdams ngag gis chags pa can gyi gang zag rnams
NK034(ngi)007:3011: yang dag pa'i lam du drangs nas rang rig pa
NK034(ngi)007:3012: yongs su rdzogs pa chen po'i dbang gi man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:3013: gis de dag rnams kyi zhen pa bzlog par bya
NK034(ngi)007:3014: ba'i phyir rig pa rtsal gyis dbang bskur du med
NK034(ngi)007:3015: par bstan pa'o grogs dam tshig ni rgyud de dag
NK034(ngi)007:3016: re re la ldan pas gud du ma bshad do
NK034(ngi)007:3017: de ltar gang zag gcig gi cha rkyen du rgyud
NK034(ngi)007:3018: rnams gcig tu bsdus nas nyams su len pa'i gang
NK034(ngi)007:3019: zag de la gzhan gyi gnod pa bsrung bar bya
NK034(ngi)007:3020: ba'i phyir dpal e ka tsa ti nag mo khros
NK034(ngi)007:3021: ma'i rgyud kyi man ngag bstan te khros pa'i dus
NK034(ngi)007:3022: tshod kyi man ngag gis zla ba gcig la dus
NK034(ngi)007:3023: 'di tsam na ma mos bsad pa'i las bya ba'i
NK034(ngi)007:3024: dus kyis 'gal ba cham la phab pa dang bsam
NK034(ngi)007:3025: pa 'grub pa'i ngan sngags kyi rdzas la brten nas
NK034(ngi)007:3026: rnal 'byor pa'i nyal lugs kyis 'gal byed dgug par
NK034(ngi)007:3027: byas nas gnag pa thun drug gi ngan sngags gcig
NK034(ngi)007:3028: tu dril ba dang rkyang pa'i bya thabs kyis 'gal
NK034(ngi)007:3029: byed gsod pa'o de ltar rnal 'byor pa gcig gis
NK034(ngi)007:3030: bstan pa 'dzin pa dang skyong ba dang bsrung ba
NK034(ngi)007:3031: gsum tshang bar bstan pas na rgyud de dag tshig
NK034(ngi)007:3032: mtha' yas kyang don rnal 'byor pa gcig gi cha
NK034(ngi)007:3033: rkyen du bstan pa'o de'i phyir na rgyud thams cad
NK034(ngi)007:3034: kyi tsit+ta phyung ba ste de dag rnams la man
NK034(ngi)007:3035: ngag gi gzer 'di dag dang ma ldan na snying
NK034(ngi)007:3036: bton pa'i ro dang 'dra bas don med pa'o de'i
NK034(ngi)007:3037: phyir na rnal 'byor pa spros pa med pa'i blo
NK034(ngi)007:3038: can rnams kyi don du rgyud kyi khong snying phyung
NK034(ngi)007:3039: ste bstan pa'o 'di yi man ngag don dang ldan
NK034(ngi)007:3040: pa'i rnal 'byor pa la rgyud tshig rnams dgos pa
NK034(ngi)007:3041: med par bstan pas tshig gi spros pa chod de
NK034(ngi)007:3042: de'i don gcig tu gnas pa'i dgos pa yod pas
NK034(ngi)007:3043: don la yid ches shing tshig la mtha' rtogs pas
NK034(ngi)007:3044: na rnal 'byor pa chen po rnams kyi spyod yul
NK034(ngi)007:3045: lo de'i phyir na man ngag 'di gzhan la tshig
NK034(ngi)007:3046: tsam mam zur gcig kyang brjod par mi bya'o 'di
NK034(ngi)007:3047: ni nyams su len pa'i gang zag gsum las 'phel
NK034(ngi)007:3048: na mkha' 'gro'i chad pa 'byung ngo des na rab
NK034(ngi)007:3049: tu gsang bar bya'o bstan pa thams cad kyi snying
NK034(ngi)007:3050: po lta ba thams cad kyi yang zhun man ngag
NK034(ngi)007:3051: thams cad kyi nying khu yin pas so rgyud kyi
NK034(ngi)007:3052: khong snying gang zag gcig gi cha rkyen du bsdus
NK034(ngi)007:3053: pa gsal ba mig gi lde mig ces bya ba
NK034(ngi)007:3054: gsang ba'i debs rdzogs so i ti sngags kyi srung
NK034(ngi)007:3055: mas srungs shig dam tshig dang mi ldan zhing skal
NK034(ngi)007:3056: med rnams la byin na zhwa'i mgon pos chad pa
NK034(ngi)007:3057: bcad nas mig thang la brul nas tshe'i dus byed
NK034(ngi)007:3058: par 'gyur ro des na rab tu gsang ngo las
NK034(ngi)007:3059: can gcig dang 'phrad par shog shu b+ham bskal bzang
NK034(ngi)007:3060: sangs rgyas byon pa 'dzam bu'i gling //
NK034(ngi)007:3061: mdo sngags dam chos dar ba bod kyi ljongs //
NK034(ngi)007:3062: mkhan slob chos gsum 'dzom pas chos 'khor bskor //
NK034(ngi)007:3063: thugs bskyed bstan pa yun ring gnas gyur cig //
